_page1_
"Bayan hukucin da alkali ya yanke na sake meda uswap gidan kaso har zuwa lokacin da za'a kammala bincike
"Bayan ficewar alkali ne sannan police da ganroba duk suka mika, tare da sauran al'ummar dake zaune cikin kotun
"Nan aka auki uswap zuwa mota,mugirat dake biye dashi tana kuka ga jijiri a hannunta wanda baifi kwanaki da haihuwa ba, Alhj Aminu dake biye da'ita shine yasa hannu ya rikota hai da kiran sunarta" Mugirat
"Matsananci kuka da takeyi ya hanata amsa kiran da alhj Aminu yai mata, sai ma k'ok'arin k'wace kanta takeyi daga hannunsa
"Har sukai bakin mota Uswap ya juyo ya sake kallon mugirat hai da kwaa tama kira" Mugirat!! Mugirat!!, jin kiran uswap yasa mugirat waigowa ita kanta batasan lokacin data kwaa wani irin ihuu ba sannan tai hurrrgin da baby dake hannunta a guje ta nufi wajan motar hai da kiran sunar uswap
"Alhj Aminu dake tsaye shine yai saurin cafko baby, sbd kaan yarage ya fai k'asa, ba alhj Aminu ba hatta jama'ar dake bakin kotun saida ihu mugirat ya razanasu
" Tana isa bakin motar faawa tai jikin uswap hai da fashewa da wani irin matsanancin kuka"   "Shima rungumarta yai a kirjinsa hai da rintsa idonsa duka biyu, cikin zuciyarsa kuwa ji yake tamkar kamawa zatai da wuta sbd zafi da k'una
"Alhj Aminu dake gefe rike da baby shima kansa saida ya tosayawa yar tasa, yana mai lisafe-lisafen al'amarin mugirat tun daga tashinta har izuwa wannan lokacin
"Sunkai minti biyar a haka sannan ganroban suka dakatar dasu da ya'isa haka, nan suka tura uswap cikin mota ita kuma suka barta tsaye a gun
"Suna shiga sukaja motar zuwa prison, Mugirat dake tsaye sulalewa tai a gun ta zube k'asa tana mai danko k'asar dake gun hai da ihu da kiran sunar uswap!!!uswap!!!uswap!!,amma ina sun riga ta suyi nisa
"Da sauri alhj Aminu ya k'ariso inda take hannu aya yasa yana k'ok'arin agota tsaye amma ya kasa sabida ayar hannunsa akwai baby,"wasu mata biyu dake gefe tsaye gani abinda ke faruwa yasa suka kariso gun sune suka taimaka masa suka tayasa aga mugirat zuwa mota
"Driver yajasu suka tafi,tun a mota alhj yakeyi wa mugirat nasifa da tayi imani da Allah da k'uma k'addara,duk cikanken musulmi babu yanda za'ayi yace zaiyi rayuwa ba tare da Allah ya jarabcesa ba, dan haka nakeso kiyi hakuri sannan kuma ki yarda Allah ne mai kowa mai komai mai ikon yida hanawa, inaso ki auki wannan a matsayin k'addara kada ki kawo kowa cikin wannan al'amari Allah shi kaai ya barwa kansa sani kuma shine zai warware mana bi'iszinillah
"Cikin kuka mugirat tace"Haba daddy mai zaisa na auki wannan a matsayin k'addara? bayan kowa yasan halin uswap bazai aikata abinda ake tuhumarsa dashi ba, wlhy Allah
"Da sauri ya dakatar da'ita da cewa" a'a doughter kada ki zama irin mutaninan da idan jarabta ya sauko masu basu yarda da cewa Allah ne ya aiko masu da hakan sai su auki laifin su orawa waninsu, pls doughter banaso na sake jin irin wannan kalmar ya fito daga bakinki, kinji ko!!
"Cikin shekshekar kuka tace naji daddy
" yawwa my doughter shi isa nake alfahari dake, insha Allahu Allah zai kawo mana mafita, kedai kiyi ta addu'a
"To tace hai da komawa gefen kafaarsa ta kwanta, da haka yaita bata mgn har suka isa gida, koda suka fita daga mota bai bata baby ba har suka shiga daga cikin falo, hjy kilishi dake zaune a falo kallo aya tai masu sannan tai sauri auke kanta gefe hai da cewa iska na wahalar dame kayan kara, bayan ga gaskiya a fili amma an bawa kai wahala shine ake kokarin boyewa," uhmm adaiyi mugani idan tusa zai hura wuta
"Daga alhj har mugirat babu wanda ya tanka mata, mikawa mugirat baby yai hai da cewa jeki ciki ki kwanta ki huta, nima zanshi daga cikine
"To daddy tace hai da amsar yaronta tashige daga ciki, shima shigewarsa yai cikin ba tare daya tanka wa kilishi ba
"A bangaren gidan su uswap kuwa tun daga lokacin da wannan iftila'in ta afka masa babu wanda ya aga mgnr musamman ma hjy jiddah tamkar ba an data tsuguna ta haifaba
" Mus'ap kowa  wani irin dai ma yakeyi domin gani yake duk abinda yakeson yi uswap ne ke taka masa birki amma yanzu da yake hannu hukuma, zai sake lilisa yai sharrrrholiyarrrsa yanda yakeso babu mai hanasa
"Kubra da zahra kuwa kullum ciki jimami suke musamman idan su tuna halin da an'uwarsu yake ciki, wani k'arin tashin hankali da suka jiyo labarin cewa idan har lokacin da alkali ya iba ba'a gano gaskiyar mgn ba yanke masa hukuncin kisa za'ayi jin hakan ba k'aramin tada masu hankali yai ba
"Kwance take a rigigine babu abinda takeyi illa kuka mara sauti, kwallane wani kebi wani, Zahra dake  kwance gefenta juyowar da zatai ta gano kubra kuka takeyi da sauri ta yunkura ta mike zaune hai da tambayar kubra yaya dai, mai kuma ya faru?
"Juyawa kubra tai ta sake fashewa da wani matsananci kuka mai tsuma zuciya,la66an bakinta har rawa sukeyi,"gani haka yasa Zahra sanya hannu ta ago kubra hai da cewa to koma me nene dai kiyi hakuri kibi komai a hankali, idan matsala kuka samu keda fa'eez insha Allahu komai zai dai-daita bare ma nasan faarku baya nisa zaku shirya, kinju my sis
" Zahra ta k'arisa mgnr ne da wasa da rarrashi, tana me shafe bayar yar'uwarya
"Cikin kuka kubra ta juyo tana fai ba fa'eez bane, hjyce!!
" Subnallah,hjy kuma?mai kuma ya haaki da hjy?
"Akan mgnr yaya uswap
"agowa tai zaune sannan taci gaba da cewa wlhy Zahra na rasa abinda yaya uswap yaiwa hjy data tsanesa haka, ki duba fa tunda labari ya iso gidan nan akan abinda ya samesa duk irin fai tashin da akeyi amma banda hjy kodai boye mana akai ba'tace ta haifesa ba?
"Haba kubra, wacce irin mgn kikeyi haka?, daga su yaya harmu duk itace ta haifemu a cikinta
"Idan haka ne to meyasa ta tsani yaya taki jinisa shida matarsa da kuma yaransa?
"Oho wannan kuma ita tabarwa kanta sani, dan nima abin yana matukar damuna
" Nidai yanzu duk mu ije wannan zancen, yaya zamuyi da mgnr yaya, kin san fa yau saura sati biyu su sake hauwa a kotu, sannan kuma alkali yace daga wannan zamar da za'ayi idan har ba'a gano gaskiyar lamari ba yanke masa hukuncin kisa kawai za'ayi," tunda daga su bangaren masu k'ara suriga da subada masu shedu kuma kwararan shedu suka bayar
"Abinyi kawai muje mu sami hjy
" ko?
" eh mana"
"To tana ina yanzu?
" falo mana"          "To muje" duk sauka sukai daga kan gadon suka fita zuwa falo inda hjy jiddah ke zaune"   "zaune take kan wasu iri ima-dimar cushion kirar italiya, tasha koriyar shadda gezinal doguwar riga mai inki stone work,tana rike da glass cup a hannuta  wanda yake auke da juice a ciki, yatsukan hannunta sanye suke da zinarai kirar dubai"
"K'afa aya ta auka ta dora a ayan, tana kur6an juice in dake hannunta tana kallo a faskareran tv dake manne jikin bango, kallo aya zakai wa falon kasan ankashe masa raina bana wasa ba, bani yar mutan ba zazzau ko" ANTY RUKKY ta sheda hakan" "kallo aya zakai mata kasan Allah yai kira da halitta a gun,sai dai yanzu da shekaru suka ja,amma duk da hakan bai hana kagano irin kyawunta ba
"Suna isowa duk zube mata sukai a jiki suna fain hjyrmu kenan
"Cikin murmushi mai auke da nishai "tace yaran hjy yau kuma dame akazo?
"Zahra ce ta fara mgn da babu komai hjy"
"Anya da gaske?
"Da gaske hjy"   "To Allah yasa
"Tana mgnr ne suka haa ido da kubra ba tare da hjy ta gansu ba" kashe mata ido tai a alamar kubra tai mgn tunda itace babba
"Sai da kubra taan gyara zama sannan ta fara da" hjy dan Allah wani alfarma nazo nema a gunki amma bansani ba ko zansamu"   "Wani irin kallo hjy jiddah tai wa kubra dake mgn sannan tace fai ina sauraranki, Allah dai yasa ba akan mgn an'uwarku bane!!
"Naunauyar ajiyar zuciya kubra tai, wanda ya hanata hurta komai, illa tsare hjy jiddah da tai da ido
"Zahra dake gefe zauna tace" sis fai mana!!'ko dai tsoro kikeji ko kuma kunyar hjyr tamu?
"Take fuskan hjy jiddah ya canza daga fara'ar dake auke dashi ya koma murtik' Cikin kaukausar murya hjy jiddah tace" tunda ita tanajin kunya ke da bakijin kunya saiki fai, amma kusani kada ku kawomin mgnr shashasharrr yayan nan naku, domin nariga da nayi rantsuwa sisina bazaiyi ciwo kai a kansa ba
"Cikin tsiwa Zahra tace" haba hjy wacce irin mgnce kikeyi haka, kodai ba kece kika haifesa
"Saukar marukan da tajine ya hanata k'arisa mgnr' da dauri tasa hannu ta dafe kuncinta tana mai shafewa sbd raain zafin da takeji
"Tsawa ta kada masu da sutashi su bata gu,sannan taci gaba da cewa"shashashan yara kawai wanda basusan ciwon kansu ba"    "To wlhy bari kuji sisina bazaiyi ciwon kai sabida shiba, idan ma banda yarinta dason zuciya irin ta an Adam ga gaskiya a baiyane, kowa ya sheda shine yai wannan ta'asar amma sabida so zuciya shine ake nimar juya al'amarin, to bari kuji badani za'ayi shiba, koda kuwa ina tafe kui suna zuba ak'asa ne, tunda a rayuwarsa bashida zuciyar da zai tashi ya nemi na kansa irin an'uwarsa yaji dain rayuwa kamar yadda kowani mai kui keji auko sai dai ya zauna,a auresa kuma andae ba'a auresa ba, idan sai nasa bakine sannan za'a sakesa ku kuma naje to wlhy babu inda zani, bare har na auki wani lauya, tunda akwai lauyoyin gwamnati da suke tsaya wa mutum sai yaje can su tsaya masa"
" Haka kawai an kuin da takejin dain rayuwata dashi suzo su k'are a gun shari'a nazo na shaga uku, na koma talaka abar k'yama bara ecci bara km irin a ido duniya, bayan nasan duk wanda nake harka dasu sabida abin hanunane, da zaran sun k'are kowa zai gujeni, na koma abar tausayi
"An dae ba'a auresa ba, kuma marasa kan gado, idan har da gaske so kuke ku taimaka masa, ai ga gidansa can ta gado kuje ku saida, idan tusa zai hura huta dai ma gani

_page2_
"Kubra na shiga aki wani sabon kuka tasa hai da faawa bisa gado, ita kuwa zhra sai faman bawa kubra hakuri takeyi
" Tun daga lokacin da Mus'ap yai tafiya zuwa Dubai wajan harkokin business insa bai dawo gida ba, duk da yasan da matsalar da an'uwarsa ke ciki, yana can yana sharholiyarsa da matan banza musamman ma wannan tafiyar da yai shida lawiza, shi isa ko tunanin gida bayayi
"Hjy dake kwance a falo gani har la'asar yai Munirat bata dawo gida ba yasa hjy aukar waya ta lali6o number ta domin kiranta, bugu aya wayar munirat ya fara ringing, a lokacin tana kan hayar dawowa gida, sannan kuma dai-dai lokacin tana kan kwana ga gosilo suyi yawa hakan yasa bata aga wayar hjy ba, gani ba'a aga ba yasa hjy itama bata hkr da kiran ba, nan taci gaba da kira, tai kira yakai ten miss call, munirat dake tuki tsaki kawai taja hai da cewa duk yanda akai da jaki saiyaci kara
"Sabida kada ringing in wayar ya dameta yasa Munirat sanya wayar cikin slent, hjy jiddah tai kira har ta gaji ba'a aga ba, gani anki agawa ne yasa ta hkr da kiran
"Batafi minti biyar da ije wayar ba saiga Munirat tai sallama falo ta shigo, bakinta auke da cingom, tana tafe tana taunawa hai da balan-balan, key in motartane a yatsar hannunta tana juyi dashi
"Ko kallon inda hjy jiddah ke zaune Munirat batai ba kai kawai tasa ,zata shigo daga ciki, da sauri hjy jiddah tace" Munirat har kin dawo?
"Ba tare data waiga ba tace" nadawo, sannan tai shigewarta daga ciki, tana shiga alwala tai tai sallar la'asar bayan ta idar ne ta kwanta
"Tunda Munirat ta kwanta bata tashi ba har kusan 6PM sallamar Sumayya da Surayya ne ya tasheta tare suka shigo da hjy har bedroom in Munirat, Munirat na gani hjy ta sake wani tsakin sannan ta juya kanta gefe
"Sumayya da Surayya tuni suka haye jikin Munirat suna fain" mamy yau tun safe nakejin yunwa
da sauri Sumayya tace"ke allah ba muje da lunch school ba?Surayya tace" to ba indomie ne kawai ba kuma ai mamy tasan banacin indomie
"Hjy jiddah take tsaya tana jinsu tace "to kin gani ko, dan Allah ki tashi kije ki ora abinci, kodai yaran nan
"Duk a lokacin Munirat bata tanka wa hjy ba, illa mikewa da tai hai da cewa yaranta kuzo muje, tana gaba suna biye da'ita suka fice zuwa kitchen sukabar hjy tsaye a tsakar aki," Gani su tafi su barta a akin yasa itama ta kama kanta ta fice, Munirat na shiga kitchen tea ta haa wasu Surayya da Sumayya tace suje falo su sha
"Duk a tunanin hjy jiddah girkine Munirat taje ora masu ashe ba haka abin yake ba, har ta mike domin shiga daga cikin akinta sbd magrib ya gabato sukai karo da Sumayya zasu shigo falo hannayensu rike da cups in tea, da sauri tace"Au tea aka haa maku kuma,ni dana auka sanwa zata ora ashe ba haka bane
"Karaf Munirat ta ca6i mgnr da idan kin auka saiki sauke sbd na gaji da aikin banza aikin da balada
"da sauri hjy jiddah tace yanzu Munirat ni kike fai wa haka?"An fai in, ko kinada abinyi ne?"lallai Munirat yanzu nasan waye ke, sannan duk abinda kikeyi bazanga laifinki ba, laifin mijinki ne dayaje ya ibo mana mugun iri, irin talauci wanda basu gaji arziki ba,
"ke hjy ya isheki haka, duk abinda zamuyi muyishi nidake amma kada ki sake ki zagan min iyaye, domin iyayena sufi k'arfin zagi a gunki,
"Me kuke dashi me kuka mallaka da har kike wani gadara
"oho, kinfi kowa sani koma menene"
" A fusace ta bar gun hai da cewa wlhy zai dawo ya sameni, wani aure ko auren masifa da bala'i, saiya bani takardata wlhy domin bazan iya cigaba da zata dashi a matsayin mijina ba, koda shi kaai ne yarage autar maza na hkr gwamma na zauna babu aure da aurensa
"Hjy jiddah dake tsaye na jinta tace oho dai, wannan kuma tsakaninku ne
" Tun bayan tafiyar Mus'ap dubai ko tunanin gida bayayi, yau tsawon wata hudu kenan, ita kanta lawizan har k'asar ya fara isarta, musamman ma yanda idan ya fita tun safe baya dawowa masaukinsu sai dare sannan yake dawowa gida,"Ita kuma a rayuwarta ta tsani zaman gu aya, hakan yasa bayan ya fita gu harkokinsa itama ta shirya tai ficewarta, kusan nace lokacin aya suka fita, sai dai an mintocine kawai ke tsakaninsu
"Kasan cewar ita bak'uwace a k'asar amma fitan da tai yau aya saida garin ya birgeta, tai yawo sosai taga abubuwan sha'awa dana mmki sbd al'adu ba aya ba sannan kuma shigarmu shima ba aya ba, hakan yasa ta riga Mus'ap dawowa gid sbd gobe tanaso ta sake fita
"Koda Mus'ap ya dawo gida, ganita yai kwance a falo, da sauri ya k'ariso inda take kwance ya faa kanta hai da huging inta yana fain a'm sorry my baby na barki ke kadai ko?
"Cikin shagwa6a tace babu komai, har ka dawo?
" Na dawo baby,gani ya kamo nonuwarta dake cikin gari, duk da dai ita da babu kusan aya ne, da sauri tace"bari mana, daga dawowarka?
"Idan daga dawowata ne fa?kaya nane fa
" Uhmm kawai tace ba tare data tanka masa ba
"Mikewa tai suka shige daga ciki, bayan ya tube yai wanka domin rage gajiya snn suka dawo falo domin cin abinci
"Sunaci suna hira Mus'ap yana bata labarin yanda garin yake," dariya kawai takeyi hai da binsa da eh, sabida duk inda yake fai mata yau taje tanewa idonta, inda kuma bataje ba, anan taci burin gobe yana fita itama zata fita taje ta kashe k'wark'watar idonta
"Washe gari da yamma yana fita," itama ta shirya cikin gari da wando wanda ya fito mata da dukkanin suran jikinta waje, ko'ina nata su bayyana a waje, ankwalin a baya ta rolling kanta dashi sannan ta fita, kai tsaye gun wani k'ayataccen shan iska taje, wanda ya aa kowa da kowa bak'ak'en fata da fararen turawa da larabawa, gefe gunda taje ta tsaya tana kallon yanda yan k'asar suke gudanar da al'amuransu gwanin ban sha'awa
"Tana kallo tana murmusawa, hai ta latse-latse wayar dake hannunta, kamar daga samu taji an doko mata sallama a kunni, wanda saida taji dodon kunnita ya amsa
"A firgice ta juya hai da fai wayyo Allah na, Murmusawa yai sannan yace " Au ke kaaice keda Allah?
"Cikin yanayi na shagwa6a tace" to idan ban kira Allah ba waye zan kira?

"Me kagani?
" Kawai dai, kinsan duk inda bako yake a guri baya boyuwa"

"Bata musa masa ba, binsa tai yana gaba tana biye dashi a baya suka isa gun zaman, bayan ta zauna yasa ma'aikatan gun su kawo mata abinci"
"Tunda suka zauna babu wanda ya tanka wa an'uwarsa, gani haka yasa"shi ya fara yi mata mgn da cewa da farko dai sunana alhj Umar shagali, ni haifanfen jahar yala ne

"Misalin k'arfe goma dai-dai kowa ya hallara a kotun'kama daga alhj Aminu, mugirat, shi kansa Uswap in da ake shari'a akansa har su shedun da sukaba dasheda a kansa
"Sgigowar alkali kowa ya mike, saida alkali ya zauna sannan suma suka zauna,bayan kowa yagabatar da kansa, sannan lauyar dake goyawa wacce aka kashe baya ya fara mgn, hai da mika wa alkali wasu takardu, bayan alkali ya dubi takardu sannan ya juya ga lauyan dake bayan Uswap hai da tambayarsa har yanzu ba'a samu k'arin haske akan bincike dasukeyi ba ko su samu?
"Jin lauyar yai sanyi gaya sabida har yanzu wanda yake goyawa baya yaki mgn, wato Uswap kenan, shi kuwa a iya bincikesa yasan ba Uswap ne yai kisar ba, amma kuma wani abin da har yanzu bai sani ba, aina ya samo gawa?
"Dole ya juya ga alkali yace ranka ya dae babu
"Karaf wani mutum dake zauna a gefe side in da yan kallo ke zama yai saurin amsawa da cewa akwai
"Daga alkalin har sauran jama'ar dake zaune kusa dashi duk juyowa sukai suna kallonsa, hai da mmkinsa, musamman alhj Aminu da kuma mugirat sai shi kansa Uswap in
" Jin hakan yasa alkali ya umarta daya fito yai bayani
"Bayan ya fito ne, saida ya gabatar da kansa da cewa" da farko sunana Barister Sani alhasan, ni lauyane mai zaman kansa, na shigo wannan case ine sabida karo wanda ake tuhuma bisa kamasa da akai da gawa a mota
"Alkali yace ina sauraranka"
"A ranar da aka kama Uswap da gawa a mota, hakikanin gaskiya baida masaniya akai, sabida a lokacin yana dawowa daga gun gyarar motar surukinsa ne wato mahaifin matarsa, ya hadu da yarinyarne a lokacin ta fito daga wani gida, tana tsaye a bakin titi, tana nimar abin hawa, a lokacin data taresa na farko ma bai tsaya ba, saida yai nima sannan ya dawo da baya ya auketa, bayan ta shiga motarsa ne yake gani ashe ma wacce ya sanine,idan ba mantuwa naiba su jima suna hira kafin ta fara hasa-hasan mutuwa, yayi k'ok'arin tambayarta amma a yanayin da take ciki, bazata iya bashi amsa ba hakan yada ya yanke hukucin kaita asibiti a hanyar zuwarsu asibitine rai yayi halinsa, batafi minti biyar zuwa goma da mutuwa ba polisawa da suke patrol, a lokacin shi kuma Uswap in yariga ya shiga tashin hankali, domin daga inda ta cika bai motsa daga gun ba har Allah polices gun
" Uswap dake tsaye a inda masu laifi ke tsaye yai matukar mmkin yanda akai barister Sani Alhasan yasan yanda hakan ya faru
"Sannan yaci gaba da cewa dan haka nake rokon alkali daya bara mana wasu kwanaki domin binciko gaskiyar al'amari
"Daga mugirat har alhj Aminu suji dain zuwa wannan barister sosai,"Nan alkali ya sake aga shari'ar zuwa nanda k'arke wata, mai fita, amma za'a maida Uswap in kaso, har zuwa lokacin da za'a sake haduwa
"Bayan fitowasu daga cikin kotun, babu yanda alhj Aminu da mugirat basui da barister Sani daya tsaya su tattauna ba amma yaki, dole yasa suka hakura suka tafi

"Haka rayuwa taci gaba tsakani hjyta da munirat zamane sukeyi amma bata dai ba, saida sukakai wata biyu da aure sannan mus'ap yaci gaba da harkok'in kasuwancinsa,da farko dai baya daewa idan yaje sati biyu zuwa uku zaidawo gida, da haka har munirat tasamu ciki,duk da cikin data samu baisa hjy ta saurara mata ba
*"(duka yau duka gobe shikesa bak'in ba'auzine tawaye),* ina zaune a falo saiga kubra tashigo a guje hai da kiran sunana, gani yanayin data shigo yasa tun kafim ta k'ariso inda nake na mik'e na tarota hai da tambayar lafiya?
"Hakkin da takeyi ya hanata mgn sai faman nunamin hannu takeyi,"gani haka yasa bin'inda take nunamin, ko kafin na  k'arisa k'arar kwanuka najiyo a kitchen hakan yasa nanufi kitchen in, ina shiga hjy nagani da munirat suna kwasan anbe duk suyi kace kace anbe suke koda sa'oin junane sai haka
"Hjy na zagin munirat" itama tana ramawa,aini, babu irin mgnr da banyiwa hjy data kyale munirat ba amma tak'i itace dai munirat in tunda nashigo tasaki hjy amma banda ita hjy
"Gani haka yasa nacewa munirat tabar kitchen in,ta juya zata fita kenan hjy tasake shakota taci gaba da duka, nayi iya yina akan hjy tasaki munirat amma taki,duk da banso sa hannu a jikin munirat ba amma dole tasani, hannu nasa na k'wato munirat daga hannu hjy, tana mikewa nai sauri rikewa hjy hannu, ban saketa ba saida naga munirat tashige akinta sannan na saki hjy hai da bata hkr
" Haushin rike mata hannu danayi ban barta taduki munirat ba yasa ta hauni da zagi inda take shiga banan take fita ba, zagi da gori kam nashashi, bai dameni ba sabida idan da sabo nasaba, hatta su kubra da Zahra ranar bata bari ba
"Munirat na shiga aki kayanta ta haa a cikin ank'arami jaka, tana kuka tafito zata tafi gidansu, lokacin hjy na akinta, da sauri na tsaidata ina bata hkri akan kada ta tafi, tunda babu mijinta a gida tai hkr har mus'ap in yadawo koma menene sai ayi
" karaf saiga hjy ta fito aguje hai da fisge jakar dake hannu munirat tana fain wlhy babu inda zaki da jakarnan tunda badaga gidanku aka kawo ba, duk kayan dake akinki kuin annane dan haka koda sakinki yai tsinke bazaki fita dashi daga gidan nan ba, yar matsiyata jikokin matsiyata wanda basu gaji arziki ba
"Jin haka yasa munirat kwarma uban ihu hai  da fauwa a k'asa tana kuka," nasan ba komai ne yasa munirat wannan irin kukunba illa bakin ciki da takaici,sannan kuma dani, nasan inda banagun yau sai abinda tamance amma idan inagun bazata iyaba, domin munirat bakaramin girmata take gani ba
"Koshi mijinta dayake an'uwana baya bani girman da munirat kebani
"Gani haka yasa na amshi jakar dake  rike a hannu hjy har zan mika mata saukar duka kawai naji ashe hjyce ta hauni da duka, hai da zagina wai bana kishinta,dama batun yau nake nadamar haihuwarka ba shege tsinanne matsiyaci mara kishina, ban ta6a sanin idan zafin talauci yaiwa mutum yawa yana kashe masa zuciya ba sai a kanka wlhy Allah Uswap nayi nadamar haihuwarka,nayi nadamar daka fito daga cikin cikina kuma idan har baka medamin da jakarba saina tsine maka saika biyani nonon dana shayar dakai
"Jin haka yasa na fashe da kuka hai da zubewa a gabanta ina me nimar gafaranta
"Gani haka yasa munirat ficewa daga gidan a guje tana ihu," ihuntane yasa su kubra da zahra dake akinsu suka fito falo, "jin kalaman dake fita daga bakin hjyne yasasu suma fashewa da kuka dukkanmu zubewa mukai a gabanta muna mai bata hkr hai da nimar gafaranta
" itama da take tsayen kuka takeyi kamar wacce aka daka
"Kai duniya ashe har yanzu ana samu iyaye irin su hjy jiddah?, Allah ya rabamu da samun uwa irinta

"Gani haka yasa Mus'ap bai koma Dubai ba saida yakai sati a Nigeria
"Ko sati ba aiba Mus'ap ya siyewa munirat sabuwar mota dal wacce tafi datada tsada da kyau hjy Jiddah tai faa har tagaji a ranar babu wanda ya tanka mata, data gaji an kanta tai shiru, asalima wanda take faan dansu basu gidan, domin yau tun safe da suka fita basu dawo gida ba har zuwa wannan lokaci
"Tun daga lokacin hjy Bilkisu take gyara yar'ta kullum cikin gyara take hakan yasa  Mus'ap yakoma tamkar mahaukaci akan munirat, duk da cikin dake jikinta amma bai hanata bawa mijinta kulawa ba
"Duk lokacin da muke zaune a falo babu hali hjy Jiddah taga Mus'ap ya mike da niyyar zuwa side insa, idan ta fara fai tun safe bata barin faar harsai rana ya fai

"Gani haka yasa nake k'ok'arin auke kaina ga duk abinda zasuyi bata kulasu asalima idan suka fara barin gidan nakeyi bazan dawo ba sai dare sbd nasan by that time duk abinda zasuyi su gama,idan ranar aikine kuma sai suyi su k'are banida labarin
"Haka naci gaba da gudanar da rayuwata, ina kulawa da aikina da kuma business in da daddyn mugurat ya orani akai, cikin ikon Allah da haka nasamu rufan asiri domin harda gini saida nayi, a ban garen hjy mahaifiyata kuwa ina iyakan k'okarina wajan kyautata mata a matsayina na ah a gareta amma bata gani, raina baya 6aci hankalina baya tashi sai azumi ya kama, daga lokacin da akace mu shiga watan azumi har zuwa sallah cikin ar-dar nake sabida duk abinda zankawo gidan hjy bata ta6a bue baki tasami albarka kullum cikin korafi,Allah ya gani iyakan k'arfina kenan nai domin idan har zanbiyewa hjy a kullum ina kawo mata abinda takeso tofa sai dai nashiga cikin dukiyar alhj Aminu na hamdame, ni kuma Allah yagani ina matuk'ar kiyaye cin hakkin daba tawa ba
"Hakan yasa koda da sallah ne idan nai mata kayan sallah batasawa sai dai na Mus'ap domin shi daga can Dubai yake masu siyayya daga na hjy harna matansa dasu Kubra, wani lokaci hardani yake siye mawa
"Abinda hjy kemin ba k'aramin 6atamin rai yakeyi ba dole yasa nake auke kai nai kamar be dameni ba
"Bayan shekara biyu da rabi da auran Mus'ap da munirat alhj Aminu yatada mgnr aurena da Mugirat, ban musa ba a wannan lokacin sabida nima a matse nake sannan kuma tunda yanzu nai tawa gini idan nai auren ba'anan zamu zauna ba, jin alhj Aminu ya tada mgnr aurena da mugirat yasa naje gidan yan'uwan babana na sanar masu, cikin sa'a a wannan karon suka goyami baya ba kamar wacce karon ba
"Nai hakane ba saboda komai ba, illa gudun abinda yafaru a baya kada yakuma faruwa a wannan karon
"Dalilina kenan nak'in faiwa hjy mgnr aurena da mugirat a wannan karon
"Naji dain hakan sosai, hakan yasa bansake bi takan hjy ba saida muka kammala komai nida yan'uwan babana sannan na sanarwa hjy, nayi hakane ba sabida komai ba tsoro nake kada ta kawomin nakasu a ciki, hakan yasa saida muka kammala komai sannan na sanar mata, ashe yin hakan ba itace hanyar warwarewar matsala taba, tunda nasaniwar hjy inda take shiga banan take fita ba har dacewa za'ayi auren mugani

"Bansan yanda akai ba kawai naga kaina a kofar gidan su mugirat, ina isa itama tana isa,babu yanda banyi da'ita ba akan kada ta shiga cikin gidan amma tak'i sai faman kakawa mukeyi da'ita muna cikin haka saiga maigadin gidansu ya lek'o gani nida mugirat ne yasashi fitowa da sauri hai da tambayarmu meke faruwa?
"babu wanda ya tanka masa daga cikinmu gani haka yasashi komawa ciki da sauri befi minti biyar da shiga ba saiga alhj Aminu su fito dare da maigadin gidan
"Gani alhj Aminu yasani sakin mugirat da sauri alhj Aminu ya k'ariso hai da tambayar abinda ke faruwa
'Gani alhj Aminu yasa mugirat tafiya a guje ta tungumesa hai da fashewa dawani Sabon kuka, gani haka yasa alhj Aminu cewa mushiga daga ciki,"
Dagani harsu musha shige suna gaba ina biye dasu a baya,kai tsaye falo muka nufa, bayan mu zauzauna ba tare damu gaisa ba alhj Aminu yake tambayata abinda ke faruwa?
"Gaba aya kaina ya aure na rasa ta'ina ne zanfara masa bayani, take wasu kwalla masu zafi suka zubomin, hankalina ya k'ara tashi
"Gani haka yasa alhj Aminu cewa mugirat ta shiga daga ciki, ni kuma hannu yasa ya kamomi tawa hannu hai da cewa tashi muje, guarding in gidan muka nufa bayan mu zauna ne yasake jefomi tambayar abinda ke faruwa
"Duk yanda alhj Aminu yakai ga tambayata amma na kasa bashi amsa, kuka kawai nakeyi tamkar yaro an goye
"Dole yasa ya kyaleni, domin a wannan lokacin kam koda kwana zamuyi dashi yana tambayata ba zai sami amsar a wannan lokacin ba
"Ita kuwa mugirat tunda tashiga aki babu abinda takeyi illa kuka, alhj Aminu na shiga jin muryarta ne yasashi shiga cikin akin datake, duk a lokacin hjy kilishi na jinsu amma bata fito falo ba bare ta nuna tasan abinda ke wakana
"Bayan alhj Aminu ya zauna  hannu yasa ya ago mugirat dake kwance tana kuka, jikinsa tazo ta lafe, gani haka yasa hannu yana shafe mata baya hai da bata mgn,jin haka yasa mugirat fashewa da wani kukan hai da cewa daddy nashiga uku na lalace daddy,daddy na rasa ummata yanzu kuma na rasa mijina, daddy hjy tasa Uswap yasakeni daddy daddy yaya zanyi da rayuwata,wayyo Allahna daddy
"Duk mgnr da mugirat keyi alhj Aminu bai fahimci abinda take nufi ba,gani koda zasu kwana tana masa mgn a wannan lokacin ba fahimtarta zaiyi ba hakan yasa yaita bata mgn har saida ta numfasa sannan ya tambayata
"Cikin natsuwa mugirat tai masa bayani duk yanda akai tsakanita da hjy Jiddah
"Alhj Aminu yai mmki sosai da abinda mugirat tafai masa, inda badan yasan waye mugirat ba dah saiyace k'arya takeyi, amma duk da haka bazai auki hukuci akai ba har sai yaje yaji yanda akai sannan idan ma wani hukunci ne saiya auka
Koda na fita daga gidan su mugirat, gefe guda na samu na zauna, tunani iri-iri yake zuwami a zuciya, duk da nasan waye alhj Aminu sannan kuma nasan idan har mugirat tai mata bayani abinda yafaru nasan bazai ganni da bak'i ba, sai dai nasan dole zaiji babu dai a zuciyarsa
Na jima ina irin wannan tunane tunani, gani zaman ba'itace mafita a gareni ba mikewa nai zuwa gidan yan uwan mahaifina na sanar masu duk abinda ke faruwa, dukkkansu basuyi k'asa a guiwa ba sukani gidan alhj Aminu, cikin girma da mutunci ya amshesu bayan su gaisa suka fara bashi hakuri bisa abinda yafaru
Murmushi yai me auke da takaici wanda duk mai hankali yagani yasan bata dai bane yai,sai kawai ya faske da cewa babu komai dama haka Allah ya tsara al'amarin, daya daga cikin k'anin babana da shike malam ne yace"tunda bayin kansa bane akwai aure sai dai za'a janye saki biyu a maidashi aya,"dayan dake gefe yace a'a a tasa fahimtar babu aure
Gani sun fara gardama yasa alhj Aminu kiran babban limami dake unguwar shike jansu sallah,doka yazo shima cewa yayi akwai aure,kowa yakawo tasa hujoji kuma gamsassu, gani haka yasa alhj Aminu cewa abasa nanda kwana biyu domin tafiya nimo k'arin haske akai sabida ita ilimi tamkar kogi take faine gareta dan haka saiyaji daga bakin wasu malamai
Haka mukai sallama muka tafi, duk da naso gani mugirat domin k'ara bata hakuri hai da rarrashinta amma babu hali, domin tunda ta shige bata fito ba
Da shike a falo muka zauna muna fita daga falon ko bakin gate bamu kaiba najiyo guan hjy kilishi tana gua hai da tafi tana fai wlhy yanzu aka soma, domin kaan kenan kafara gani dagakai har ita yar'lelen wacce bata laifi yar'goal, aidama nariga dana fai babu inda wannan auren zashi kuma ga maganata ya fito, zaman gida yanzu muka fara
Jin haka ba k'aramin 6atamin rai yayi ba, tun daga lokacin na dunk'ufa da addu'a Allah yasa munada ragowar zama a tsakaninmu, ban koma gidan hjy Jiddah ba kai tsaye gidan yan'uwan babana natafi domin a yanda nakeji a zuciyata bazan iya cigaba da zama a gida aya da hjy Jiddah ba, duk data kasance mahaifiya a gareni
Tun daga lokacin na dunk'ufa nafilfili da dare hai da niman za6in Allah, babban tashin hankalina idan nakira mugirat bata aga wayata koda zan kwana ina kira bazata aga ba,sai dai saukina aya muna gaisawa da alhj Aminu harma na tambayesa mugirat
Alhj Aminu yayi yawo gun malamai da dama duk amsar kenan, gudun kada azo a aikata abinda za'azo ana danasani yasa alhj Aminu mallafawa Allah lamarin
Tun daga ranar danabar gida hjy bata nimeni ba,daga ita har Mus'ap su kubra da Zahra ne kawai suka biyoni har inda nake, babu yanda basuyi dana koma gida ba nace a'a danan dacen duk ayane
Babu irin rokon da basuyi minba amma nak'i yarda nabisu, da haka suka gaji suka barni naci gaba da zamata a nan gidan
Duk da nasan koda kwana zanyi ina kiran mugirat ba agawa zatai ba amma duk da haka gana kin kiranta, wani lokaci kuma naje har gidan na fake da cewa nazo gaida alhj Aminu ne, sai dai duk daewar da zanyi a gidan ko gilmawarta bazan gani ba,idan nagaji da zama haka nake tashi na tafi gida jiki babu k'arfi
Ranar da muka cika wata aya da aure ranar ne mugirat ta tashi da matsanancin zazzabi da amai, tun dare dakeyi har safiya, gani haka yasa alhj Aminu aukarta zuwa hospital, gwajin farki ya nuna tana auke da ciki, jin haka yasa alhj Aminu murna mara musaltuwa take yaau wayarsa ya annamin kira
Lokacin ina zaune akan darduma ina lazumi saiga kiran alhj Aminu yashigo wayata, gani number da sassafe yasani aga wayar da sauri hai da sallama
Ko gaisawa bai bari muyiba yace kazo hospital yanzu nan
Kafin nace lafiya, tuni ya kashe wayarsa
"banyi tunani kiransa ba kawai na shirya zuwa hospital in da shike nariga nasan hospital in yasa ban6ata lokaci ba na'isa
Ina isa akin dasuke alhj Aminu yakai min wata irin runguma hai da fain alhamdllh Uswap, Allah shine abin godiya, duk a lokacin ban fahimci ina yadosa ba, juyawar da zanyi na hango mugirat kwanta hannunta auke da drip da sauri na k'arisa gun hai da tambayar lafiya?
Murmushi ta sakarmi hai da aukar mayafinta dake gefen tarufe fuskanta dashi
Alhj Aminu ne ke zaiyamin nakusan zama baba, jin hakan yasa nai wani irin tsalle hai da ihu ina mewa ubangiji kirari da mika godiyata garesa
A lokacin naji wani irin tantagaryan so da kaunar mugirat na ratsani tamkar yaune farko hauwarmu
Mu jima muna hira da daddy sannan yatafi gida ya barni da'ita a hospital in
Kwananta aya aka sallameta, muka tafi gida, shi kuwa alhj tun daga lokacin da Dr yace tana auke da ciki yakoma gun malamai yai masu bayani, a nanne suke sheda masa akwai aure, idan ma saki nanan saidai a medashi a matsayin saki aya
Jin haka yasa ranar da muka dawo daga hospital duk ya taramu yasheda mana yanda sukai da malamai daya tambaya,"dukkanmu murna mukai dajin hakan,sannan alhj Aminu yabamu za6in inda mukeda sha'awar zama a cikin gidajan dayake dasu mu za6i aya
Mugirat ce taza6a, alhj Aminu yace bai yarda ba saidai muje nagani idan gun yayimi shikenan
Nida mugirat muka tafi duba gun, gani babu laifi yasa nace yayi min,bamukai sati ba muka tare a gidan, ban sanarwa hjy Jiddah batun tarewarmu ba saisu kubra da Zahra kawai nasar masu, dan haka kusan nace duk aikin da mukayi dasu mukai
Tawa gidan naga gina da niyyar zama alhj yace nasa haya idan yaso nak'ara nayi cefane da kuin
Gani mugirat tasamu sauki sosai yasa nace ta shirya muje gaida angi da abokan arziki, gidan su muka fara zuwa, bamu zauna ba sabida zamuyi zagaye- zagaye da dama, muna fita sai gidajan yan'uwan babana suma in bamu zauna ba daga nan nace muwuce gidan hjy Jiddah mugaidata
Da shike a motar mugirat ce muka fita dashi duk  yawon amma nike driving, muna isa bakin gate nayi hone da azo a buemin gate, ban san yadda akai hjy Jiddah tasan mune ba, mujima tsaye a gun ba'azo anbue mana gate ba
Gani haka yasa mukai parking a gefe sannan muka fita daga cikin motar zuwa cikin gidan
Ko kafun mu k'arisa daga cikin hjy Jiddah ta rufe kofar falon da key, mu dae muna knocking ba'a bue ba, gani haka yasa muka juya zuwa gida
Tun daga lokacin koda kiran hjy Jiddah ma ta waya bata agawa, tun inayi mata uziri har yakai ga nafara zargin wani abu, gani haka wata safiyar asabar kafin na k'arisa kasuwa na biya domin bata hakuri da fushin da dake dani
Koda naje gidan na kwashe sama da minti talatin ina zaune ina jiranta amma taki fitowa gani haka yasani mik'ewa zuwa cikin akinta,ba tare dana tsaya wani sallama ba nashige akin
Zaune na sameta a bakin gado rike da kit in sark'ok'inta tana gyarawa a ladabce na duk'a hai da fain ina kwana hjy
Ko aga ido batai ba bare ta kalleni, saida na kwashe sama da minti ashirin a duk'e sannan na aga haka nafice daga gidan jiki a sanyaye
Tun daga lokacin ban sake zuwa gidan ba, sai dai a duk lokacin danake jin gani su kubra da Zahra har school nasu nake binsu ko kuma su suzo gida,duk lokacin da sukazo konaje mukan dae muna hira
Da haka rayuwata taci gaba,"a ban garen Mus'ap kuwa tunda munirat tayi haihuwa biyu nimar matarsa yadawo fiye da ah yan'mata bai bari ba bare zawarawa,yaran da yaiwa ciki Allah kaai ne yasan iyaka
Wasu yayi accepting cikinsa ne amma za'a cire wasu kuma yace baima sansu ba"maganar k'ara kuwa nasha case in Mus'ap har nagaji batare da sani hjy ba
Sanadiyar haka nema nasan alak'ar datake tsakaninsa da Lawiza,domin mahaifinta malam Usman yasha kawomin k'aran Mus'ap"a cewarsa bayason alak'arsa da'ita, domin yarinyar tanada tarbiya duk unguwarsu da'ita ake kwatance amma suna hauwa da Mus'ap komai nata suka samu rauni yanzu haka bataji maganar kuwa idan ba tasa ba
Dan haka yake rokon Mus'ap daya fita harkan Lawiza,"Koda nasami Mus'ap nayi masa magana, a lokacin sai ya nunamin bashi ke binta ba itace ke binsa duk inda yake, dan haka adaina matsa masa da wani maganar Lawiza
Koda malam Usman yadawo hakuri kawai na basa domin bazan iya fai masa abinda Mus'ap yafai minba
Gani haka yasa malam Usman yanke shawarar aurer da Lawiza a ganisa idan tai aure shikenan babu ita babu Mus'ap
Koda Lawiza taji maganar aurenta saita funjire wa iyayenta taki yarda da hukunci da suke yanke a kanta
Gani ta watsa masa k'asa a dole yasa malam Usman bawa Lawiza za6i domin a cewarsa bazai iya cigaba da zama da'ita a gidan ba,a yanda yake mata kallo ita da karuwa babu babbanci
Hakan yasa Lawiza taza6i shiga bariki da tayiwa iyayenta biyayya,"tun daga lokacin bansake jin labarinta ba
A lokacin da cikin mugirat ya tsofa alhj Aminu ya turami india, a cewarsa anan zata haihu domin zatafi samu kulawa fiye da Nigeria
Ana gobe zamu tafi naje gidan hjy Jiddah domin sallamarta, babu irin hakuri da banbata ba amma taki tankami, nayi kukan takaici har naji babu dai,"kubra da Zahra ne kawai mukai sallama dasu, ina kuka muka rabu
Rabuwarmu kenan wanda bamu sake hauwa ba sai bayan wata uku, lokacin mugirat ta haihu baby boy yaro yaci sunar abbana wato alhj Adamu mai azurfa
Watan mugirat aya da hauhuwa muka dawo gida Nigeria, ranar wata juma'a da yamma ina dawowa daga gyaran motar alhj Aminu shine na hau da Lawiza tana tsaye a bakin titi, har nashige ta gabanta bansan ita bace sabida muyi kwana biyu bamu hau ba
Daga bayane dana tuni nadawo da baya domin aukarta sabida hadarin daya taso
Bayan tashiga mota muka gaisa, ban kai ga tambayar ina zataba kawai naga tafara mure mure ko kafin nayi yunk'urin kaita asibiti tariga ta cika
Hankalina ya tashi nayi dana sani aukarta fakawa nayi a bakin titi narasa yanda zanyi da gawarta, banfi minti goma da tsayuwa ba saiga polices suzo gun
To kaji abinda yafaru dani kenan har yasa ake tuhumata da kashe Lawiza

To kaji yanda akayi kenan
Cike da mamakin Uswap  barrister Sani alhassan yace"to meyasa tuntuni bakai bayanin haka a court ba?
Barrister kenan, kadafa ka mance irin labarin dana baka a kaina, koda nayi bayanin haka ba  lallai ne court ta amsa bayanai nin a matsayin hujja ba
Hakan yasa na rungumi aukarsa a matsayin kaddara
A'a Uswap wannan ba irin k'addarar data dace dakai bane
Ni barrister Sani Alhassan nayi maka alk'awarin binciko gaskiyar labari insha Allahu, dan haka ni zantafi sabida lokacin aka bani yak'are nan ya mik'e sukai sallama
Lawiza na barin garin Abuja kai tsaye yola ta nufa sai dai bata sauka gidan iyayenta ba sabida yarjejeniyar da taiwa mahaifinta na cewa idan tabar gidan bazata sake dawowa a matsayin yarsa ya amsheta ba tace taji kuma ta amince
Hakan yasa ta sauka a gidan k'awarta da shike itama zaman kanta takeyi yasa lawiza tayi sha'awar zama da'ita
Taso biyawa banking ta zuba kuin data aukewa alhj Umar amma datayi wani tunani kui haka masu yawan gaske dole sai suyi bincike akai, kada garin bincike azo allura ta tuno galma ta gwammaci tafiya gidan k'awar tata da kuin
Da shike lawiza mai yawoce tak'i yarda k'awar tata tasan tana auke da kui
Kwana biyu da dawowar Mus'ap labarin mutuwar lawiza ya rinkeshi, ya girgiza sosai dajin wani labarin, amma bai kawo komai a zuciyarsa ba sabida yasan hali lawiza sarai tun ba yau ba"duk da Lawiza takasance yarinyace mai k'aramin shekaru amma mai wayoce sosai da wahala kacuceta
Dan haka Mus'ap bai kawo komai a ransa ba, Allah ya jikanta kawai yace, cikin zuciyatsa kuma yace"dama barikice ta haamu tunda kin mutum shikenan
Alhj Umar shagali bai auki wani mataki ba game da kuin da lawiza taaukar masa sabida yasan a hafin hannusa take yawo
Ranar daya cika sati da dawowa Nigeria ya shirya zuwa yola, da shike jirgi yabi halan yasashi isa akan lokaci,kai tsaye gidansa ya nufa dake G
R
A bayan yai wanka ya huta falo yadawo ya zauna hannusa rike da waya bayan ya zauna ne ya binciko number aya daga cikin boy's nasa mai suna walk'iya
Gani number alhj Umar ne yasa walk'iya aga wayar da sauri yana fai yahhhhhh alhj yaushe agarin?
Dariya alhj yayi sannan yace azu na'iso
Bayan su gaisa alhj yake sanarwa walk'iya dayazo yanason ganisa
Walk'iya bai 6ata lokaci ba ya'isa gidan alhj Umar, sabida yasan baya kiran banza, muddun kaji kira aikine yatamu
Baifi minti goma ba saiga walk'iya a gidan alhj Umar, a falo yasamesa inda yake zaune zaman jiransa
Cikin gaisuwarsu irin ta yan'daba ya gaida alhj Umar, bayan su gaisa ne yake sheda masa irin aikin da yakeso yai masa
Pict in Lawiza ya mik'awa walk'iya hai da fain ita nakeso kanimomin  ko'a mance ko'araye, idan kasan bazaka iyaba inaso kanimomin wanda zasu'iya kui ba matsalata bace
Dariya kawai walk'iya yai hai da cewa"wannan mai sauk'ine alhj
One one thousand note alhj ya auki bandir insa yamik'awa walk'iya hai da cewa gashi asha kodi
Cikin kaukausar murya walk'iya ya amshi kuin hai da godiya sannan sukai sallama
A 6an garen lawiza kuma gani har takai sati biyu babu wani alama yasata siyan sabuwar mota gal,wacce bazatafi two million ba domin hawa tana gararinta a gari
Dama matsalarta ayace shine alhj Umar tunda ta'iso garin yola bai nimetaba yasa ta auka ko komawa yayi Dubai, dan haka take shagalinta a gari yanda takeso
Gani lubna na nemar matsa mata da binciken inda tasamu kui haka yasata cewa alhj Umar ne yabata kuin tun suna Dubai
Tun daga lokacin lubna bata sake tambayarta ba, rayuwarsu kawai suke zubawa yanda sukeso babu mai kwa6a masu
Tun bayan rabuwar Barrister Sani Alhassan da Uswap ya zurfafa bincike akan mutuwar lawiza
Duk yanda yakai ga bincike bai gano komai ba har ranar da zasu sake hauwa a court, bayan duk su hallara harda shi kansa Uswap in da kuma alhj Aminu mahaifin mugirat da ita kanta mugirat in sai wasu daga cikin k'annin baban Uswap dasukazo a wannan karon
Alkali na shigowa duk suka mik'e  basu zauna har  saida ya zauna sannan suma suka zauna, bayan kowa ya zauna ne alkali yai abinda zaiyi sannan yameda dubansa ga barrister Sani alhassan, bayan barrister yasake gabatar da kansa a gaban alkali sannan alkali yai tambaya akan bincike dayakeyi ko yasamu gaskiyar lamari
Gani yaune rana ta k'arshen tika-tika tik yasa barrister Sani alhassan cewa eh yasamo
Bayan alkali ya umarci barrister daya kawo shedun dayasamo  sai barrister Sani alhassan yace, ba kowa bane illa Mus'ap domin yanada hannu a kisar lawiza
Lawiza buduwar Mus'ap ne batun yanzu ba asalima sanadiyarsa tabar gidan iyayenta ta koma hannunsa da zama, wanda suke yawon duniya k'asa k'asa babu shakka akwai wani abinda ya hausu wanda yaga idan ba kasheta yaiba bazai huce ba
Barrister Sani alhassan ya dae yanayiwa alkali bayanan k'arya wanda shi kansa yasan ba gaskiya bane domin baida tabbacin Mus'ap ne yai kisan
Saida barrister yak'are bayani da zaiyi sannan alkali ya umarci da aje a kamo Mus'ap in,a ijesa a gidan kaso har zuwa ranar da za'a sake hauwa
Shikuma Uswap shima medashi za'a har zuwa ranar da gaskiya zata baiyana
Ranar da akaje kamo Mus'ap hjy Jiddah tahana polices sutafi dashi, a cewarta saidai a haa da'ita a kama domin Mus'ap bazai iya aikata abinda ake zarginsa dashiba
Sharrine kawai irin ta Uswap, dan haka babu inda za'a tafi mata da yaro
Su Surayya da Sumayya babu abinda sukeyi illa kuka, kubra da Zahra dake tsaye suma kukan sukeyi
Ita kuwa munirat ko gezau, sabida dama tagaji da halinsa na neman matan banza dayakeyi
Gani zata 6ata masu lokaci aya daga cikin polices  dasukazo kama Mus'ap yace ya yarda aje da'ita in, tunda ta amince da haka suma su amince
Haka yasa aka kwashesu gaba aya aka unguma a motor polices, Mus'ap dake zaune a motar polices shiru kawai yayi sabida yasan bashida mafita a mutuwar lawiza, domin tunba yanzu ba yasha idan yaganta da wani yarink'a furucin saiya kasheta saiyaga bayanta,shikansa ya mance yana fain haka idan ba yauba
Koda aka isa station babu irin maganar da polices basuyiwa hjy Jiddah ba amma takasa fahimtarsu ole yasa suka haa da'ita suka rufe, amma side in mata aka kaita
Gidan kuwa babu abinda sukeyi illa kuka,hjy Jiddah batasan Allah aya bane saida dare yayi gani yanda uban sauro suke kururuwa a kunnita ga uban zaurin fitsiri dake akin babu gurin kwanciya a lokacine tafara nadamar rashin jin maganar polices in sukai mata
Tun cikin daren take rokon da subue mata tatafi gida amma sukak'i a cewarsu sai anzo anyi ballinta sannan kuma sai ogansu yazo da safe
Tun hjy na aurewa har saida yakai ga tasa masu kuka, domin tunda take a rayuwarta bata ta6a shiga cikin masifa irin haka ba sai a wannan lokacin
Da safe bayan D
P
O yazo tun kafin ya k'arisa ciki office insa yake jiyo  muryan hjy Jiddah ya taresa, da shike yariga yasan da maganar yasashi tambayar polices in meke faruwa?
Nan sukai masa bayani take a gun yace suje su bueta
Jikin hjy Jiddah har rawa yakeyi da aka bueta batare data tsaya aukar takalminta ba tafice daga cikin station in kai tsaye bakin titi tanufa domin niman motar da zaikaita gida

Hjy Jiddah na isa gida kai tsaye toilet tanufa domin yin wanka,"lokacin su Kubra suna akinsu basuji shigowarta ba
Bayan ta k'are wankane ta fito bayan tasa kaya sannan ta auko paracetamol tasha sannan tasamu bakin kwaawasu Kubra kira
Jin muryanta yasasu zowa a guje hai da fain yaushe kika shigo gidan hjy?
Batare data basu amasar tambayarsu ba tace"ibomin abimci naci
Zahra ce tamik'e taje kitchen taibowa hjy abinci,bayan hjy taci ta koshine sannan take cewa Kubra taauko wayarta idan ta kui a ciki takira mata k'anin babansu
Koda Kubra takira baba Lauwali bai aga kiran Kubra ba, sabida duk abinda ke faruwa sunada labari, hakan yasa suka yanke shawara a tsakaninsu da cewa babu wanda zaisa baki a maganar
Tunda marigayi yarasu bata nimesuba sai yanzu da wahala yazo?dan haka babu wanda zaisa baki, ai dama tun farko abinda suke dubawa kenan yasa sukaso amsar yaran amma hjy tai furrrrrrr tak'i sai yanzu da Mus'ap yaje yai kashinkai shine za'a nimesu
Gani anyi k'ira har sau biyar basu adaba yasa hjy Jiddah cewa Kubra tabari kawai idan tahuta zata bisu har gida
Tunda hjy Jiddah takwanta bata tashiba sai bayan la'asar sannan tatashi, gani yamma yayi ba lallai bane idan taje gida tasamesu yasata yanke shawarar bari gobe da safe
Washe gari da sassafe tafita daga gida tun kafin sufita kasuwa tasamesu, da shike family hause ne dukkansu suka hallara, bayan su gaigaisa hjy take sanar masu abinda ke faruwa, harda an gutun hawayenta
Duk mutanen dake zaune agun babu wanda yanuna yaji labarin abinda kefaru, dukkansu suka haa baki suka jajanta mata sannan aya daga cikinsu an autan gidan yake tambayarta yanzu meye abinyi?
Cikin kuka hjy Jiddah ke magana" shi isa nazo gunku domin dai kufi kowa sanin Mus'ap baida wanda suka fiku duniya da lahira, hakan yasa nazo domin yin shawarar yanda za'ayi
Baba Lauwali yace"gaskiya ne (al'barkaci kaza k'aangare kanshi ruwan kaske) musamman ma idan mukai duba da yanda marigayi dake kuka rikemu bisa gaskiya da amana, dama baka sani mutum yanada rana sai irin hakan yataso, yanzu abinda za'a kibar mana komai a hannunmu bi'izinalahi  komai zaizo da sauk'i
Jin haka yasa hjy Jiddah harda duk'awarta tana masu godiya sannan sukai sallama
Duk da maganar dasukai da yan'uwan baban Mus'ap amma hjy Jiddah tak'i yarda da maganarsu sabida tasan basu gyara yau sabida gobe ba, kai tsaye  gidan hjy Bilkisu tanufa (mmn Munirat kenan) jiki a sanyaye tai sallama
Lokacin hjy Bilkisu na zaune a falo tana kallon wani shiri da akeyi a Zeeworld mai suna mehek jin sallamar hjy Jiddah ne yasata katse kallon datakeyi
Da fara'arta ta'amshi hjy Jiddah tak'ariso daga cikin falon, kallo aya taiwa hjy Jiddah tasan akwai damuwa, koda shike ba damuwar kowa bane illa Mus'ap da'aka kama
A fili kuwa matsewa tai sannan suka gaisa bayan su gaisa ne hjy Bilkisu take jajantawa hjy Jiddah,sun jima suna magana sannan hjy Jiddah take tambayar hjy Bilkisu ko tasan wani lauya taaata dashi
Har zatace a'a data tuno dawani abu k'uma da sauri tace eh, akwai wani ana cemasa barrister Bashir mai nasawa shine ya taimakami lokacin da alhj miji yarasu wajan k'awato dukiyarsa daga hannu yan'uwansa yayinda sukaso haddame mana abinda yabari
K'uma wlhy barrister Bashir mai nasana mutum ne mai k'wazo da sani yakamata
Amma a gaskiya aikinsa akwai tsada,in har zaki saki kui bi'izinalahi zakiga biyan buk'ata
Jin haka yasa hjy Jiddah tace taji k'uma ta amince, konawane in har buk'ata zata biya bawani abu bane
Murmushi hjy Bilkisu tai mai auke da alamar tambaya

Tun daga lokacin da alhj Umar shagali yabawa wal'kiya pict in lawiza yashiga gari nimanta
Rashin sani dayafi dare duhu, tun bayan siyan motar da lawiza tai tatsiri fita gun shak'atawa waje-waje na hutawa babu inda bata zuwa ita da lubna
Da shike yau juma'ane yasa sukai shigar larabawa, dukkansu dogayen riga sukasa bak'i sai an k'aramin mayafi da suka nae kansu dashi

Da fara'arta ta amshesa hai da cewa sannu da zuwa, gun zama tabashi, bayan su gaisa da hjy sannan suka gaisa dasu Zahra dukkansu suka mik'e zuwa ciki,"baifi ten minute da shigarsu ciki ba saiga Zahra tadawo hannu rik'e da glass cup hai da goran swan gaban barrister ta'ije sannan tasake komawa

himm barrister ninasan waye hjy Jiddah dan haka wannan kuin danace mu amsa ba komai bane a gunta

Kamar yaya barrister?
Share nake magana akai

Hakane, to yanzu me kake gani za'ayi?

Idan aka raba kuin gida uku ninadauki biyu kai kuma nabaka aya kana gani yayi?
Hjy kenan kema kisan abinda bazai yubane
Kamar yaya?
Tayaya za'ayi haka?, nida zanyi aikin na auki kashi aya keda kike zaune kiauki kashi biyu
Nanfa sukai tayi kamar bazasu daidaita ba, har barrister yamik'e da niyyar tafiya da sauri hjy tadawo dashi suka daidaita akan zata bashi million uku ita kuma taauki biyu tace ta amince
Bayan tafiyarsa ne hjy Bilkisu takira hjy Jaddah tasanar mata duk yanda sukai da barrister

Maganar kuin mana

Million uku idan yaso daga baya saiki cikasa masa

*page:2*            Sr Usman yana barin gidan mu kai tsaye majalisar da bbna ke zama ya nufa, da sallama ya karisa gun da suke zaune, har kasa ya duka ya gaidasu,bayan su gaisa yake sanarwa babana gunsa yazo
Hakan yasa babana tashi daga inda yake zaune, suka koma gefe
Bayan su sake gaisawa Sr Usman yake sanar dashi abinda yake tafe dashi"cikin ji dai babana ya amshi mgnr Sr Usman, sai dai a cewarsa yanada buri a kanmu"
Tun muna yara nida kanwata basira yake mana kwaayin samun karatu boko dana addini mai zurfi, domin ilimi shine garkuwan an Adam
Malam Haruna, wato mahaifina kenan bai boye wa Sr Usman komai angane dani ba,"Sr Usman yace babu komai, boz shima yana sha'awar mace mai ilimi kodan tarbiyan yara
Amma dan Allah yana babana zai amince masa yanaso ya bashi aurena, idan yaso bayan aure sai naci gaba da karatu, a cewar Sr Usman aure baya hana karatu
Malam Haruna yaso doje wa Sr Usman, amma Sr Usman yaki, domin tsayawa duk inda babana ya bulo masa Sr Usman dojewa yakeyi, da haka har Sr Usman yaci galaban babana ya amince
Malam Haruna yana barin gun kai tsaye gida ya nufa, bai boye wa ummata komai ba, duk yadda sukai da Sr Usman saida malam Haruna ya fai wa ummata
Sai da malam Haruna ya kare mgn snn ummata tace bata amince ba, sbd me yarinya na cikin karatunta za'a tugeta ace za'ai mata aure, haka kawai karatunta yazo ya tsaya a hanya, balle ma mazan yanzu marasa alkawari
A'a wlhy idan har nice na haifi Nafisat ban yarda ayi mata aure ba
Yarinya da iliminta azo a kawp mata nakasu a karatu
Haba Lami wani irin mgn kikeyi haka Auren shine zai haka Nafisat karatu? Ni a tawa gani aure baya hana karatu sai dai idan bataso yiba
Nan dai Lami da malam Haruna sukai ta fafatawa har taci galabansa, duk da Lami taci galaban malam Haruna amma bata bar mgnr a nan ba, saida takai ga yan'uwan malam Haruna in ta shirya masu karya da gaskiya, suma suka amince
Tun daga lkcn da Sr Usman sukai mfn da malam Haruna yake zuwa hira, tun ummata na bari na fita har yakai ga bata bari na fita, idan yazo sai yafi awo a kofar gidan mu amma ummata bata bari na fita na gansa ba
Gani haka yasa Sr Usman yaje har kauyenmu ya sanar wa kakana alhj Mato, dake zaune a cikin kauyen garin malam, dake jahar nija,undar shadai local govt
Bayan Sr Usman ya sanar wa Mato abinda ke tafe dashi, da shike Kaka Mato bashi da hakida irin na babana hakan yasa shi tun a gun yace ya mallaka wa Sr Usman aure, idan har ba'ai wnn auren ba,mutuwa yai kafin lkcn
Nan kaka Mato yace wa Sr Usman yaje ya turo magabatansa,"Cikin oki da murna Sr Usman yabar gun Kaka Mato, bayan ya dawo gida ya sanar wa yan'uwansa yadda sukai da kaka mato
Da shike a shirye yake, su kuma yan'uwan nasa abinda suma suke ta jira kenan, sbd daewar da yai bai yi aure ba
Take suka shirya zuwa garin malam, kanin mahaifin Sr Usman da yayan mahaifinsa ne sukaje gun Kaka Mato, dama kafin su koma saida kaka Mato yasa akai masa bincike akan Sr Usman, da ahalinsa, kuma alhamllh
Hakan yasa ba'a bata lkc ba suna isa bayan su gaisa hai hirarraki irin tasu ta manyan jiya
Snn mato ya bawa Sr Usman aure na, bisa sadaki naira dubu arba'in
Duk hakan ya kasance ne batare da sani naba, ko iyayena, kwatsam muna zaune bayan la'asar sai muka jiyo sallamar inna haule, cikin oki da murna muka tarbeta, bayan su shiga ciki, naje muka gaisa hai da kai mata ruwa da abimci
Bayan su gaisa da ummata ne take sanar mata da mgnr aurena da Sr Usman
Ummata tayi salati ta sanar wa ubangiji, cikin rawan jiki ummata ta kira babana, yanayin da ummata tai yasa babana saurin barin inda yake zaune yayo gida
Gani inna haule yasa babana kara faaa faranarsa, cikin jin dai ya karisa inda take zaune, bayan ya zauna suka gaisa, nan inna haule take sanar masa mgnr aurena da Sr Usman
Duk da babana da ummata basuji dain hakan ba amma babu yadda zasuyi, sbd bin nagaba bin Allah, musamman ma mahaifa
Kamar yadda Mato yace haka akai, a ranar na kwana a gidan mujina, kafin sati su babana da ummata suka haa min duk wani abinda iyaye kewa yar'sa, dai-dai gwargwado,kasancewar ummata tariga ta tusamin kin Sr Usman yasa shi kasa gane kaina
Cikin lalashi da dabara Sr Usman ya shawo kaina, bai bari naci gaba da zuwa school ba saida yaga na fara laulayi, kullum cikin bcc gashi duk abinda naci baya zama snn ta koma school
Idan ranar da yake da lecture ne, tare muke zuwa, ranar kuma ba bashi dashi, kuin napep yake bani na tafiya dana dawowa
Bayan kwana biyu yace na shirya ya rakani gida naje na gaida iyayena, nayi murna ba kaan ba
Cikin oki da rawar jiki na shirya, saida muka biya yai masi siyayya, su sabulai dasu klin snn muka karisa gidan, muna shiga, har kasa ya duka ya gaida su ummata da babana, babu yabo babu fallasa suka amsa masu, kallo aya ummata tai min ta gano ina auke ta ci
Sr Usman dake duke jikin shi ba karami mutuwa yai ba, abinda yanayin amshi da su ummata sukai masa, snn kuma tunda suka gaisa babu wanda ya kara bi ta kansa
Gani haka yasa shi mikeyi hai da cewa ni natafi, amma ita zata zaune sai yamma snn ta dawo,"bue bakin ummata tace Nafisat"
Da sauri nace na'am ummata"
Tashi kije, hakan ma mu gode
Yadda ummata ke mgn yasa na gano, akwai wani abu a zcuyrta, babu yadda zaiyi dole yasa na mike nabi mijina zuwa gida
Tun daga lkcn Usman bai sake bari naje gida gun iyayena ba, har saida na haihu, a lkcn ina 2level,Allah ya azurtani da baby boy, ba karamin murna Usman yai ba, cikin oki yaje gidan mu ya sanar wa su ummata
Murna sosae ummata tai, take ta kira gida garin malam ta sanar masu, ranar suna yaro yaci suna Abdul-basik
Babu yadda ummata baitai ba aka na koma gida nayi wanka,amma Usman yaki amince wa, dole yasa ta hakuri
Da haka rayuwa yafi gaba da tafiya,babana yai kokari sosae, duk da kasancewarsa mai karamin karfi ne,amma haka yake kukutawa ya biya min kuin registration, kafin na kare school sai da nayi haihuwa uku, abinda duk shekara nake haihu
A lokcin basira nada shekara takwas a duniya
Bayan kare school inane, gani shidima yai wa Usman yawa, kuin da school suke biyansa baya daukar nawinmu sbd ba Thorough govt yake aiki ba" yasa na yanke shawaran niman aiki, koda teaching ne, cikin ikon Allah nasamu a wani school amma prvt
Kullum idan zani aiki, gidan su ummata nake kai yara,Abdul-basik Hafiz ita kuma nadiya da ita muke zuwa sbd ta kasance mai rikici ce
Bayan na yaye nadiya na sake samu wani ciki, mukai shawara da Usman akan sanya yara a school, hakan yasa naje na sami headmistress in school inmu na sanar mata,nan tayi na'am da mgnta, duka yaran na sanya, kuin mutum biyu nake biya aya kuma kyauta

*page3*
Da haka rayuwa aci gaba nida Usman, Allah ma rufin asirin bawansa, yara kuma suna karatunsu yadda ya kamata, snn kuma suna fahimta dai-dai gwargwado
"Cikina na wata shidda Allah ya jarabceni da cikin hawan jini, Tunda naje intinatal suka sanar dani, na shiga tashin hankali sosae, wani komawar da nayi, suka bani bedrest, abubuwa suka hau suka jagula mana, gani haka yasa babana ya aika gidanmu aka kwaso yara suka dawo gidan mu
"Ummata kuma ita ke kwana dani a asibiti, idan safe yai ta koma gida, zuwa rana kuma ta kamo asibiti, sbd bamuda kowa a garin, daga ni sai babana da ummata, duk yan uwanmu suna kauye, yan uwan Usman kuma muna tare dasu a cikin garin minna, da shike bamai hali bane yasa ko a dangi ba'a lissafi damu

*_________1* Tafiya take cikin sauri ga hadari yataso sai faman cida yakeyi, gani haka yasa Rukayya dake rike da bak'in leda a hannu cewa na shiga uku
Gani iska yataso gaan-gadan yasa Rukayya fara sauri hai da gudu, kamar wacce zata tashi sama, kafin takai gida ruwan sama ya6anlo
Gani haka yasata samu gefe aya tara6a tana jiran aukewar ruwa, ko kafin tak'atosa inda zata ra6e tuni kayan dake jikinta yajike sharaf,da haka tak'arisa gun tatsaya
Bata jima da tsayuwa ba wasu gun yacika da jama'a domin fakewar ruwa,anjima ana ruwan babu k'afk'aftawa
Rukayya dake tsaye jitakeyi kamar dada hali tatsaida ruwan sabida tasamu ta k'arisa gida gudan abinda zata taris a chan gidan
A 6angaren inna shatu kuwa tana kwance bisa gado ita da yar'lelenta wato Meenal kenan, himm kawai inna shatu tace"meenal dake kwance kusa da innarta tace"inna yayane?
Babu komai illa al'amarin yarinyar nan mana,"wa kenan inna?
Yawuci Rukayya!!
Rukayya kuma?!!
Eh mana,"ni dama tun farko bansan abinda yasa kika aukota ba, ki dubafa sabida Allah duk irin awainiya da wahalan da kikeyi akanta ba'a gani, anan gidan daddy yayi maki waje suma suyi maki kuma duk akan Rukayya
Amina kenan, nima kaina babu yanda zanyine idan ban dauki Rukayya ba duniya zata zageni,sannan kuma idan nayi duba da zamucin dake tsakanina da yaya dan na auki Rukayya riko ba wani abu bane
Inna kenan, idan akai magana saikice yaya-yaya to yanzu ina yayan naki yake,keda kike wannan maganar wlhy inna nayi imani inda kece kika mutu ko kallonmu yayan naki bazaiyi ba bare ya aukemu
Amina kenan,to ai baka daka tamutum, nidai duk abinda zanyi zanyishine sabida Allah
Rukayya dake cha gani ruwan ya tsagaita yasa takamo hanyar zuwa gida,tana tafe tana rawar sanyi sabida kayan dake jikinta su jik'e sharrrkaf da ruwa
Jiki a sanyaye ta k'arisa gida, da sallama tashiga
rukayya tai sallama har baki uku amma babu wanda ya'amsa daga inna har meenal in dake kwance

Tunda inna tafara dukan Rukayya bata bariba, kuka agun Rukayya kuwa tayishi har taji babu dai
"meenal na kwance sai faman juyi takeyi agado
Suna cikin haka kenan saiga alhj yai Sallama, gani irin aika-aikar da inna keyi yasa alhj auketa da mari hai da fusgo Rukayya dake kwance tana kuka
"Sannan yaci gaba da cewa muguwa azaluma wacce batasan darajan zumuci ba
Babu ko kunya bare tsoro inna tace"eh'in-eh'in bansan darajan zumucin ba,yar an'uwankane ko nawa?
Shatu nikike faiwa haka?
Nafai in, banasha fai maka duk abinda zanyiwa Rukayya kada kasami baki ba?
Cikin fushi yace baki isaba wlhy, kinyi kaan,kuma ina mai tabbatar maki duk abinda kika shuka saikin girbeshi tu a duniya sai Allah ya nuna maki illar zaluntar maraya, muguwa kawai kuma daga yau sai yau doka nasaka a gidan duk wanda yak'ara dora hannu dasunan zai daki Rukayya wlhy sai inda k'arfina yak'are kowaye shi kuwa
Sannan ya juya ga Rukayya dake tsaye tana kuka yace"kiyi hakuri rayuwace, wataran sai labari, insha Allahu wataran kece maibawa wasu labari kin jiko?

sannan maganar duka yanzu nafara domin bazan zuba mata ido ta lalace ba,idan ta lalace nice za'a zaga amatsayina na k'anwar mahaifinta bakai ba

kina gani sanadiyar auren uwarta da yayana yai ya tsiyace,kafin yamutu saida komai nasa yak'are

Mu'azam kafin kowa sani wayeni, da farko naso Amina tayi karatun boko mai zurfi amma a yanda naga yanayinta da kuma rashin maida kai da batayi a karatu yasani yanke shawarar tana zana jarabawa zata fito da miji nayi mata aure kawai na huta da gani abin takaici
Ita Rukayya dana lura tanada ra'ayin karatu insha Allahu zan taimaka mata har sai inda k'arfina ya k'are,bodan mahaifinta malam Abdullahi
Shi kuma an uwarku wato Sani, tunda yanda yameda kansa kenan bazanyi masa bakiba, amma inaso kasani sisi na bazaiyi ciwon kai akansa ba
Allah yagani nayi iya kok'arina akansa dan haka yanzu bazan kashe kaina sabida shiba
Jin hakan yasa jikin Mu'azam sanyi,hakuri kawai yakebawa daddy nasu
"alhj yaci gaba da cewa Sani tun yana an shekara biyu nake awainiyar karatunsa, yarasa irin sakayyar da zaimin saibin yaran banza, suna tafiya yawon shaye-shayen banza da wofi, sabida Allah kaduba irin yaran dayake yawo dasu fa?
Gani yanda ran daddy ya6aci ainu yasa su Mu'azam da Rukayya bawa daddy hakuri daya yafewa Sani
Murmushi kawai daddy yai wanda yafi kuka k'una hai da cewa babu komai duk abinda mutum yayi imma mai'kyau ko mumuna shine zai girbi kayansa, nidai nayi iya yina akansa, sabida haka kutashi kuje ni zankwance na mi'ke
Tare suka haa baki hai da mik'awa,suna tafe suna mai jujuyai al'amarin yayansu Sani, kullum aita magana aya amma baisa ya canza ba, abu tun ba'a ganeba har takai duk yan'uwan da suka su gano halinsa, yanzu haka duk wanda yaga ansa dashi faa sukewa "ya"yansu Sabida basuson alak'arsu da Sani a cewarsu idan suna mu'amala da Sani da haka zasu koyi irin abinda yakeyi na rashin kirki hakan yasa kowa kewa insa k'iyamallaini da Sani amma baisa ya hankaltaba
Rukayya zata shige akinsu kenan inna shatu ta kwaa mata kira, hai da cewa zonan
" Rukayya na zuwa inna tace"dan uwarki kije ki dora mana abincin yamma
Ba tare da tace uffan ba tajuya zuwa kitchen domin ora sanwar,dama duk ranar da zusuyi tuwo a murhu suka abinci, ko kuma suyi miya a risho tuwo kuma a icce
Tunda Rukayya tashiga kitchen take fama da icce yak'i kamawa sabida jikewar da yai
Tun k'arfe hudu take fama da huta bashine da kamawa ba sai bayan biyar, hakan yasa bata k'are girki ba sai bayan isha, sabida tuwon shikafa ne
Duk a lokacin meenal na akin inna kwance tana faman buga game a wayarta, wanda wani saurayinta yabata, inna tace tabuye kada tabari kowa yasani domin idan alhj ko yaya Mu'azam yagani kwacewa zasuyi sannan ya haa mata da duka, shiko Sani kodama ya amshe ba wata uwar zaiyi da itaba illa siyarwa domin samu na 6araswa
Ko sallar Rukayya bata samu tayi ba sabida idan ta kauce agun hutar mutuwa ne hutar zaiyi
Da haka har tasamu tak'are babu sallar la'asar bare magrib da isha
Bayan ya nunane takwashe, Rukayya na k'are kwashe tuwo cikin kwanuka ragowar kuma cikin wani rover tazuba domin bayanzu za'aci wannan ba sai gobe da sabe za'a zazafa shi a karya dashi
Bayan ta k'are kwashe na kwanuka takawo aki kitchen takoma domin auko wanda yake cikin rover ko kafin tadawo a guje meenal tafita taje tsakar gida ta ibo k'asa duk ta barbaa akaman tuwon sannan takoma ta kwance kamar ba'itace tai ba
Dayake akwai tazara akani akunan gidan da kitchen hakan yasa har inna tashigo Rukayya bata dawoba, tana shiga akin kataf idonta yayi arba da tuwon
Wani irin uwar salati tai kamar wacce akaiwa mutuwa,jin haka yasa Rukayya zuwa a guje domin gani abinda inna kewa salatin
Aiko tun kafin tasawo kanta cikin akin inna takai mata gwamza wanda hakan yai sanadiyar fauwar tukuyar miyar dake hannunta a k'afarta
Meenal na kwance tana kallonsu, kota motsa, tankar batagun
A gigice Rukayya tasa ihu tana fain wayyo Allah na, k'afata k'afata inna
"Aiko innar da ake kira batasan Rukayya nayiba, duka kawai take mata hai da cewa shegiya matsiyaci yar Allah ya tsine wacce bata gaji arziki ba,mai k'ashin mundirik'i irin ta uwarta

*_________2* Ihu kawai Rukayya keyi babu sassauci hai da kiran k'afarta,"gani tana niman tara mata jama'a bata samu tayi mai isarta ba yasa inna shatu sanya k'afarta tamurjewa Rukayya tata k'afar hai da cewa domina k'afar ta sal6e badamuwa bace
Aiko take k'afar da inna shatu zatai fatar k'afar yasalu6e,duk da haka baisa inna shatu ta k'yaleta ba
Jin ihu yayi yawa yasa Sani fitawa daga akinsa yana tafe yana marisa a daddafe yak'ariso gun dasu innar suke,cikin yanayi irin tasu ta "ya'k'waya yake magana
Ke dallah kisaketa, nifa banason cinzali irin taki da rashin imani da kika iya, yanzu meye wannan yarinyar tai makine inna?
Gani inna batada niyyar k'yale Rukayya yasa Sani mangarowa yana kok'arin k'watota, kaan yarage yafai mata a jiki da sauri inna tasaki Rukayyar datake duk
A guje Rukayya tamik'e daga inda ta fai tanufi k'ofar gida, gani tayi hanyar wajene yasa inna cewa" kije duk gidan ubanda zaki idanma fai masa zakiyi domin yazo yarama maki bismillah ina jiranku
Sani dake kwance da rarrafe ya dafa abu yamik'e zuwa k'ofar gida
Inna taci gaba da cewa kuma wlhy kwashe maki dai-dai inda kika zuba k'asar na ije maki, duk inda zaki kije ki dawo saikin cinshi, idan ma kinyi haka sabida k'etane kece zaici
k'ofar gida Rukayya taje ta zauna bata dawo cikin gidan ba har sai lokacin da Mu'azam yadawo daga inda yaje,"gani Rukayya zaune a k'ofar gida yasa Mu'azam cewa Rukayya lafiya? Meya sameki?
Da shike wajan akwai duhu yasa Mu'azam ciro wayarsa daga aljihu ya kunna touch, haskawar da zaiyi karaf sai k'afar Rukayya
A gigice yace"wht?????subhanalilahi Rukayya garin yaya kika k'one?
Jin haka yasa Rukayya fashewa da wani sabon kuka, cikin kukan takwashe komai tasanar masa

Allah yasa mudace*
Har aki Mu'azam yakai Rukayya sannan gani duk a lokacin bata daina k'walla ba har zai fita sai kuma yasamu gu yazauna kusa da'ita, hai da kiran sunanta Rukayya!!!
Chan k'asa da murya ta amsa ba lallane ma Mu'azam yaji ba
A kullum bazan gaji da bak'i hakuri akan halin inna ba, nasan idan da sabo kin saba, amma da shike ba'a sabo da wiya dan haka a yauma zank'ara baki hakuri dan Allah dan annabi kiyi hakuri, insha Allahu wataran sai labari
Kuma daga yau duk abinda kike buk'ata ki faimin insha Allahu zansiye maki, in har baifi k'arfina ba

K'amaruden ya kwanta ne koya samu barci amma barci ya gagara ko kafin asuba yayi gada aya K'amaruden yarice baisan inda yake ba, gashi shi kaaine a side insa bare yasamu mataimaki
Haka yake kwance har safiya yai, gani har k'arfe takwas yayi K'amaruden bai shigo 6angaren iyayensa ba domin gaidasu kamar yanda yasaba, yasa babansa tambayar Hulera lafiya kuwa yau K'amaruden bai shigo gaidasu ba
A lokacin ne iya ta falka da haka, domin gaba aya tamance da cewa yau baishi gaidasu ba, da sauri tamik'e daga inda take zaune tana yayyanka kamu, nan tabar yara masu siye tanufi side in K'amaruden

Tana shiga a falo tatsaya tana kwaawa K'amaruden kira, dama haka abi'ar iya yake bata damu datayi sallama ba, idan ma har zatai gafararku kawai take cewa amatsayin sallama

Dan ma bamai jiki sosai bace, Rukayya ta k'are secondry a lokacin tanada shekara goma sha shida da yan'watan da yake tanada an tsayi yasa ake gani kamar tafi haka
Samari kuwa sai faman tururuwan zuwa gunta sukeyi,gani haka yasa K'amaruden tada maganar aure, dub da ba shiryawa yai ba amma tsoro yake yanda idonta yafara buewa kada nan gaba tace batayi dashi, yanzu inma yaya aka take sauraransa bare nan gaba
Danma batada yanda zatai da shine yasa har idan yazo take saurarensa bare kuma nan gaba
Kyautatawa iya kyatatawa K'amaruden yanayi mata amma duk besaba ba
Baza'ace an baya kyautata mata bane yasa bata sonshi, sai dai dayake shi so gamo jinine, inba so gamo jini ba koan hidimar da K'amaruden kewa Rukayya yaci ace yasamu karbuwa a zuciyarta
K'amaruden bai tari iya da maganar Rukayya ba saida yaje ya sanarwa yaya Bala, sannan ya fai masa gaskiya in har basu goya masa baya wajan nemo masa auran Rukayya za'iya rasa ransa

Kenan k'arya nakeyi
A'a iya kiyi hakuri ni bance haka ba
To idan har nice na haifi K'amaruden ban yarda ba kuma ban amince daya auri Rukayya ba,in har yanace saiya aureta babu ni babu shi
Jin haka yasa hankalin K'amaruden tashi, harya bue baki zaiyi magana da sauri yaya Bala ya taresa hai da kamo masa hannu suka fita sukabar iya na faman masifarta data saba
Suna fita akin baffa suka nufa, lokacin baffa na zaune da sallama suka shiga akin
Baffa dake zaune ya amsa masu hai da cewa bismillih
Duk suka shiga, gefe guda suka samu suka zauna bayan su zauna ne, duk suka haa baki suka gaishesa, sannan yaya Bala yace baffa gunka mukazo da wata magana amma ban san yanda kaima zaka auki maganar ba

Baffa yaji dai sosai albarka yasa masu dukkansu su biyu sannan yace babu damuwa,subar maganar a hannusa
K'amaruden yaji dain yanda baffa ya amshi maganar
Kafin sati aya har su shirya shida daddy da Mu'azam zasu raka baffa *WURO SANDEY* nimowa K'amaruden auren Rukayya batare da sani inna ko iya ba
Da haka suka shirya tafiyarsu daddy yacewa inna zaije gani gida shida Mu'azam, sabida suyi kwana biyu basuje gida ba
Shima baffa yaiwa iya k'arya zai raka wani abokinsa *JALINGO* jin baffa yace zaije jalingo yasa iya cewa yakawo mata tsaraban nono da man shanu
Washe gari suna idar da sallar asuba suka auki hanya, da yake K'amaruden yariga ya nemo masu shatan motar da zaikaisu har jalingo kuma ya dawo dasu, komai ya dank'awa Mu'azam a hannunsa
Tunda suka auki hanya basu tsaya ko'ina ba sai a jalingo, saida suka tsaya sukai sallah sannan suka k'arisa cikin k'auyen sandey
A gidan su alhj Haruna suka sauka, basu k'arisa gidan angin baban Rukayya ba sai washe gari
Washe gari bayan su k'aya aya daga cikin k'ani alhj haruna yakarasu har gidan su iya nemawa K'amaruden auren Rukayya
Cikin ikon Allah basusha wani wahala ba, aka bawa K'amaruden auren Rukayya, musamman ma da akaga alhj Haruna ne jagoran tafiyar,yasa suka amince
Sabida susan halin alhj Haruna mutumin k'arkine ga sani yakama,nan suka ank'a komai a hannunsa hatta aurin auren su amince daya aurawa Rukayya aure achan inda yake da zama
Daga alhj Haruna har baffa suji dain haka sosai, washe gari suka juyokai suka dawo gwagwalada inda suke da zama a yanzu
Mu'azam shine mutum farko daya fara sanarwa K'amaruden
Sabida murna har saida K'amaruden yaiwa ubangiji sundaja batare da alwala ba hai da kabbara yana mik'a godiyarsa ga Allahu maaukakin sarki
A ban garen Rukayya kuwa daddy da kansa ya sanar da'ita hai da cewa duk abinda ake ciki kada tabari inna tasan da maganar auren
A lokacin Rukayya batayi kuka ba,saida takoma akinsu tafara kuka, kusan kwana Rukayya tai tana kuka
Tun daga lokacin Rukayya tashiga cikin damuwa, babu irin rarrashin da hakurin da Mu'azam bai bataba amma tak'i hakura
A 6angare K'amaruden kuwa shirye shirye yake babu kama hannu yaro, satinsu aya da dawowa suka zauna sukai shawara tsakani Daddy da Mu'azam sannan suka buk'aci baffa yazo, tare suka zauna sukai yanke rana nanda sati uku mai zuwa
A cewarsu bazasu yanke lokaci mai tsayi ba sabida kada wani abu yazo ya gibta, haka yasa suka yanke nanda sati uku
Jin anyanke masu rana yasa Rukayya k'ara shiga matsananci damuwa, kwata-kwata tadaina kula K'amaruden, koda yazo bataso fita, daga shi har yaya Mu'azam suyi mata magana su gaji amma bata chanza ba, gani haka yasa ran Mu'azam 6aci da kansa yacewa K'amaruden yayi hakuri ya daina zuwa gidan yaje yaci gaba da shirinsa aurene dai babu fashi

Shiruuu meenal tai bata tanka inna dake maganar ba
Kafin saki aya meenal ta warware ta koma kamar ba ita aka cirewa ciki ba, duk da dama ba girma yai ba five weeks to six ne
"haka yasa suka shirya da taimako inna wajan k'arfafawa meenal guiwa kada tabari ya su6uce mata samu irin su J-boy a wannan lokacin saika tona
Dan haka tayi hakuri su shirya koba komai zasu angyali arziki
Gani haka yasa J-boy k'ara baade hannunsa wajan yiwa meenal kyauta,sai dai har yanzu idan J-boy yabawa meenal kui saita rabashi gida uku taau kaso biyu sannan takawo wa inna kaso aya,"da shike inna batasan kai ba sai kiga takama murna kamar wacce bata ta6a gani kui da kayan k'walama ba
****  Kwaci tashi babu wiya yau rana kwana uku auran aure Rukayya da K'amaruden duk gida biyu shirye-shirye sukeyi babu kama hannu yaro
Inna na zaune a tsakar gida tana faman surfawa Rukayya da daddy zagi akan hanata talle da yai,"ita kuma Rukayya gaba aya tak'i sakin jiki da kowa a gidan, duk a tunani inna gani take irin abinda meenal taje tai shine daddy yakama Rukayya nayi yasanshi hana ora mata talle
K'arin takaici babu irin tambayar da inna batai wa Rukayya ba amma Rukayya tak'i fai mata"a duk lokacin da inna zata tambayi Rukayya cewa take itama batasan dalilinsa nayi haka ba
Hakan yasa yau inna tun safe take bala'in da masifa a cikin gidan
"daga daddy har yaya Mu'azam babu wanda ya tanka mata, hasalima tun safe sukabar gidan suka tafi kasuwa domin siyawa Rukayya kayan aki kama su gado da katifa, sai an abinda baza'a rasa ba a matsayinsa na mai k'aramin k'arfi
Tsinuwa da iban albarka babu irin wanda Rukayya bata shashi ba har cewa take idan taje tai cikin shege to wlhy banai gidan ba sai dai takoma kyauye gun uwarta taje ta haife amma ba'a gidana ba, duk zari'armu babu shege sabida haka idan aka ganki dashi to dan'gin uwarki kika ibo amma ba dangi mu
Duk maganar da inna keyi a kunni Rukayya amma a yau maganar inna bai 6atawa Rukayya rai ba,hasalima ba itace a gabanta ba abinda ya dameta ya dameta
Tana ciki masifarta kenan tajiyo sallamar alhj da wasu maza ana kama-kama, da sauri ta mik'e taje lek'owa domin gani meyene ake shigowa dashi,gani kayan forniture yasa inna mamaki hai da tambayar daga inna?
Daga daddy har yaya Mu'azam babu wanda ya tanka mata, bayan mutani da suka tayasu
kamo kayan zuwa ciki su fitane ba tare da daddy ya kalli sukanta ba yace"kiyi hakuri mancewa nayi ban sanar dake ba jibi idan Allah ya kaimu za'a aura wa Rukayya aure, yanzu haka yan gida suna hanya, azu mukai waya dasu sukace su wuto Jos
Inna dake tsaye ji takayi kamar amafarki takejin maganar da daddy keyi ba zahiri bane
Daddy yaci gaba da cewa"bari yanzu naje na siyo kayan cefane a ora sanwa kafin su iso
Gani inna tayi shiru ne yasa"daddy cewa"Rabi kina jina kuwa?
A lokacin ne ta farka daga barci da takeyi, take wani irin zufa yake faso mata,bakinta har rawa yakeyi tama rasa mezata ce
Ba tare da daddy yajira jin me zatace ba yai ficewarsa ya barta tsaye anan"yana ficewa tai kamar wacce aka tsikara,kalmar farko daya yafa fita daga bakin inna shine buran'uba kai,wlhy baka isa ba, waima na tambayeka kai a matsayinka nawa da zaka aurar da Rukayya batare da sani anginta ba,ba auren Rukayya ba koma menene bakada hutumi akai saini ninenan nakeda iko da Rukayya bakai ba, dan haka baka isa ba kayi kaan
Ba aure ba za'ayi mugani
Gani masifar bazai kamai mata ba gidan Talatuwa ta nufa
Tun kafin ta k'arisa cikin gidan take kwaawa Talatuwa kira
Talatuwa dake zaune a aki tanacin tuwon"jin yanayin da inna ta shigo dashine yasa"Talatuwa fitowa daga aki hannunta rik'e da kwanu tuwon
Duk a tunani Talatuwa mutuwa akai yasa inna shigowa tana kwaa mata kira tun daga bakin k'ofar gida
Ba tere da inna ta shiga daga ciki ba a tsakar gida ta tsaya take faiwa Talatuwa maganar auran Rukayya
Cike da mamaki Talatuwa tace mai?wani irin aure sai kace auren an k'wanso,abu babu sani babu sanayya
To shinaga Talatuwa
A'a babu mamaki wasa yake maki
Wani irin Talatuwa abinda kayan akima yanzu suka kawo
Kai fa??
Wlhy kuwa
Himm Rabi kenan, duk yanda akayi akwai lauje ciki nai
Yanzu abinda nakeso dake kije kiyi hakuri duk yanda za'ayi kada ki nuna ranki ya 6aci ko kinji zafin abinda yai idan ma zakiyi magana ki bari sai bayan biki
Wani irin sai bayan biki Talatuwa? A gaskiya bazan iya bari har sai bayan biki ba
A'a Rabi, duk abinda hakuri bai baki ba rashinsa bazai bakiba
Hmm Talatuwa kenan bari dai kigani
Ba tare da inna ta saurari abinda inna zatace ba tajuya ta koma gida
"duk tsane-tsinen da inna keyi babu wanda ya tanka mata har daddy yadawo daga kasuwa"kayan abinci yasiyo sosai dasu buhun shinkafa garin masara tumatur magi dadai sauransu
Koda daddy yace"inna tasa sanwa kafin bak'i su'iso"inna batai ba, zama tai taci gaba da masifa hai da zage-zage wai daddy bai auketa da mutunci ba inda ya auketa da daraja da mutunci da bai mata haka ba
Tsabar rashin lokacinta yasa ko sauraranta baiyi
A 6angaren gidan su K'amarden ma haka ne ranar ne malam Usman yake sanarwa iya da maganar auren K'amaruden
Nan itama iya tahau masifa da bala'i sabida faa bakimta har kunfa yakeyi,sani hali yafi sani kama babu wanda ya kula iya dake masifa
A ranar yaya Bala yaturo masu feti suka fente gidan kaf, hatta ban garen iya dana baffa saida sukasa shida K'amaruden aka gyara gidan tsaf
Koda daddy yace inna ta dora sanwa bata dora ba har saida suka iso, a lokacin da suka isone tafara kame kame tana burin kunya
Tare suka hau da k'anni daddy hai da Talatuwa sukai abinci,"k'anna maman Rukayya kuwa suna gefe
Washe gari daddy yake nunawa yan'uwasa dana mmn Rukayya kayan da yaiwa Rukayya
"Dukkansu godiya sukai tayi hai da sanyawa zuri'a albarka
Yan'uwan Rabi kuwa harsa kukansu
Bayan fitar daddy ne yan'uwan Rabi suka tasata gaba suna tambayar tata kayan da taiwa Rukayya
Nan inna tafara kame-kame gani batada mafita yasa tace masu ai haa kui sukai da daddy suka siya mata wannan kayan daya nuna masu
Su amsane dai kawai amma baan su yarda da maganar ba, sabida suriga susan waye alhj Haruna batun yauba yaiwa wasu banza ma bare Rukayya
aya daga cikinsu ce tasake tambayar, idan tace tare sukayi kayan to ina kayan aikin gida na mata?
Nanma shiru tasake yi
Tn daga sannan suka k'ara yarda da abinda zuciyarsu ke rawaita masu
Gani ba'a siye mata kayan aiki irin tamu ta mata ba yasa yan'uwan mmn Rukayya rokon Talatuwa data rakasu kasuwa sukaje suka siye mata na iya k'afinsu
Babu k'arya a ciki amna bazataje rage murya a mak'wabta ba
" ranar juma'a da safe misali k'arfe 
10:AM       Aka aura auren Rukayya da k'amaruden,murna a gun K'amaruden baya musaltuwa
"itako Rukayya tunda akace an aura auren babi abinda takeyi irin kuka
Duk kwalliyar da akai mata saida ta gogeshi sabida kuka, dan ma akwai yan'uwan mmn ta kusa da'ita, duk da kukan da takeyi bai hanasu bata kayan gyara tanasha ba, dama tunda suka iso gari suka tasata a gaba da gyara ciki da waje
Gani irin kayan alfarman da k'amaruden ya zubwa Rukayya yasa hankali inna tashi
"K'amaruden bamai kui bane amma yanada zuciya
Yamma nayi aroud eigth o'clock aka auki amarya zuwa gidan mijinta, da shiya akwai wani dinner da zasuyi hakan yasa ba'a 6ata masu lokaci ba tunda lokacin ruwane ake ciki
Kafin a fita da amarya saida aka kaita aikin daddy domin yai mata nasiha,alhamdllh daddy yaiwa Rukayya nasiha koda shine ya haifeta iya kacin abinda zai fai mata kenan
A 6angaren inna kuwa cewa tai batada abinda zatace sabida duk abinda zata fai dadi yariga daya fai sabida haka a tafi da'ita kawai
