_WACECE RABI?_
Rabi haifafiyar garin *JALINGO* cikin wata k'aramar hukumar da ake kira *WURO SANDEY* ce, su biyu iyayansu suka haifa ita da Ibrahim,bayan auren Rabi da suwa shekaru Allah yaiwa iyayensu kasuwa
alokacin Ibrahim yana tanashinsa, da haka yaci gaba da kulawa da kansa,kasancewa su fulani yawone, bai san inda yan'uwansu suke ba, ita kuma Rabi tabi mijinta Abuja inda yake aiki alhj Haruna daRabi mak'wabtan junane amma su ba fulanin dashi bane zaune suke basu zuwa ko'ina daga tallen nono sai kiwo
Hakan yasa su sufi su Rabi karatun boko dana addini
Bayan dawowarsu abuja da wasu shekaru lokacin Rabi nada tsohun ciki aka aiko mata Allah yaiwa Ibrahim rasuwa, a lokacin tashiga matsananci damuwa, hakan yasa ta matsawa daddy zataje gida, gani tanada tsohun ciki yasa daddy cewz tayi hakuri har Allah ya sauketa lafiya
Bai kamata tayi tafiya da tsohun ciki haka ba, sannan kuma gashi dogon tafiyane
duk da haka Rabi bata yarda ba,gani haka yasashi shiryawa yaje
Bayan fitar matar Ibrahim tagaba yan'uwanta suka matsa mata da maganar aure
"jin labarin zatayi aure yasa Rabi shiryawa taje har garinsu wato *ZAMFA* taje tace sai dai abata Rukayya
Babu yanda ba'ayi da'ita ba data kyale Rukayya a hannu uwarta ba amma Rabi tak'i a cewarta jini gidansu zasu zuwa agola
Jin haka yasa mmn rumma cew a bar mata Rukayya zata rik'rta amma Rabi taki, a cewarta idan harta banzantar da Rukayya tamkar taci amanar Ibrahim ne musamman ma idan tai duba da yanda ya auketa tamkar uwa aya uba aya
Gashi abin hannunsa baya rufe mata ido, duk da yasan tanada miki mai hali, domin a lokacin alhj Haruna bai talauce ba
"amma haka Ibrahim yake nik'o garinsa tun daga jalingo har zuwa abuja sannan ya haa mata goma sha tara ta arziki ita da alhj Haruna ya kawo masu
Dalilin da yasa alhj Haruna kenan yake gani duk abinda yaiwa Rukayya bai biya Ibrahim ba
_wannan kenan_
Idan muka dawo 6an gaaren baffa kuma (malam usman kenan da matarsa hanne wanda kukafi sani da iya) su yan'asalin garin gwambe ne wanda aikin soja ne yakawosa abuja da zama
Anan duk suka haifi yaransu maza biyu mata uku, amma su mata suna gida gwambe suna aure, mazan ne suke tare dasu sabida yanzu baya aikin komai dama can barin kuratai in nan ne wanda basuyi karatun boko ba
kuma tunda yabar aiki babu wani abinda ke shigo maki sai abinda yara suka nimo akeci hakan yasa iya komawa sana'ar saida kamu
Marigayiya matar K'amaruden ta farko matsayin iya take agun iya sabida yarinyar k'anwarta ce
Ita da kanta taje gida gwambe ta nimowa k'amaruden aurenta
Ita kuwa khadijat matan yaya Bala barece a cikinsu, daga ita har iyayenta zaunanu abuja ne,shiya nimawa kansa aurenta, duk da a lokacin iya bataso ba amma gani sunace sunason juna yasa ta hakura
Duk irin abinda iya zatayi baffa baya magana, badan yana tsoronta ba sai dan asirin da tai masa,duk abinda tace ya zauna kenan babu chanji
Gani tana juya baffa yasa hatta surukanta ma juyasu takeyi, da farko ba k'aramin wiya khadijat tasha da iya ba amma banda yanzu, domin kusan nace yanzu haka iya tsoron khadijat takeyi
Sai dai matsala ayane da Khadijat ta samu waja hatta uban miji bata raga mawa, wanda take shakkansu daga Yaya Bala sai K'amaruden a gidan
_wannan kenan_
Idan muka koma 6an garen Talatuwa kuma
"yar asalin garin bauchi ne ita da mijinta marigayi , kasuwanci saida yalone yakawosu garin abuja, tun suna haya har Allah ya hure masa yai gini kansa
Daga ita har mijinta mutane arzikine hakan yasa sukada kyankyanwan fahimta da mutane unguwa, tunda malam isa yarasu Talatuwa bata ta6a kukan wani abuba sai an abinda baza'a rasa ba, sabida halin yau da gobe
Yaransu huu duk mata amma uku suna bauchi suna aure Jummalace kawai take tare da mmnta, itama in sabida lokacin da bbnta ya rasu tana yarinya ce yasa dangin uban suka barwa Talatuwa jummala
Lokacin-lokaci Talatuwa takan auki jummala suje gani gida, a wani zuwa gida da sukai ne dangin bbn jummala sukace tabasu jummala suyi mata aure
Babu yanda basuyi da Talatuwa ba amma tak'i a cewarta tanaso yarta tasamu ilimi zamani dana addimi, tunda yan'uwanta basu samu ba to bazata yarda itama tabi layin yan'uwanta ba
Jin haka yasa babu wanda yak'ara maganar abar masa jummala
Musamman ma idan sukai duba da tunda marigayi ya kwanta dama babu wanda ya ta6a taimaka mata
Hakan yasa Talatuwa ke saida shinkafa da wanke suke rufawa kansu asiri ita da yar'ta jummala babu wanda yaji babu wanda yagani, sannan kuma ga karatu da takeyi
_wannan kenan_
_barka da rana_

*_________9* Ana aukar amarya ba'a tsaya ko'ina ba sai gidan mijinta,k'anwar mmn Rukayya ce ke rik'e da hannuta tun daga saukarsu a mota har izuwa akinta
Basufi minti goma da shigowa ba saiga Khadijat ta shigo ita da wata mata
"bayan su gaigaisa Khadijat ke tambayan inda amarya take
aya daga cikin yan'kawo amarya ne ta amsa da cewa tana daga cikin aki
A lokacin su suna falo amarya kuma tana daga ciki
Tare suka shiga daga cikin bedroom in saida suka sake gaisawa da matar da take zaune da Rukayya sannan Khadijat ke sanar mata mai kwalliya ce tazo yimata,"gani Rukayya ta tsaya nok'e-nok'e alamar kunya yasa Khadijat cewa tai sauri sabida ita kaai ake jira, ango yariga daya shirya tuntuni
Duk da haka Rukayya bata motsa daga inda take ba har saida k'anwar mmnta tasa masu baki sannan Rukayya tamik'a kanta aka fara yimata kwalla
Basu 6ata lokaci a gun kwalliyar ba sabida lokaci yariga daya k'ure nan da nan suka maga, Khadijat ce ta mik'o mata wata leshi mai ruwan madara tace da'ita tasa, Rukayya na sawa aka aura mata an'kwalli sannan sukai sallama da k'anwar mmn
Itama fatan alkhairi mmn Saude tai masu, Khadijat ce ke rik'e da hannun Rukayya har suka fita, suna fita kai tsaye 6an garensu ta kaita ashe K'amaruden achan yake yana jiransu
Suna shiga da sauri K'amaruden dake zaune a falo ya mik'e da fain hannunki da aiki, Allah dai ya biyaki uwar gida ran gida daga ke narufe k'ofa
Cikin raha Khadijat ke cewa"na yaushe kuma, bayan aikin gama yariga daya gama
Au baki yarda da cewa daga ke babu wata ba kenan?
Na yarda amma
Sai kuma tai shiru
K'amaruden yace"amma me?
Hannu ta aga tana nuna masa Rukayya batare da tayi magana ba
Amma da yake yagano da sauri yasa hannu ya kamo Rukayya dake tsaya gefe kanta a sukuye yarik'ota hai da cewa"ije wannan maganar kema kinsan abinda zataba yuwu bane
Duk dariya sukasa, gani ya rik'e hannu Rukayya gam yasa"Khadijat cewa kai babu koan karan nan da akeyi?
Kefa kikasan wani abu wai shi kara, nidai kinga tafiyarmu domin idan na biye taki sai kisa abokaina suka laifina
Yana rik'e da hannu Rukayya suka fita har bakin game
"wasu abokansa da suka rage wanda ya zamana dole saida ango zasu tafi
Suna gani fitowar K'amaruden sukasa masa ihu hai da kiran ango kasha mai
"duk abinda sukeyi Mu'azam baice dasu uffan ba, kamar baya gun idan ba murmushi ba babu abinda yakeyi
Babu kunya K'amaruden ke basu ansa da zan dai sha amma bansha koba
Rukayya dake tsaye daga aya kunya ya mamayeta ji takeyi kamar k'asa ya bue da shige ciki sabida kunya
Duk abinda suka faiwa K'amaruden saiya meda masu,"gani haka yasa Mu'azam tafiya yashiga mota
Nan suma suka fara shishiga motoci na amarya da ango shine a tsakiya wasu a gaba wasu kuma na biye dasu a baya, ga sanyayar sauti dake tashi
Suna isa saida abokan ango suka k'ara feshe mashi jiki da turare, gani babu wata mace da zatatiwa Rukayya yasa K'amaruden ansar tuaren dake hannu aya daga cikin abokansa da kansa yaiwa Rukayya feshin turare a jiki sannan yarik'e mata hannu suka k'arisa daga ciki
Bayan su zauna a mazaunisu sannan aka buk'aci babban abokin ango yafito ya bue taro da addu'a
"duk yanda Mu'azam yaso 6uyewa amma babu hali dole yafito yai addu'a sannan aka sake cewa ana buk'atar aya daga cikin abokan ango yazo yai tak'aitance bayani akan ango da amarya
Babu yanda ba'ayi da wasu daga cikin abokan dasu fito suyi bada tak'aitance tahiri akan ango ba amma suk'i, dole Mu'azam yai na ango sannan yazo yaiwa amarya
Duk holl in ya auka da tafi sannan wasa yafara, K'amaruden yasha wara harda girgiza ba abokansa ba hatta jama'ar da sukazo masa saida K'amaruden yabasu dariya
Ita kuwa Rukayya kunya ya hanata sakat da haka har taro yatashi, basu koma gida ba sai misalin biyu na dare sannan suka koma gida
Da yake akwai gajiya yasa duk yanda mmn Saude tayi da Rukayya datasha magani amma taki, haka tagaji ta kyaleta zuwa safe
Tunda aka fara hidimar bakin Rukayya mernal bata yini a gida
Tun yan'biki basuyi magana ba har yakai ga saida sukai magana, nan ma inna tasake rawaita masu wani k'aryan da cewa karatune yasha mata kai shiyasa batada lokacin kanta bare na wani
Allah yabada sa'a kawao sukace batare da sun yarda da maganar taba
Sani hali yafi sani kama yasa gari na wayewa baffa ya aikowa yan'kawo amarya da kayan shayi batare daya tsaya jiran iya ba
Hakama da rana musamman yasa yaya Bala da K'amaruden yace ala dole saidai suje suyi masa siyayyan kayan abimci su kawo masa sannan kuma wadatance yake buk'ata
Babu yanda basuyi da baffa daya fai masu abinda zaiyi dashi amma baffa yaki
"gani haka yasa yaya Bala cewa K'amaruden ya tashi suje
Bayan fitarsu ne yaya Bala ke cewa babu mamaki idan ba yan'kawo amarya ne baffa zaibada a dafa masu ba
Kai haba yaya idan hakane, ita kuma iya fa?
Kamar yaya iya fa?amma kanaji kana gani tunda aka fara jidimar bakin nan batace komai ba
Eh hakane amma gani nayi bai dace tayi haka ba, sabida akwai bak'i yanzu magana batada wiya sai kaga anje da'ita ana yaata wanda tai dama wanda batai ba duk za'ace tayi kuma jama'a su yarda tunda suriga da susan halinta, idan ma labari sukeji to sugani ma idansu
"
Nidai har ga Allah yaya halin iya yana damuna
K'amaruden kenan, bakai kaan ba har dani amma yaya zamuyi dole sai hakuri, sabida bamuda tamkarta a duniya duk wanda zai somu baranta ne, nidai abinda nasoke dakai shine muci gaba da hakuri har Allah ya kawo lokacin rabuwarmu
Da haka dai sukai tayi suna tafe suna maganar halin iya, hai da bawa K'amaruden shawarwarin yanda zai zauna da matarsa, da haka har suka isa kasuwa sukai siyayyar da baffa yasasu
Suna dawowa kai tsaye yace abawa Khadijat ta dafawa yan'kawo amarya
"gani rana tayi yasa yan'kawo amarya aukar amarya zuwa 6abgaren iya koda suka isa suyi sallama yakai baki uku iya najinsu amma bata amsa ba
Maje faa banza bare sarki yai sak'o, dama chan iya ba amsa sallama takeyi ba bare yanzu tafara ta kansu
K'anni K'amaruden ne suka amsa masu hai da cewa kushigo bismillarku
koda suka shiga duk su gaisa da mutane dake cikin akin amma banda iya gani haka yasa aya daga cikinsu da yake ita mai zafice nan take ta k'ule inda take shiga banan take fita ba, babu irin hak'urin dasu salma da zahra basu bataba amma tak'i yin shiru
Gani yanda take kunfar baki yasa iya mik'ewa tabar masu akin ba tare data tanka ba,suma mik'ewa sukai hai da kama ita mai masifar suka fita daga akin
Rukayya dake duk'e taci kuka har taji babu dai, bayan fitarsu da sauri salma taje ta sanarwa yaya Bala abinda ake ciki" shima da sauri yabiyota zuwa 6an garen iya, ko kafin su yaya Bala su'isa mutane subar shiyan iya
Babusu babu iya, juyawa yai zuwa akin baffa yaje ya sanar masa abinda iya ta aikata
Koda baffa yasa aka kira iya,daga tambayarta abinda tai ta kyauta kenan?
Babu abinda yafito daga bakin iya sai"menayi kuma da zaka sani a gaba kanamin wani faa kamar yan gabanka, idan daga cikin abinda na shirwa wannan aurene banyi komai koba yanzu aka fara
Kai kuma,"kan yaya Bala batako"da kakawo ubanka k'arata wlhy Allah idan baka fita daga idona ba saina tsine mak
da sauri yaya Bala yasa hannu ya rufewa iya baki ai da zubewa a gabanta yana mai niman gafararta
Sannan taci gaba da cewa"idan suji haushi su auketa su tafi da'ita idan banda rashin jin magana irin ta yaron yau me ake da itin wannan zuri'a masu k'ashin tsiya matsiyata kawai wanda basu gaji arziki ba
Duk maganar da iya keyi baffa bai tanka mata har tak'are,"da isa iya ke fai ai wlhy daga ita harshi K'amaruden sai su gane basuda wayo
Allah ya shiryeki kawai baffa yace"yaya Bala da salma kuwa suyi kuka har su gaji,amma dukabinda ake ciki basu bari K'amaruden yasani ba
Gani idan taci gaba da zama a gidan za'a kwashi an kallo yasa mm Haule cewa su tashi sutafi gida
kafin su tafi saida sukasa aka kira masu K'amaruden suka k'ara jadada masa amanar da Allah ya bashi, idan har yabari uwarsa ta citar da'ita Allah bazai barshi ba
K'amaruden yace"yaji kuma insha Allahu hakan ma bazai kasance ba,K'amaruden yai mamaki sosai duk da basu fitowa direct suka fai masa ba amma da alama akwai wani abu a k'asa
Gani bazai iya hakuri ba yasashi zuwa gun yaya Bala domin tambayarsa ko akwai abinda yafaru
"nan yaya Bala ya boye masa yace babu komai, yana zuwa gun baffa kuwa baffa ya kwashe komai ya fai maki hai da cewa kada yaje ya tunkareta da kowace magana ya fita harkanta kawai
Nan yasake kwashe abinda taiwa yaya Bala ya fai masa,"hakan yasa K'amaruden razana tsoron zuwa ya tunkari iya da wani magana ya kamashi
Koda suka kamo gidan inna babu abinda sukeyi irin maganar iya, kowa da abinda yake fai akanta
hiran kenan sukai tayi har dare, masu haa kaya kuma sunayi sabida a gobe sukeson komawa gida jalingo
Bayan sallar isha aka rako ango akin, a falo suka zauna, K'amaruden ne yashiga daga ciki yaje kiran Rukayya
"koda ya shiga cikin kuka yasameta tanayi wiwi kamar wacce aka daka
Murmushi kawai K'amaruden yai sannan ya k'arisa inda take cikin sanyi murya yake kiran sunanta,"Rukky! Rukky!!Rukky!!!
Duk Rukayya naji amma tai shiru, gani haka yasa"K'amaruden duk'awa a gabanta hannu yasa ya yaye mata mayafin da take lulu6e dashi
Da sauri rukayya takama mayafin tarik'e da k'arfi, murmusawa K'amaruden yasakeyi sannan yasakan mata mayafinta hai da cewa dan Allah ki tashi muje falo akwai bak'i suna jiranmu
Rukayya dake zaune bata aga kanta ba bare ta nuna tasan ana magana da'ita
K'amaruden yai magana har ya gaji,"suma abokan da suke falo zaune su auka mancewa dasu ne yai, har sufara maganar tafiya"jin haka yasa K'amaruden mik'ewa daga duk'en da yake batare da Rukayya ta ankara ba ji kawai tai anyi sama da'ita
Ihu tasa hai da kiran Allanta,"gani yafara tafiya da'ita yasa Rukayya cewa ya sauketa zatayi tafiya da k'afarta
Nan suka kama cuku-cuku kamar masu anbe duk da haka baisa K'amaruden ya sauketa ba saida sukakai bak'in k'ofar fita falo sannan ya sauketa hannu yasa zai gyara mata mayafinta dake biye dasu
Da sauri Rukayya tajanye jikinta daga nasa hai da yayuban mayafinta ta gyara da kanta sai da ta gama gyarawu tsaf sannan K'amaruden yace"muje ko?
K'amaruden na gaba Rukayya na biye dashi a baya har suka isa falo, da sallama suka shiga, bayan su zauna sannan aka umarci aya daga cikin abokan ango daya fara yimasu addu'a kafin sufara cewa komai
A wannan karon kam Yaya Mu'azam bai yiba, gani haka yasa aya daga cikinsu yai masu addu'ar sannan kowa yakawo irin nasa nasihohin hai da basu shawarwari sannan kuma da fatan zaman lafiya
Rukayya dake zaune kusa da K'amaruden idan ba kuka ba babu abinda takeyi,"yaya Mu'azam dake zaune kusa da K'amaruden duk kukan da Rukayya keyi tamkar a kunnisa takeyi gani bazai iya jure gani tana kuka ba tun kafin saura su mik'e tuni ya rigasu mik'ewa hai da cewa kuzo mutafi
Ko kafin suce uffan tuni Mu'azam yariga daya fice daga falon,"gani haka yasa sauran sukabi bayansa hai da ijewa K'amaruden ledar kazan da suka siye masa
Shima dayake zaune mik'ewa yai zaije masu rakiya, har yakai bakin k'ofa suka turesa cikin wasa daya koma ciki suyafe masa
Godiya yai masu hai rufe k'ofar falo yadawo ya zauna a k'asa suna fuskantar juna shida Rukayya
Gani har a lokacin bata daina kuka ba yasa K'amaruden mik'ewa yakoma kan kujera ya zauna kusa da'ita hannu yasa ya dafo kafaarta hai da kiran sunanta Rukky ta!Rukky!! Rukky!!!"har yanzu kukane kikeyi haka? Dan Allah kiyi hakuri kiyi shiru, wlhy harga Allah banason gani wannan hawaye dake zubowa daga idanuki, a duk lokacin da naga hawayenki na zubowa jinshi nakeyi tamkar garwashin wutane aka orami a zuciyata
Idan baso kikeyi kiga zuciyata har izuwa gangan jikina kiga su k'oneba dan Allah kiyi hakuri da kukun nan haka, dan Allah
hannu yasa yaciro handkerchief daga aljihunsa yana goge mata hawayen hai da fai mata kalamai masu dai da kwantar da hankali
Saida K'amaruden ya k'are share mata tsaf sannan yasa hannusa bibiyu ta tallafo fuskanta suna kallon juna ido cikin ido sannan yaci gaba dan Allah dubi yanda kika 6ata kwallayarki sabida kuka pls kada na sake gani hawaye na zubowa daga kan wannan kyankyawar fuskan taki, kin jiko?
"kai kawai Rukayya ta aga masa alamar eh
Rungumeta K'amaruden yai a k'irjinsa yana mai shafe mata baya, ba Rukayya ba hatta K'amaruden in dake rungume da ita saida yaji wani iri"duk da ba wannan ne na farko a gunsa ba amma a yanda yakeji kansa yau ko wanda bai ta6a kwanciya da mace ba iyaka kenan
Joystick in take ta yamik'e yacika wanda fal sai faman motsi yakeyi yana nima mahai
"ba tare da Rukayya ta ganeba hannu K'amaruden yasa yakamo joystick in ya turata tsakankani cinyarsa ya matsashi tsaff
A 6angaren Rukayya kuwa idan banda fauwar gaba da takeyi hai da rawan jiki babu abinda takeyi
Sabida furkici da tsoro jikinta har rawa yakeyi,musamman ma irin rik'on da K'amaruden yai mata koshi kaai ya'isa yasa Rukayya tsorata
Ya jima yana mai sauke ijiyar numfashi, musamman ma yanda yaji nonuwarta na gugan k'irjinsa, duk da cikin riga suke amma hakan bai hana K'amaruden jin ni'imtance sanyi a zuciyarsa ba
Sun jima a haka sannan K'amaruden yasa hannu a hankali ya daga Rukayya daga jikinsa hai da janyo ledar dake kusa dashi yana cewa bari muci abinci ko?
Shiru tai masa," kwance ledar yai ya bue bakinsa K'amaruden bai tuna da batun plate ba saida ya ciro kazar daga cikin leda sannan yatuna da plate
Batare da yace da'ita komai ba, mik'ewa yai yaje ya auke plate hae da cups daga kitchen yadawo juye kazan yai a cikin plate sannan yace da'ita ta sauko muci
Jin haka yasa"Rukayya cewa nak'oshi
Kamar yaya kin k'oshi?    Nariga da naci abinci
A'a ban yarda ba, wacce daban wannan kuma shima daban
"dan haka ki sauko kawai muci ko kuma na baki da kaina
Har Rukayya ta bue baki da niyyar zatai magana
ko kafin tace uffan jinta kawai ta a jikinsa ta fao
Taso tashi ta gudu amma babu hali sabida irin rikon da yai mata, hannu aya yasa auko cinyar kazar yakai mata baki
"Da sauri Rukayya ta auke fuskanta hai da cewa ka kyaleni zanci da kaina
K'amaruden dake rike da ita yace"bazan sakeki ba sabida idan na sakeki nasan baci zakiyi ba
Zanci mana
A'a ban yarda ba
Allah kuwa
Kice wlhy
Nan tai shiru bata sake tanka masa ba
sabida dama maganar da takeyi dolene yasata tanka masa
Gani ta aure fuska yasa K'amaruden sakinta hai da cewa to tashi kici
Gefe Rukayya takoma ta zauna sannan tafara ciki, kaan-kaan kamar bazataci ba, baifi sau biyu dataci ba tace takoshi
Shine dai yaci sosai, sannan ya tsiyaya masu Fresh milk yamik'a mata,shima in kaan kawai ta kur6a ta'ije kofin
Jin tace ta koshi yasa shima ije nasa ya mike hai da cewa bismillh
"tantanra ragowar yai ya'ije a gefe sannan suka shige daga cikin bedroom
Suna shiga gefe Rukayya tasamu taja ta tsaya,"murmushi kawai K'amaruden yai sannan yace muje daga ciki muyi alwala ko
yana maganar ne hai da nuna mata bathroom
Saida yafara shiga sannan itama tashiga, suna shiga yace da'ita da yai alwala yagani
Buta ya auko yamik'a mata hai da cewa bismillh
tana amsa ta duk'a farayi, duk abinda Rukayya keyi idon K'amaruden na kanta har tak'are sannan shima yai nasa
Suna fita bedroom yajasu sallah raka'a biyu, bayan su idarne K'amaruden yaora hannunsa bisa kan Rukayya ya jima yana Addu'a hai da rokon Allah yabasu zaman lafiya
Duk abinda yakeyi kan Rukayya na duk'e a k'asa har K'amaruden yak'are addu'a bata aga kai ba
Bayan ya k'are addu'arsa ne yai mata tambayoyi akan tsarki da wanka, duk ta amsa masa babu kuskure alhadmllh yace saida yamik'e sannan itama ta mik'e hai da kwashe sallayar ta ninke
Bakin gado takoma ta zauna hai da zabga uban tagumi
"K'amaruden kuwa towel dake kan wandrobe ya auka yanufi bathroom bai fito ba saida wanka, sannan yafito aure da towel a k'ugunsa, batare yada kallo Rukayya ba yace"tashi kije kiyi wanka sabida rage gajiya ko?
ayan extra towel in yai yamik'a mata sannan yanufi gaban mirrow,zama yai na musamman yafara shafa mai hai da feshe jikinsa da turarukan dake jere gaban mirrow
Rukayya batafi minti goma da shiga ba saigata ta fito sanya da kayan data shiga wankan dashi
K'amaruden dake zaune gaba mirrow ta cikin glass ya hangota,cikin zuciyarsa ya murmusa sannan ya mik'e gun wandrobe yaje ya bue kayan barci yaciro nata da nasa sannan ya meda murfin wandrobe in yarufe
Mik'a mata kayan yai hai da cewa gashi kisa
ba tare daya kauce ba aukar nasa kayan yai yasa,"gani haka yasa Rukayya rumtsa idonta, shiko K'amaruden ko'a jikinsa
Yana gama sawa, gani duk har lokocin tana tsaye bata gusa daga inda take ba yasa"K'amaruden cewa auka kisa mana, kosai nasa maki da kainane?
A sanyaye Rukayya tasa hannu ta kwashi kayan zuwa bathroom, tanasa kayan tana kwalla kamar wacce aka tilasa mata, da haka har tak'are tajima tana kallo kanta a mirrow dake bathroom tana tunani yanda zata fito suyi ido biyu da K'amaruden a haka
Shirun da K'amaruden yaji yayi yawa yasashi tashi daga bakin gadon da yake zaune yanufo bedroom in
"tura k'ofar da K'amaruden zai yi yasa,"Rukayya juyowa da sauri
Suna haa ido da K'amaruden da sauri tasa hannu ta rufe k'irjinta, dai-dai nonuwarta inda sukafi ko'ina baiyana daga halittan jikinta
Da sauri K'amaruden ya k'arisa gunta hai da fain oyoyo matata, jikinsa har tsuma yakeyi, wani irin runguma K'amaruden yakaiwa Rukayya dake tsaye a gun kamar gwalki
Yajima yana rungume da'ita a bathroom hai da shafe mata dukkani ilihirin jikinta, gani k'afafurwasa bazasu aukesa ba yasa K'amaruden aukar Rukayya caffff zuwa bed hai da kashe light

A kwana a tashi wataran khadijat ta tashi da matsanancin zazza6i kamar wacce zata mutu, gani haka yasa yaya Bala yaje ya sanarwa iya"iya najin haka tace ALLAH ya k'ara babu inda zata, shegiyar yarinya mara kunyar k'azamar banza kawai

"gani haka yasa yaya Bala kiran yan'gidan su khadijat yasanar dasu abinda ake ciki
Baifi minti goma da fai masu ba saiga yan gidansu suzo da mota wai hjy mamarta tace su auketa su kaita asitibi kafin tazo
Yaya Bala baiji zafin hakan ba sabida idan da sabo yariga daya sabo,sannan kuma ba sai khadijat kaai takewa haka ba hatta shi da yara idan basuda lafiya haka take masu
Gani gida ya lalace babu gyara yasa sauran yan'uwata sukace zasu tsaya su gyaara mata gida
"tun daga k'ark'ashin cushion in dake falo suka fara cire pampas in yaro, wani da kashi ciki wani kuma babu kashi sao dai fitsiri, k'ark'ashin gado shine uwa uba nan suka hau tsineta suna zaginta

*_________1* Tafiya take cikin sauri ga hadari yataso sai faman cida yakeyi, gani haka yasa Rukayya dake rike da bak'in leda a hannu cewa na shiga uku
Gani iska yataso gaan-gadan yasa Rukayya fara sauri hai da gudu, kamar wacce zata tashi sama, kafin takai gida ruwan sama ya6anlo
Gani haka yasata samu gefe aya tara6a tana jiran aukewar ruwa, ko kafin tak'atosa inda zata ra6e tuni kayan dake jikinta yajike sharaf,da haka tak'arisa gun tatsaya
Bata jima da tsayuwa ba wasu gun yacika da jama'a domin fakewar ruwa,anjima ana ruwan babu k'afk'aftawa
Rukayya dake tsaye jitakeyi kamar dada hali tatsaida ruwan sabida tasamu ta k'arisa gida gudan abinda zata taris a chan gidan
A 6angaren inna shatu kuwa tana kwance bisa gado ita da yar'lelenta wato Meenal kenan, himm kawai inna shatu tace"meenal dake kwance kusa da innarta tace"inna yayane?
Babu komai illa al'amarin yarinyar nan mana,"wa kenan inna?
Yawuci Rukayya!!
Rukayya kuma?!!
Eh mana,"ni dama tun farko bansan abinda yasa kika aukota ba, ki dubafa sabida Allah duk irin awainiya da wahalan da kikeyi akanta ba'a gani, anan gidan daddy yayi maki waje suma suyi maki kuma duk akan Rukayya
Amina kenan, nima kaina babu yanda zanyine idan ban dauki Rukayya ba duniya zata zageni,sannan kuma idan nayi duba da zamucin dake tsakanina da yaya dan na auki Rukayya riko ba wani abu bane
Inna kenan, idan akai magana saikice yaya-yaya to yanzu ina yayan naki yake,keda kike wannan maganar wlhy inna nayi imani inda kece kika mutu ko kallonmu yayan naki bazaiyi ba bare ya aukemu
Amina kenan,to ai baka daka tamutum, nidai duk abinda zanyi zanyishine sabida Allah
Rukayya dake cha gani ruwan ya tsagaita yasa takamo hanyar zuwa gida,tana tafe tana rawar sanyi sabida kayan dake jikinta su jik'e sharrrkaf da ruwa
Jiki a sanyaye ta k'arisa gida, da sallama tashiga
rukayya tai sallama har baki uku amma babu wanda ya'amsa daga inna har meenal in dake kwance

Tunda inna tafara dukan Rukayya bata bariba, kuka agun Rukayya kuwa tayishi har taji babu dai
"meenal na kwance sai faman juyi takeyi agado
Suna cikin haka kenan saiga alhj yai Sallama, gani irin aika-aikar da inna keyi yasa alhj auketa da mari hai da fusgo Rukayya dake kwance tana kuka
"Sannan yaci gaba da cewa muguwa azaluma wacce batasan darajan zumuci ba
Babu ko kunya bare tsoro inna tace"eh'in-eh'in bansan darajan zumucin ba,yar an'uwankane ko nawa?
Shatu nikike faiwa haka?
Nafai in, banasha fai maka duk abinda zanyiwa Rukayya kada kasami baki ba?
Cikin fushi yace baki isaba wlhy, kinyi kaan,kuma ina mai tabbatar maki duk abinda kika shuka saikin girbeshi tu a duniya sai Allah ya nuna maki illar zaluntar maraya, muguwa kawai kuma daga yau sai yau doka nasaka a gidan duk wanda yak'ara dora hannu dasunan zai daki Rukayya wlhy sai inda k'arfina yak'are kowaye shi kuwa
Sannan ya juya ga Rukayya dake tsaye tana kuka yace"kiyi hakuri rayuwace, wataran sai labari, insha Allahu wataran kece maibawa wasu labari kin jiko?
Kai kawai taaga alamar eh
Hannu yarik'e mata zuwa akinsa

Bazan bariba, kaha kawai taje ta kwaso mugun hali da farin k'afa irin na mariya
kina gani sanadiyar auren uwarta da yayana yai ya tsiyace,kafin yamutu saida komai nasa yak'are

Ita Rukayya dana lura tanada ra'ayin karatu insha Allahu zan taimaka mata har sai inda k'arfina ya k'are,bodan mahaifinta malam Abdullahi

"alhj yaci gaba da cewa Sani tun yana an shekara biyu nake awainiyar karatunsa, yarasa irin sakayyar da zaimin saibin yaran banza, suna tafiya yawon shaye-shayen banza da wofi, sabida Allah kaduba irin yaran dayake yawo dasu fa?

Rukayya zata shige akinsu kenan inna shatu ta kwaa mata kira, hai da cewa zonan
" Rukayya na zuwa inna tace"dan uwarki kije ki dora mana abincin yamma
Ba tare da tace uffan ba tajuya zuwa kitchen domin ora sanwar,dama duk ranar da zusuyi tuwo a murhu suka abinci, ko kuma suyi miya a risho tuwo kuma a icce
Tunda Rukayya tashiga kitchen take fama da icce yak'i kamawa sabida jikewar da yai
Tun k'arfe hudu take fama da huta bashine da kamawa ba sai bayan biyar, hakan yasa bata k'are girki ba sai bayan isha, sabida tuwon shikafa ne
Duk a lokacin meenal na akin inna kwance tana faman buga game a wayarta, wanda wani saurayinta yabata, inna tace tabuye kada tabari kowa yasani domin idan alhj ko yaya Mu'azam yagani kwacewa zasuyi sannan ya haa mata da duka, shiko Sani kodama ya amshe ba wata uwar zaiyi da itaba illa siyarwa domin samu na 6araswa
Ko sallar Rukayya bata samu tayi ba sabida idan ta kauce agun hutar mutuwa ne hutar zaiyi
Da haka har tasamu tak'are babu sallar la'asar bare magrib da isha
Bayan ya nunane takwashe, Rukayya na k'are kwashe tuwo cikin kwanuka ragowar kuma cikin wani rover tazuba domin bayanzu za'aci wannan ba sai gobe da sabe za'a zazafa shi a karya dashi
Bayan ta k'are kwashe na kwanuka takawo aki kitchen takoma domin auko wanda yake cikin rover ko kafin tadawo a guje meenal tafita taje tsakar gida ta ibo k'asa duk ta barbaa akaman tuwon sannan takoma ta kwance kamar ba'itace tai ba
Dayake akwai tazara akani akunan gidan da kitchen hakan yasa har inna tashigo Rukayya bata dawoba, tana shiga akin kataf idonta yayi arba da tuwon
Wani irin uwar salati tai kamar wacce akaiwa mutuwa,jin haka yasa Rukayya zuwa a guje domin gani abinda inna kewa salatin
Aiko tun kafin tasawo kanta cikin akin inna takai mata gwamza wanda hakan yai sanadiyar fauwar tukuyar miyar dake hannunta a k'afarta
Meenal na kwance tana kallonsu, kota motsa, tankar batagun
A gigice Rukayya tasa ihu tana fain wayyo Allah na, k'afata k'afata inna
"Aiko innar da ake kira batasan Rukayya nayiba, duka kawai take mata hai da cewa shegiya matsiyaci yar Allah ya tsine wacce bata gaji arziki ba,mai k'ashin mundirik'i irin ta uwarta

K'amaruden ya kwanta ne koya samu barci amma barci ya gagara ko kafin asuba yayi gada aya K'amaruden yarice baisan inda yake ba, gashi shi kaaine a side insa bare yasamu mataimaki
Haka yake kwance har safiya yai, gani har k'arfe takwas yayi K'amaruden bai shigo 6angaren iyayensa ba domin gaidasu kamar yanda yasaba, yasa babansa tambayar Hulera lafiya kuwa yau K'amaruden bai shigo gaidasu ba
A lokacin ne iya ta falka da haka, domin gaba aya tamance da cewa yau baishi gaidasu ba, da sauri tamik'e daga inda take zaune tana yayyanka kamu, nan tabar yara masu siye tanufi side in K'amaruden
Koda iya tare ta bue taga k'ofar akin hakan yasata shigewa kai tsaye batare data tsaya kwankwasawa ba

Da sauri yaya Bala yatari iya da cewa'a gaskiya iya wannan ba hujja bace, asalima duk kunji-kunji irin tasu ta mata, babu wani k'wak'waran sheda
Kenan k'arya nakeyi
A'a iya kiyi hakuri ni bance haka ba
To idan har nice na haifi K'amaruden ban yarda ba kuma ban amince daya auri Rukayya ba,in har yanace saiya aureta babu ni babu shi
Jin haka yasa hankalin K'amaruden tashi, harya bue baki zaiyi magana da sauri yaya Bala ya taresa hai da kamo masa hannu suka fita sukabar iya na faman masifarta data saba
Suna fita akin baffa suka nufa, lokacin baffa na zaune da sallama suka shiga akin
Baffa dake zaune ya amsa masu hai da cewa bismillih
Duk suka shiga, gefe guda suka samu suka zauna bayan su zauna ne, duk suka haa baki suka gaishesa, sannan yaya Bala yace baffa gunka mukazo da wata magana amma ban san yanda kaima zaka auki maganar ba
Baffa yace'Allah dai yasa lafiya
Murmushi yaya Bala yai sannan yace qlau baffa
To ina sauraranku
Nan yaya Bala yakwashe komai ya sanarwa baffa harda yanda sukai da iya
Baffa yaji dai sosai albarka yasa masu dukkansu su biyu sannan yace babu damuwa,subar maganar a hannusa
K'amaruden yaji dain yanda baffa ya amshi maganar
Kafin sati aya har su shirya shida daddy da Mu'azam zasu raka baffa *WURO SANDEY* nimowa K'amaruden auren Rukayya batare da sani inna ko iya ba
Da haka suka shirya tafiyarsu daddy yacewa inna zaije gani gida shida Mu'azam, sabida suyi kwana biyu basuje gida ba
Shima baffa yaiwa iya k'arya zai raka wani abokinsa *JALINGO* jin baffa yace zaije jalingo yasa iya cewa yakawo mata tsaraban nono da man shanu
Washe gari suna idar da sallar asuba suka auki hanya, da yake K'amaruden yariga ya nemo masu shatan motar da zaikaisu har jalingo kuma ya dawo dasu, komai ya dank'awa Mu'azam a hannunsa
Tunda suka auki hanya basu tsaya ko'ina ba sai a jalingo, saida suka tsaya sukai sallah sannan suka k'arisa cikin k'auyen sandey
A gidan su alhj Haruna suka sauka, basu k'arisa gidan angin baban Rukayya ba sai washe gari
Washe gari bayan su k'aya aya daga cikin k'ani alhj haruna yakarasu har gidan su iya nemawa K'amaruden auren Rukayya
Cikin ikon Allah basusha wani wahala ba, aka bawa K'amaruden auren Rukayya, musamman ma da akaga alhj Haruna ne jagoran tafiyar,yasa suka amince
Sabida susan halin alhj Haruna mutumin k'arkine ga sani yakama,nan suka ank'a komai a hannunsa hatta aurin auren su amince daya aurawa Rukayya aure achan inda yake da zama
Daga alhj Haruna har baffa suji dain haka sosai, washe gari suka juyokai suka dawo gwagwalada inda suke da zama a yanzu
Mu'azam shine mutum farko daya fara sanarwa K'amaruden
Sabida murna har saida K'amaruden yaiwa ubangiji sundaja batare da alwala ba hai da kabbara yana mik'a godiyarsa ga Allahu maaukakin sarki
A ban garen Rukayya kuwa daddy da kansa ya sanar da'ita hai da cewa duk abinda ake ciki kada tabari inna tasan da maganar auren
A lokacin Rukayya batayi kuka ba,saida takoma akinsu tafara kuka, kusan kwana Rukayya tai tana kuka
Tun daga lokacin Rukayya tashiga cikin damuwa, babu irin rarrashin da hakurin da Mu'azam bai bataba amma tak'i hakura
A 6angare K'amaruden kuwa shirye shirye yake babu kama hannu yaro, satinsu aya da dawowa suka zauna sukai shawara tsakani Daddy da Mu'azam sannan suka buk'aci baffa yazo, tare suka zauna sukai yanke rana nanda sati uku mai zuwa
A cewarsu bazasu yanke lokaci mai tsayi ba sabida kada wani abu yazo ya gibta, haka yasa suka yanke nanda sati uku
Jin anyanke masu rana yasa Rukayya k'ara shiga matsananci damuwa, kwata-kwata tadaina kula K'amaruden, koda yazo bataso fita, daga shi har yaya Mu'azam suyi mata magana su gaji amma bata chanza ba, gani haka yasa ran Mu'azam 6aci da kansa yacewa K'amaruden yayi hakuri ya daina zuwa gidan yaje yaci gaba da shirinsa aurene dai babu fashi
Hankalin K'amaruden yatashi sosai, sai yaji kamar yace ya hakura da auren amma kuma idan yace haka shine zai cutu
Hakan yasashi rungumar k'addara har lokacin da za'ayi aurensu yaga yanda zamansu zai kasance da'ita
Tun daga lokacin da akasawa Rukayya ranar aure daddy ya hanata talla,inna tayi bala'i tagaji hai da niman dalilin dayasa daddy hana Rukayya talla amma bata samu ba

****  Kwaci tashi babu wiya yau rana kwana uku auran aure Rukayya da K'amaruden duk gida biyu shirye-shirye sukeyi babu kama hannu yaro

K'arin takaici babu irin tambayar da inna batai wa Rukayya ba amma Rukayya tak'i fai mata"a duk lokacin da inna zata tambayi Rukayya cewa take itama batasan dalilinsa nayi haka ba
Hakan yasa yau inna tun safe take bala'in da masifa a cikin gidan
"daga daddy har yaya Mu'azam babu wanda ya tanka mata, hasalima tun safe sukabar gidan suka tafi kasuwa domin siyawa Rukayya kayan aki kama su gado da katifa, sai an abinda baza'a rasa ba a matsayinsa na mai k'aramin k'arfi
Tsinuwa da iban albarka babu irin wanda Rukayya bata shashi ba har cewa take idan taje tai cikin shege to wlhy banai gidan ba sai dai takoma kyauye gun uwarta taje ta haife amma ba'a gidana ba, duk zari'armu babu shege sabida haka idan aka ganki dashi to dan'gin uwarki kika ibo amma ba dangi mu
Duk maganar da inna keyi a kunni Rukayya amma a yau maganar inna bai 6atawa Rukayya rai ba,hasalima ba itace a gabanta ba abinda ya dameta ya dameta
Tana ciki masifarta kenan tajiyo sallamar alhj da wasu maza ana kama-kama, da sauri ta mik'e taje lek'owa domin gani meyene ake shigowa dashi,gani kayan forniture yasa inna mamaki hai da tambayar daga inna?
Daga daddy har yaya Mu'azam babu wanda ya tanka mata, bayan mutani da suka tayasu
kamo kayan zuwa ciki su fitane ba tare da daddy ya kalli sukanta ba yace"kiyi hakuri mancewa nayi ban sanar dake ba jibi idan Allah ya kaimu za'a aura wa Rukayya aure, yanzu haka yan gida suna hanya, azu mukai waya dasu sukace su wuto Jos
Inna dake tsaye ji takayi kamar amafarki takejin maganar da daddy keyi ba zahiri bane
Daddy yaci gaba da cewa"bari yanzu naje na siyo kayan cefane a ora sanwa kafin su iso
Gani inna tayi shiru ne yasa"daddy cewa"Rabi kina jina kuwa?
A lokacin ne ta farka daga barci da takeyi, take wani irin zufa yake faso mata,bakinta har rawa yakeyi tama rasa mezata ce
Ba tare da daddy yajira jin me zatace ba yai ficewarsa ya barta tsaye anan"yana ficewa tai kamar wacce aka tsikara,kalmar farko daya yafa fita daga bakin inna shine buran'uba kai,wlhy baka isa ba, waima na tambayeka kai a matsayinka nawa da zaka aurar da Rukayya batare da sani anginta ba,ba auren Rukayya ba koma menene bakada hutumi akai saini ninenan nakeda iko da Rukayya bakai ba, dan haka baka isa ba kayi kaan
Ba aure ba za'ayi mugani
Gani masifar bazai kamai mata ba gidan Talatuwa ta nufa
Tun kafin ta k'arisa cikin gidan take kwaawa Talatuwa kira
Talatuwa dake zaune a aki tanacin tuwon"jin yanayin da inna ta shigo dashine yasa"Talatuwa fitowa daga aki hannunta rik'e da kwanu tuwon
Duk a tunani Talatuwa mutuwa akai yasa inna shigowa tana kwaa mata kira tun daga bakin k'ofar gida
Ba tere da inna ta shiga daga ciki ba a tsakar gida ta tsaya take faiwa Talatuwa maganar auran Rukayya
Cike da mamaki Talatuwa tace mai?wani irin aure sai kace auren an k'wanso,abu babu sani babu sanayya
To shinaga Talatuwa
A'a babu mamaki wasa yake maki
Wani irin Talatuwa abinda kayan akima yanzu suka kawo
Kai fa??
Wlhy kuwa
Himm Rabi kenan, duk yanda akayi akwai lauje ciki nai
Yanzu abinda nakeso dake kije kiyi hakuri duk yanda za'ayi kada ki nuna ranki ya 6aci ko kinji zafin abinda yai idan ma zakiyi magana ki bari sai bayan biki
Wani irin sai bayan biki Talatuwa? A gaskiya bazan iya bari har sai bayan biki ba
A'a Rabi, duk abinda hakuri bai baki ba rashinsa bazai bakiba
Hmm Talatuwa kenan bari dai kigani
Ba tare da inna ta saurari abinda inna zatace ba tajuya ta koma gida
"duk tsane-tsinen da inna keyi babu wanda ya tanka mata har daddy yadawo daga kasuwa"kayan abinci yasiyo sosai dasu buhun shinkafa garin masara tumatur magi dadai sauransu
Koda daddy yace"inna tasa sanwa kafin bak'i su'iso"inna batai ba, zama tai taci gaba da masifa hai da zage-zage wai daddy bai auketa da mutunci ba inda ya auketa da daraja da mutunci da bai mata haka ba
Tsabar rashin lokacinta yasa ko sauraranta baiyi
A 6angaren gidan su K'amarden ma haka ne ranar ne malam Usman yake sanarwa iya da maganar auren K'amaruden
Nan itama iya tahau masifa da bala'i sabida faa bakimta har kunfa yakeyi,sani hali yafi sani kama babu wanda ya kula iya dake masifa
A ranar yaya Bala yaturo masu feti suka fente gidan kaf, hatta ban garen iya dana baffa saida sukasa shida K'amaruden aka gyara gidan tsaf
Koda daddy yace inna ta dora sanwa bata dora ba har saida suka iso, a lokacin da suka isone tafara kame kame tana burin kunya
Tare suka hau da k'anni daddy hai da Talatuwa sukai abinci,"k'anna maman Rukayya kuwa suna gefe
Washe gari daddy yake nunawa yan'uwasa dana mmn Rukayya kayan da yaiwa Rukayya
"Dukkansu godiya sukai tayi hai da sanyawa zuri'a albarka
Yan'uwan Rabi kuwa harsa kukansu
Bayan fitar daddy ne yan'uwan Rabi suka tasata gaba suna tambayar tata kayan da taiwa Rukayya
Nan inna tafara kame-kame gani batada mafita yasa tace masu ai haa kui sukai da daddy suka siya mata wannan kayan daya nuna masu
Su amsane dai kawai amma baan su yarda da maganar ba, sabida suriga susan waye alhj Haruna batun yauba yaiwa wasu banza ma bare Rukayya
aya daga cikinsu ce tasake tambayar, idan tace tare sukayi kayan to ina kayan aikin gida na mata?
Nanma shiru tasake yi
Tn daga sannan suka k'ara yarda da abinda zuciyarsu ke rawaita masu
Gani ba'a siye mata kayan aiki irin tamu ta mata ba yasa yan'uwan mmn Rukayya rokon Talatuwa data rakasu kasuwa sukaje suka siye mata na iya k'afinsu
Babu k'arya a ciki amna bazataje rage murya a mak'wabta ba
" ranar juma'a da safe misali k'arfe 
10:AM       Aka aura auren Rukayya da k'amaruden,murna a gun K'amaruden baya musaltuwa
"itako Rukayya tunda akace an aura auren babi abinda takeyi irin kuka
Duk kwalliyar da akai mata saida ta gogeshi sabida kuka, dan ma akwai yan'uwan mmn ta kusa da'ita, duk da kukan da takeyi bai hanasu bata kayan gyara tanasha ba, dama tunda suka iso gari suka tasata a gaba da gyara ciki da waje
Gani irin kayan alfarman da k'amaruden ya zubwa Rukayya yasa hankali inna tashi
"K'amaruden bamai kui bane amma yanada zuciya
Yamma nayi aroud eigth o'clock aka auki amarya zuwa gidan mijinta, da shiya akwai wani dinner da zasuyi hakan yasa ba'a 6ata masu lokaci ba tunda lokacin ruwane ake ciki
Kafin a fita da amarya saida aka kaita aikin daddy domin yai mata nasiha,alhamdllh daddy yaiwa Rukayya nasiha koda shine ya haifeta iya kacin abinda zai fai mata kenan
A 6angaren inna kuwa cewa tai batada abinda zatace sabida duk abinda zata fai dadi yariga daya fai sabida haka a tafi da'ita kawai
****
_WACECE RABI?_
Rabi haifafiyar garin *JALINGO* cikin wata k'aramar hukumar da ake kira *WURO SANDEY* ce, su biyu iyayansu suka haifa ita da Ibrahim,bayan auren Rabi da suwa shekaru Allah yaiwa iyayensu kasuwa
alokacin Ibrahim yana tanashinsa, da haka yaci gaba da kulawa da kansa,kasancewa su fulani yawone, bai san inda yan'uwansu suke ba, ita kuma Rabi tabi mijinta Abuja inda yake aiki alhj Haruna daRabi mak'wabtan junane amma su ba fulanin dashi bane zaune suke basu zuwa ko'ina daga tallen nono sai kiwo
Hakan yasa su sufi su Rabi karatun boko dana addini
Bayan dawowarsu abuja da wasu shekaru lokacin Rabi nada tsohun ciki aka aiko mata Allah yaiwa Ibrahim rasuwa, a lokacin tashiga matsananci damuwa, hakan yasa ta matsawa daddy zataje gida, gani tanada tsohun ciki yasa daddy cewz tayi hakuri har Allah ya sauketa lafiya
Bai kamata tayi tafiya da tsohun ciki haka ba, sannan kuma gashi dogon tafiyane
duk da haka Rabi bata yarda ba,gani haka yasashi shiryawa yaje
Bayan fitar matar Ibrahim tagaba yan'uwanta suka matsa mata da maganar aure
"jin labarin zatayi aure yasa Rabi shiryawa taje har garinsu wato *ZAMFA* taje tace sai dai abata Rukayya
Babu yanda ba'ayi da'ita ba data kyale Rukayya a hannu uwarta ba amma Rabi tak'i a cewarta jini gidansu zasu zuwa agola
Jin haka yasa mmn rumma cew a bar mata Rukayya zata rik'rta amma Rabi taki, a cewarta idan harta banzantar da Rukayya tamkar taci amanar Ibrahim ne musamman ma idan tai duba da yanda ya auketa tamkar uwa aya uba aya
Gashi abin hannunsa baya rufe mata ido, duk da yasan tanada miki mai hali, domin a lokacin alhj Haruna bai talauce ba
"amma haka Ibrahim yake nik'o garinsa tun daga jalingo har zuwa abuja sannan ya haa mata goma sha tara ta arziki ita da alhj Haruna ya kawo masu
Dalilin da yasa alhj Haruna kenan yake gani duk abinda yaiwa Rukayya bai biya Ibrahim ba
_wannan kenan_
Idan muka dawo 6an gaaren baffa kuma (malam usman kenan da matarsa hanne wanda kukafi sani da iya) su yan'asalin garin gwambe ne wanda aikin soja ne yakawosa abuja da zama
Anan duk suka haifi yaransu maza biyu mata uku, amma su mata suna gida gwambe suna aure, mazan ne suke tare dasu sabida yanzu baya aikin komai dama can barin kuratai in nan ne wanda basuyi karatun boko ba
kuma tunda yabar aiki babu wani abinda ke shigo maki sai abinda yara suka nimo akeci hakan yasa iya komawa sana'ar saida kamu
Marigayiya matar K'amaruden ta farko matsayin iya take agun iya sabida yarinyar k'anwarta ce
Ita da kanta taje gida gwambe ta nimowa k'amaruden aurenta
Ita kuwa khadijat matan yaya Bala barece a cikinsu, daga ita har iyayenta zaunanu abuja ne,shiya nimawa kansa aurenta, duk da a lokacin iya bataso ba amma gani sunace sunason juna yasa ta hakura
Duk irin abinda iya zatayi baffa baya magana, badan yana tsoronta ba sai dan asirin da tai masa,duk abinda tace ya zauna kenan babu chanji
Gani tana juya baffa yasa hatta surukanta ma juyasu takeyi, da farko ba k'aramin wiya khadijat tasha da iya ba amma banda yanzu, domin kusan nace yanzu haka iya tsoron khadijat takeyi
Sai dai matsala ayane da Khadijat ta samu waja hatta uban miji bata raga mawa, wanda take shakkansu daga Yaya Bala sai K'amaruden a gidan
_wannan kenan_
Idan muka koma 6an garen Talatuwa kuma
"yar asalin garin bauchi ne ita da mijinta marigayi , kasuwanci saida yalone yakawosu garin abuja, tun suna haya har Allah ya hure masa yai gini kansa
Daga ita har mijinta mutane arzikine hakan yasa sukada kyankyanwan fahimta da mutane unguwa, tunda malam isa yarasu Talatuwa bata ta6a kukan wani abuba sai an abinda baza'a rasa ba, sabida halin yau da gobe
Yaransu huu duk mata amma uku suna bauchi suna aure Jummalace kawai take tare da mmnta, itama in sabida lokacin da bbnta ya rasu tana yarinya ce yasa dangin uban suka barwa Talatuwa jummala
Lokacin-lokaci Talatuwa takan auki jummala suje gani gida, a wani zuwa gida da sukai ne dangin bbn jummala sukace tabasu jummala suyi mata aure
Babu yanda basuyi da Talatuwa ba amma tak'i a cewarta tanaso yarta tasamu ilimi zamani dana addimi, tunda yan'uwanta basu samu ba to bazata yarda itama tabi layin yan'uwanta ba
Jin haka yasa babu wanda yak'ara maganar abar masa jummala
Musamman ma idan sukai duba da tunda marigayi ya kwanta dama babu wanda ya ta6a taimaka mata
Hakan yasa Talatuwa ke saida shinkafa da wanke suke rufawa kansu asiri ita da yar'ta jummala babu wanda yaji babu wanda yagani, sannan kuma ga karatu da takeyi
_wannan kenan_
_barka da rana_

*_________9* Ana aukar amarya ba'a tsaya ko'ina ba sai gidan mijinta,k'anwar mmn Rukayya ce ke rik'e da hannuta tun daga saukarsu a mota har izuwa akinta
Basufi minti goma da shigowa ba saiga Khadijat ta shigo ita da wata mata
"bayan su gaigaisa Khadijat ke tambayan inda amarya take
aya daga cikin yan'kawo amarya ne ta amsa da cewa tana daga cikin aki
A lokacin su suna falo amarya kuma tana daga ciki
Tare suka shiga daga cikin bedroom in saida suka sake gaisawa da matar da take zaune da Rukayya sannan Khadijat ke sanar mata mai kwalliya ce tazo yimata,"gani Rukayya ta tsaya nok'e-nok'e alamar kunya yasa Khadijat cewa tai sauri sabida ita kaai ake jira, ango yariga daya shirya tuntuni
Duk da haka Rukayya bata motsa daga inda take ba har saida k'anwar mmnta tasa masu baki sannan Rukayya tamik'a kanta aka fara yimata kwalla
Basu 6ata lokaci a gun kwalliyar ba sabida lokaci yariga daya k'ure nan da nan suka maga, Khadijat ce ta mik'o mata wata leshi mai ruwan madara tace da'ita tasa, Rukayya na sawa aka aura mata an'kwalli sannan sukai sallama da k'anwar mmn
Itama fatan alkhairi mmn Saude tai masu, Khadijat ce ke rik'e da hannun Rukayya har suka fita, suna fita kai tsaye 6an garensu ta kaita ashe K'amaruden achan yake yana jiransu
Suna shiga da sauri K'amaruden dake zaune a falo ya mik'e da fain hannunki da aiki, Allah dai ya biyaki uwar gida ran gida daga ke narufe k'ofa
Cikin raha Khadijat ke cewa"na yaushe kuma, bayan aikin gama yariga daya gama
Au baki yarda da cewa daga ke babu wata ba kenan?
Na yarda amma
Sai kuma tai shiru
K'amaruden yace"amma me?
Hannu ta aga tana nuna masa Rukayya batare da tayi magana ba
Amma da yake yagano da sauri yasa hannu ya kamo Rukayya dake tsaya gefe kanta a sukuye yarik'ota hai da cewa"ije wannan maganar kema kinsan abinda zataba yuwu bane
Duk dariya sukasa, gani ya rik'e hannu Rukayya gam yasa"Khadijat cewa kai babu koan karan nan da akeyi?
Kefa kikasan wani abu wai shi kara, nidai kinga tafiyarmu domin idan na biye taki sai kisa abokaina suka laifina
Yana rik'e da hannu Rukayya suka fita har bakin game
"wasu abokansa da suka rage wanda ya zamana dole saida ango zasu tafi
Suna gani fitowar K'amaruden sukasa masa ihu hai da kiran ango kasha mai
"duk abinda sukeyi Mu'azam baice dasu uffan ba, kamar baya gun idan ba murmushi ba babu abinda yakeyi
Babu kunya K'amaruden ke basu ansa da zan dai sha amma bansha koba
Rukayya dake tsaye daga aya kunya ya mamayeta ji takeyi kamar k'asa ya bue da shige ciki sabida kunya
Duk abinda suka faiwa K'amaruden saiya meda masu,"gani haka yasa Mu'azam tafiya yashiga mota
Nan suma suka fara shishiga motoci na amarya da ango shine a tsakiya wasu a gaba wasu kuma na biye dasu a baya, ga sanyayar sauti dake tashi
Suna isa saida abokan ango suka k'ara feshe mashi jiki da turare, gani babu wata mace da zatatiwa Rukayya yasa K'amaruden ansar tuaren dake hannu aya daga cikin abokansa da kansa yaiwa Rukayya feshin turare a jiki sannan yarik'e mata hannu suka k'arisa daga ciki
Bayan su zauna a mazaunisu sannan aka buk'aci babban abokin ango yafito ya bue taro da addu'a
"duk yanda Mu'azam yaso 6uyewa amma babu hali dole yafito yai addu'a sannan aka sake cewa ana buk'atar aya daga cikin abokan ango yazo yai tak'aitance bayani akan ango da amarya
Babu yanda ba'ayi da wasu daga cikin abokan dasu fito suyi bada tak'aitance tahiri akan ango ba amma suk'i, dole Mu'azam yai na ango sannan yazo yaiwa amarya
Duk holl in ya auka da tafi sannan wasa yafara, K'amaruden yasha wara harda girgiza ba abokansa ba hatta jama'ar da sukazo masa saida K'amaruden yabasu dariya
Ita kuwa Rukayya kunya ya hanata sakat da haka har taro yatashi, basu koma gida ba sai misalin biyu na dare sannan suka koma gida
Da yake akwai gajiya yasa duk yanda mmn Saude tayi da Rukayya datasha magani amma taki, haka tagaji ta kyaleta zuwa safe
Tunda aka fara hidimar bakin Rukayya mernal bata yini a gida
Tun yan'biki basuyi magana ba har yakai ga saida sukai magana, nan ma inna tasake rawaita masu wani k'aryan da cewa karatune yasha mata kai shiyasa batada lokacin kanta bare na wani
Allah yabada sa'a kawao sukace batare da sun yarda da maganar taba
Sani hali yafi sani kama yasa gari na wayewa baffa ya aikowa yan'kawo amarya da kayan shayi batare daya tsaya jiran iya ba
Hakama da rana musamman yasa yaya Bala da K'amaruden yace ala dole saidai suje suyi masa siyayyan kayan abimci su kawo masa sannan kuma wadatance yake buk'ata
Babu yanda basuyi da baffa daya fai masu abinda zaiyi dashi amma baffa yaki
"gani haka yasa yaya Bala cewa K'amaruden ya tashi suje
Bayan fitarsu ne yaya Bala ke cewa babu mamaki idan ba yan'kawo amarya ne baffa zaibada a dafa masu ba
Kai haba yaya idan hakane, ita kuma iya fa?
Kamar yaya iya fa?amma kanaji kana gani tunda aka fara jidimar bakin nan batace komai ba
Eh hakane amma gani nayi bai dace tayi haka ba, sabida akwai bak'i yanzu magana batada wiya sai kaga anje da'ita ana yaata wanda tai dama wanda batai ba duk za'ace tayi kuma jama'a su yarda tunda suriga da susan halinta, idan ma labari sukeji to sugani ma idansu
"
Nidai har ga Allah yaya halin iya yana damuna
K'amaruden kenan, bakai kaan ba har dani amma yaya zamuyi dole sai hakuri, sabida bamuda tamkarta a duniya duk wanda zai somu baranta ne, nidai abinda nasoke dakai shine muci gaba da hakuri har Allah ya kawo lokacin rabuwarmu
Da haka dai sukai tayi suna tafe suna maganar halin iya, hai da bawa K'amaruden shawarwarin yanda zai zauna da matarsa, da haka har suka isa kasuwa sukai siyayyar da baffa yasasu
Suna dawowa kai tsaye yace abawa Khadijat ta dafawa yan'kawo amarya
"gani rana tayi yasa yan'kawo amarya aukar amarya zuwa 6abgaren iya koda suka isa suyi sallama yakai baki uku iya najinsu amma bata amsa ba
Maje faa banza bare sarki yai sak'o, dama chan iya ba amsa sallama takeyi ba bare yanzu tafara ta kansu
K'anni K'amaruden ne suka amsa masu hai da cewa kushigo bismillarku
koda suka shiga duk su gaisa da mutane dake cikin akin amma banda iya gani haka yasa aya daga cikinsu da yake ita mai zafice nan take ta k'ule inda take shiga banan take fita ba, babu irin hak'urin dasu salma da zahra basu bataba amma tak'i yin shiru
Gani yanda take kunfar baki yasa iya mik'ewa tabar masu akin ba tare data tanka ba,suma mik'ewa sukai hai da kama ita mai masifar suka fita daga akin
Rukayya dake duk'e taci kuka har taji babu dai, bayan fitarsu da sauri salma taje ta sanarwa yaya Bala abinda ake ciki" shima da sauri yabiyota zuwa 6an garen iya, ko kafin su yaya Bala su'isa mutane subar shiyan iya
Babusu babu iya, juyawa yai zuwa akin baffa yaje ya sanar masa abinda iya ta aikata
Koda baffa yasa aka kira iya,daga tambayarta abinda tai ta kyauta kenan?
Babu abinda yafito daga bakin iya sai"menayi kuma da zaka sani a gaba kanamin wani faa kamar yan gabanka, idan daga cikin abinda na shirwa wannan aurene banyi komai koba yanzu aka fara
Kai kuma,"kan yaya Bala batako"da kakawo ubanka k'arata wlhy Allah idan baka fita daga idona ba saina tsine mak
da sauri yaya Bala yasa hannu ya rufewa iya baki ai da zubewa a gabanta yana mai niman gafararta
Sannan taci gaba da cewa"idan suji haushi su auketa su tafi da'ita idan banda rashin jin magana irin ta yaron yau me ake da itin wannan zuri'a masu k'ashin tsiya matsiyata kawai wanda basu gaji arziki ba
Duk maganar da iya keyi baffa bai tanka mata har tak'are,"da isa iya ke fai ai wlhy daga ita harshi K'amaruden sai su gane basuda wayo
Allah ya shiryeki kawai baffa yace"yaya Bala da salma kuwa suyi kuka har su gaji,amma dukabinda ake ciki basu bari K'amaruden yasani ba
Gani idan taci gaba da zama a gidan za'a kwashi an kallo yasa mm Haule cewa su tashi sutafi gida
kafin su tafi saida sukasa aka kira masu K'amaruden suka k'ara jadada masa amanar da Allah ya bashi, idan har yabari uwarsa ta citar da'ita Allah bazai barshi ba
K'amaruden yace"yaji kuma insha Allahu hakan ma bazai kasance ba,K'amaruden yai mamaki sosai duk da basu fitowa direct suka fai masa ba amma da alama akwai wani abu a k'asa
Gani bazai iya hakuri ba yasashi zuwa gun yaya Bala domin tambayarsa ko akwai abinda yafaru
"nan yaya Bala ya boye masa yace babu komai, yana zuwa gun baffa kuwa baffa ya kwashe komai ya fai maki hai da cewa kada yaje ya tunkareta da kowace magana ya fita harkanta kawai
Nan yasake kwashe abinda taiwa yaya Bala ya fai masa,"hakan yasa K'amaruden razana tsoron zuwa ya tunkari iya da wani magana ya kamashi
Koda suka kamo gidan inna babu abinda sukeyi irin maganar iya, kowa da abinda yake fai akanta
hiran kenan sukai tayi har dare, masu haa kaya kuma sunayi sabida a gobe sukeson komawa gida jalingo
Bayan sallar isha aka rako ango akin, a falo suka zauna, K'amaruden ne yashiga daga ciki yaje kiran Rukayya
"koda ya shiga cikin kuka yasameta tanayi wiwi kamar wacce aka daka
Murmushi kawai K'amaruden yai sannan ya k'arisa inda take cikin sanyi murya yake kiran sunanta,"Rukky! Rukky!!Rukky!!!
Duk Rukayya naji amma tai shiru, gani haka yasa"K'amaruden duk'awa a gabanta hannu yasa ya yaye mata mayafin da take lulu6e dashi
Da sauri rukayya takama mayafin tarik'e da k'arfi, murmusawa K'amaruden yasakeyi sannan yasakan mata mayafinta hai da cewa dan Allah ki tashi muje falo akwai bak'i suna jiranmu
Rukayya dake zaune bata aga kanta ba bare ta nuna tasan ana magana da'ita
K'amaruden yai magana har ya gaji,"suma abokan da suke falo zaune su auka mancewa dasu ne yai, har sufara maganar tafiya"jin haka yasa K'amaruden mik'ewa daga duk'en da yake batare da Rukayya ta ankara ba ji kawai tai anyi sama da'ita
Ihu tasa hai da kiran Allanta,"gani yafara tafiya da'ita yasa Rukayya cewa ya sauketa zatayi tafiya da k'afarta
Nan suka kama cuku-cuku kamar masu anbe duk da haka baisa K'amaruden ya sauketa ba saida sukakai bak'in k'ofar fita falo sannan ya sauketa hannu yasa zai gyara mata mayafinta dake biye dasu
Da sauri Rukayya tajanye jikinta daga nasa hai da yayuban mayafinta ta gyara da kanta sai da ta gama gyarawu tsaf sannan K'amaruden yace"muje ko?
K'amaruden na gaba Rukayya na biye dashi a baya har suka isa falo, da sallama suka shiga, bayan su zauna sannan aka umarci aya daga cikin abokan ango daya fara yimasu addu'a kafin sufara cewa komai
A wannan karon kam Yaya Mu'azam bai yiba, gani haka yasa aya daga cikinsu yai masu addu'ar sannan kowa yakawo irin nasa nasihohin hai da basu shawarwari sannan kuma da fatan zaman lafiya
Rukayya dake zaune kusa da K'amaruden idan ba kuka ba babu abinda takeyi,"yaya Mu'azam dake zaune kusa da K'amaruden duk kukan da Rukayya keyi tamkar a kunnisa takeyi gani bazai iya jure gani tana kuka ba tun kafin saura su mik'e tuni ya rigasu mik'ewa hai da cewa kuzo mutafi
Ko kafin suce uffan tuni Mu'azam yariga daya fice daga falon,"gani haka yasa sauran sukabi bayansa hai da ijewa K'amaruden ledar kazan da suka siye masa
Shima dayake zaune mik'ewa yai zaije masu rakiya, har yakai bakin k'ofa suka turesa cikin wasa daya koma ciki suyafe masa
Godiya yai masu hai rufe k'ofar falo yadawo ya zauna a k'asa suna fuskantar juna shida Rukayya
Gani har a lokacin bata daina kuka ba yasa K'amaruden mik'ewa yakoma kan kujera ya zauna kusa da'ita hannu yasa ya dafo kafaarta hai da kiran sunanta Rukky ta!Rukky!! Rukky!!!"har yanzu kukane kikeyi haka? Dan Allah kiyi hakuri kiyi shiru, wlhy harga Allah banason gani wannan hawaye dake zubowa daga idanuki, a duk lokacin da naga hawayenki na zubowa jinshi nakeyi tamkar garwashin wutane aka orami a zuciyata
Idan baso kikeyi kiga zuciyata har izuwa gangan jikina kiga su k'oneba dan Allah kiyi hakuri da kukun nan haka, dan Allah
hannu yasa yaciro handkerchief daga aljihunsa yana goge mata hawayen hai da fai mata kalamai masu dai da kwantar da hankali
Saida K'amaruden ya k'are share mata tsaf sannan yasa hannusa bibiyu ta tallafo fuskanta suna kallon juna ido cikin ido sannan yaci gaba dan Allah dubi yanda kika 6ata kwallayarki sabida kuka pls kada na sake gani hawaye na zubowa daga kan wannan kyankyawar fuskan taki, kin jiko?
"kai kawai Rukayya ta aga masa alamar eh
Rungumeta K'amaruden yai a k'irjinsa yana mai shafe mata baya, ba Rukayya ba hatta K'amaruden in dake rungume da ita saida yaji wani iri"duk da ba wannan ne na farko a gunsa ba amma a yanda yakeji kansa yau ko wanda bai ta6a kwanciya da mace ba iyaka kenan
Joystick in take ta yamik'e yacika wanda fal sai faman motsi yakeyi yana nima mahai
"ba tare da Rukayya ta ganeba hannu K'amaruden yasa yakamo joystick in ya turata tsakankani cinyarsa ya matsashi tsaff
A 6angaren Rukayya kuwa idan banda fauwar gaba da takeyi hai da rawan jiki babu abinda takeyi
Sabida furkici da tsoro jikinta har rawa yakeyi,musamman ma irin rik'on da K'amaruden yai mata koshi kaai ya'isa yasa Rukayya tsorata
Ya jima yana mai sauke ijiyar numfashi, musamman ma yanda yaji nonuwarta na gugan k'irjinsa, duk da cikin riga suke amma hakan bai hana K'amaruden jin ni'imtance sanyi a zuciyarsa ba
Sun jima a haka sannan K'amaruden yasa hannu a hankali ya daga Rukayya daga jikinsa hai da janyo ledar dake kusa dashi yana cewa bari muci abinci ko?
Shiru tai masa," kwance ledar yai ya bue bakinsa K'amaruden bai tuna da batun plate ba saida ya ciro kazar daga cikin leda sannan yatuna da plate
Batare da yace da'ita komai ba, mik'ewa yai yaje ya auke plate hae da cups daga kitchen yadawo juye kazan yai a cikin plate sannan yace da'ita ta sauko muci

Kamar yaya kin k'oshi?    Nariga da naci abinci
A'a ban yarda ba, wacce daban wannan kuma shima daban
"dan haka ki sauko kawai muci ko kuma na baki da kaina
Har Rukayya ta bue baki da niyyar zatai magana
ko kafin tace uffan jinta kawai ta a jikinsa ta fao
Taso tashi ta gudu amma babu hali sabida irin rikon da yai mata, hannu aya yasa auko cinyar kazar yakai mata baki
"Da sauri Rukayya ta auke fuskanta hai da cewa ka kyaleni zanci da kaina
K'amaruden dake rike da ita yace"bazan sakeki ba sabida idan na sakeki nasan baci zakiyi ba
Zanci mana
A'a ban yarda ba
Allah kuwa
Kice wlhy
Nan tai shiru bata sake tanka masa ba
sabida dama maganar da takeyi dolene yasata tanka masa
Gani ta aure fuska yasa K'amaruden sakinta hai da cewa to tashi kici
Gefe Rukayya takoma ta zauna sannan tafara ciki, kaan-kaan kamar bazataci ba, baifi sau biyu dataci ba tace takoshi
Shine dai yaci sosai, sannan ya tsiyaya masu Fresh milk yamik'a mata,shima in kaan kawai ta kur6a ta'ije kofin
Jin tace ta koshi yasa shima ije nasa ya mike hai da cewa bismillh
"tantanra ragowar yai ya'ije a gefe sannan suka shige daga cikin bedroom
Suna shiga gefe Rukayya tasamu taja ta tsaya,"murmushi kawai K'amaruden yai sannan yace muje daga ciki muyi alwala ko
yana maganar ne hai da nuna mata bathroom

Buta ya auko yamik'a mata hai da cewa bismillh
tana amsa ta duk'a farayi, duk abinda Rukayya keyi idon K'amaruden na kanta har tak'are sannan shima yai nasa
Suna fita bedroom yajasu sallah raka'a biyu, bayan su idarne K'amaruden yaora hannunsa bisa kan Rukayya ya jima yana Addu'a hai da rokon Allah yabasu zaman lafiya
Duk abinda yakeyi kan Rukayya na duk'e a k'asa har K'amaruden yak'are addu'a bata aga kai ba
Bayan ya k'are addu'arsa ne yai mata tambayoyi akan tsarki da wanka, duk ta amsa masa babu kuskure alhadmllh yace saida yamik'e sannan itama ta mik'e hai da kwashe sallayar ta ninke
Bakin gado takoma ta zauna hai da zabga uban tagumi
"K'amaruden kuwa towel dake kan wandrobe ya auka yanufi bathroom bai fito ba saida wanka, sannan yafito aure da towel a k'ugunsa, batare yada kallo Rukayya ba yace"tashi kije kiyi wanka sabida rage gajiya ko?
ayan extra towel in yai yamik'a mata sannan yanufi gaban mirrow,zama yai na musamman yafara shafa mai hai da feshe jikinsa da turarukan dake jere gaban mirrow

K'amaruden dake zaune gaba mirrow ta cikin glass ya hangota,cikin zuciyarsa ya murmusa sannan ya mik'e gun wandrobe yaje ya bue kayan barci yaciro nata da nasa sannan ya meda murfin wandrobe in yarufe
Mik'a mata kayan yai hai da cewa gashi kisa
ba tare daya kauce ba aukar nasa kayan yai yasa,"gani haka yasa Rukayya rumtsa idonta, shiko K'amaruden ko'a jikinsa
Yana gama sawa, gani duk har lokocin tana tsaye bata gusa daga inda take ba yasa"K'amaruden cewa auka kisa mana, kosai nasa maki da kainane?
A sanyaye Rukayya tasa hannu ta kwashi kayan zuwa bathroom, tanasa kayan tana kwalla kamar wacce aka tilasa mata, da haka har tak'are tajima tana kallo kanta a mirrow dake bathroom tana tunani yanda zata fito suyi ido biyu da K'amaruden a haka
Shirun da K'amaruden yaji yayi yawa yasashi tashi daga bakin gadon da yake zaune yanufo bedroom in
"tura k'ofar da K'amaruden zai yi yasa,"Rukayya juyowa da sauri
Suna haa ido da K'amaruden da sauri tasa hannu ta rufe k'irjinta, dai-dai nonuwarta inda sukafi ko'ina baiyana daga halittan jikinta
Da sauri K'amaruden ya k'arisa gunta hai da fain oyoyo matata, jikinsa har tsuma yakeyi, wani irin runguma K'amaruden yakaiwa Rukayya dake tsaye a gun kamar gwalki
Yajima yana rungume da'ita a bathroom hai da shafe mata dukkani ilihirin jikinta, gani k'afafurwasa bazasu aukesa ba yasa K'amaruden aukar Rukayya caffff zuwa bed hai da kashe light

jin haka yasa nurse in kamawa Rukky hannu suka zauna sannan tace yarinya kiyi hakuri ki kwantar da hankalinki kada kisa damuwa a ranki har wani ciwo ya kamaki,abinda nakeso dake ki kwantar da hankalinki kibawa yaronki kyankyawar kulawa yanda ya dace,idan maganar ciki kuma kafin kubar asibiti kuje kuga likita zai rubuta maku magugunar daya kamata dake baby kuyi amfani dashi, sannan kuma ina me baku shawar kada kuyi gaggawar cireshi a nono kubarsa yasha har sai cikin yakai wata bakwai sannan zaku yayesa insha Allahu babu abinda zai samesa

"take inna ta hau masifa tana fai eh ba dole ba kaiwa Rukky ba,ai kodan neman suna ma ka kai mata

"har tai ta k'are be tanka ta ba
bayan kwana biyu da suna yan jalingo suka koma gida

"gani tantagaryan sabfa kui a gabansa yasa malam cewa ta bashi sunan J-boy kawai ta tafi ya bata nan da kwana biyu
"Sofy na bashi sunan J-boy sukai sallama ta koma gida

ina na ta6a gani haka?ko kuma kin kurmance ne ban sani ba?,idan banda haka najima a bakin gate ina hurn amma bakizo kin bue min ba
bayan kinsan daga tafiya muke dole akwai gajiya amma dan tsabar bakin ciki kika shanyamu kika barmu a waje kamar wasu yan iska ko?
tou wlh sainayi maganiki kuma sai nuna maki kuskuren yin haka,sabida gobe idan nace maki gani a hanya tun kafin na iso zakizo bakin gate ki jira isowata sannan ki bue min gate in
"Wawiyar banza sha-sha-sha banza dabba da k'ik'iya mara zuciya,wlh Meenal nayi bak'in cikin sanani da nayi domin baki dace dani na
commo kwanciyar aure baki iya ba
sai dai ki kwanta kamar jaka na hauki
dubi Sofy guda nawa take amma har tafiki sani yanda ake sarrafa namiji
sati aya kawai da mukayi da ita irin abubuwan da tai min wlh Meenal harki koma ga Allah bazaki iya ba
k'uluk'ulun bak'in ciki daya kama Meenal batasan lokacin data dake masa tsawa hai da mik'ewa tana fain ya isheka haka J-boy
Ka barni naji da abinda ke damuna
Turo k'ofar Sofy ne yasa Meenal dakatar da abinda takeyi
" da sallama Sofy ta shigo akin hai da cewa"antyna sannu da gida"
A sanyaye Meenal ta koma ta zauna
"Sofy ta k'ariso bakin gadon inda BASIK yake tasa hannu ta aukesa hai da cewa"oyoyo-oyoyo my son kayi missing in daddy ko?wlh ba laifi bane laifin daddyn kane shine ya hanamu dawowa sai yau
sunkuyar dakai Meenal tai tana kuka mara sauti
"shima J-boy in dake tsaye komawa yai kamar dolo,sabida abinda Sofy keyi
"Taci gaba da cewa kasan halin daddy naka shegen jaraba ne dashi ga naci kaman kuturu
sannan ta juya gun Meenal tace" antyna ina kwana ya gida da zaman kaaita?tou gamu yau Allah ya dawo damu,da fatan mu sameki lafiya?
"Shiruuu da Meenal tai bata amsata ba
haka yabawa Sofy damar ora mata hannu akai tana fain antyna lafiya kuwa kodai
" da sauri J-boy ya tareta da kodai me?
dallah shige muje,ba komai bane ke cinta irin kishi kuma wlh sai dai ta mutu domin nidake mutu ka raba
Ije mata yaronta muje mu kwanta mu huta da gajiyar hanya
"Murmushi Sofy tai ba tare dace komai ba,sannan kuma taki ije BASIK in
tana rumgume dashi ta kami hanya,har takai bakin kofa J-boy yasake magana sannan tadawo ta ije BASIK suka fita
suna fita Meenal ta rusa da wani irin matsaninci kuka mai cin rai hai da birgima akan gadon tana kiran wayoooo Allanta
"Tunda su J-boy suka shiga aki basu fito ba sai bayan azahar
" J-boy ne ya fara fitowa aure da towel a k'ugunsa yana rink'e dashi ya shigo akin meenal da sallama
dai-dai lokacin ta idar da sallah kenan tana sallama J-boy ya shigo gani ta aga hannu alamar addu'a takeyi yasa J-boy samun bakin gado ya zauna yana jiran ta idar
"Meenal ta jima tana addu'a sannan ta shafa,tana shafawa ta auko carbi da niyyar lazumi
" da sauri J-boy ya dakatar da ita hai da cewa"wai ke wani irin sallah kikeyi kamar wacce ta kashe mutu
nafi sama da minti ashirin ina zaune ina jiranki amma
"juyowa meenal tai ta kallesa sannan tace"hatta sallar ma sai kayi magana eyye J-boy?
hattaranta yai da ke dallah,tun kafin a haifeki nakeyi sallah, idan zaki tashi kije ki auko mana abinci tou idan kuma hakan bazai samu ba sai naje na auka da kaina
"Wani abinci kuma?nifa ban dafa komai ba,hasalima yanzu nake tashi daga bacci"
" wani irin maganar banza kikeyi haka eyye meenal?, mu dawo daga tafiya in shine bazaki mana abinci ba?ko so kike ita data dawo daga tafiya ta shiga kici tai maki abinci?
wlh wlh wlh meenal tun kafin ranki ya ba6a kije ki ora mana abinci idan ba haka jikinki zai gaya mana
dan nayi maki dukan banza ba wani abu bane a ganu
Banza wawiya kawai wacce bata iya tarban miji ba
wlh meenal kinji kunyar duniya tunda har Sofy ta fiki iya sarrafa miji
Na baki nanda minti ashirin kafin sukai ki tabbata ki gama idan ba haka hhhhhh yarinya
"Cikin isgili J-boy ke maganar
kai kawai meenal ta kaa ba tare dace dashi komai ba ta ije carbin dake hannunta ta mik'e,bayan ta mik'e ne ta cire hijibinta sannan ta fita zuwa kici
Tana gaba yana biye da ita a baya
"Meenal tazo wucewa kenan ta jiyo Sofy na kiran dealing ins kashiga ne eyye?plssss kadawo mu kwanta,kaji darling"Kai meenal ta kaa hai da jan an gutun tsaki ta tashige kici
Tana shiga kici ta kunna gas duka kai biyun aya ta ora farar shinkafa aya kuma ta kuma ta ora miyan tumatur hakan yasa bata 6ata lokaci ba tao ta gama
tana saukewa kula ta auko guda biyu na aya ta zuba shinkafa aya kuma ta zuba miya sannan ta kwaso zuwa falo
tana isa falon su J-boy da Sofy suna fitowa daga aki a guje yana biye da ita
Da badan ta kauce ba dasu bangajeta
"Cakaf meenal taji anyi mata
" Sofy ce ta rik'eta sai faman cewa take anty kin gansa ko,ni dai anty ki rabani dashi dan Allah"Sofy na bayan meenal J-boy kuma yana gabanta sai faman jujuyata sukeyi
idan J-boy zai kamo Sofy igije meenal takeyi jikin J-boy in
"shi kuma ya igije meenal gefe
babu yanda meenal batai da Sofy data saketa ta ije kular abincin dake hannunta ba amma Sofy tak'i
gashi kadan yarage miyar ya zube
Gani haka yasa meenal fisge jikinta daga hannu Sofy ta duk'a ta ije abinci sannan ta mik'e,har ta juya
"Sofy ta tsalla sai jikin meenal tana fain gashi nan-gashi nan anty
shan gaban meenal tai tasake igizota zuwa falon in
daga J-boy har Sofy inba dariya ba babu abinda sukeyi
"Meenal kuwa tamkar ball suka medata idan wannan ya juyata nan sai wannan ya juyata
" gani haka yasa meenal ban kae J-boy gefe a guje ta mik'e zuwa aki tana shiga ta fashe da kuka,hai da cewa"wannan wani irin rainin hankaline haka eyye sabida Allah
Nan suka k'ari guje-gujensu sannan sukaci abinci
bayan su gama cin abinci ne suka tashi mik'e suka nufi cikin aki domin yin kawan
anan suka kulolin da plate in da sukai amfani dashi
"tunda meenal ta shiga aki bata fito ba har suka k'are shirinsu suka fito
" gani kayan da sukai amfani dashi agun ba's kauda ba yasa J-boy kwaata mata kiran meenal! Meenal!! Meenal!!!"kamar daga sama meenal kejiyo kiran J-boy
Kamar bazata amsa shiba sai kuma dai ta amsa da na'am
"Basik na hannunta ta fito falo inda suke tsaye
tana fitowa tace" gani"
Dan mutan gidanku me kike jira da bakozo kin kwashe kayan nanba?"eyye ko badake nakeyi ba meenal?
"ago ido tai ta kallesa ba tare da tace dashi komai ba"
Ina magana dake nefa,amma baki tanka niba
ko bakiji nane eyye?
" kayi hakuri ina aki ina watsaea Basik ruwa ne sabida kukan zafi da yakeyi
"Tou da kika gama meya hanaki fitowa?
"Ai banma gama ba kiranka ne ya katseni
"kwafa J-boy yai hai da cewa"uhmm Allah ya taimakeki
Duk'awa tai da niyyar kwashe kayan
"hannu Sofy ta mik'a mata alamar ta bata yaron
"A'a ki barshi kawai meenal tace"
"Dan Allah anty ki kawoshi kinga gashima aiki zakiyi
"Dallah idan taki ki barta dashi, batama goge zaki tayata ba
" murmushi kawai Sofy tai,sannan tasa hannu ta amshi Basik da k'arfi ta 6a6aroshi daga jikin meenal
"Itako meenal sai faman cewa" take barshi kawai"uwa da ah sai Allah take Abdul Basik yasa kuka yana me kallo mamansa
"jin kukansa meenal ta mik'e hai da mik'a hannu a bata shi
"Muje kawai Sofy tacewa J-boy""Wani irin muje?kiga yaro na kuka kice muje,ko kinada nono da baza bashine?
"Take ta wayance masa da cewa" ba komai me yasashi kuka ba illa k'iwa,muje idan yaga babu mamansa agun zaiyi shiru
kaga daga nan zaije ya gaida hjy matarsa
babu mamaki ta juma bata gansa ba"
bata saurari abinda J-boy zaice ba tafice daga falon zuwa waje
"Shima J-boy in binta yai a baya
" meenal dake tsaye ido kawai ta bisu dashi galala kamar wata sakarai
gaba aya kanta ya aure tama rasa me zatace game da al'amarin Sofy
Cikin zuciyarta tace"anya kuwa akwai k'amshin gaskiya a al'amarin Sofy kuwa?lallai ya kamata na dae na cire duk wani tsoro dake zuciyata domin na kwatar wa kaina yan'ci
idan ba haka ba inaji ina gani zata rabani da ana ko kuma ta halakarmin dashi
kuma ta Allah ba tata ba wlh
batasan yanda akayi cikinsa ba haka kuma bata isa ta rabani dashi ba
Yana shima yaje mota suka fice zuwa gidan hjy
J-boy na tuk'i Sofy na rarashin Basik da haka har yai bacci,yanayi yana ijiyar zuciya da haka har suka iso gidan hjy
!!!!

_*BIMILLAHI RAHMANI RAHIM*_
*PAGE 1*         *PART 2*
_______Shia da wasu mintoci su J-boy suka iso garin abuja
"Meenal dake zaune a falo zabga uban tagumi tai sai kwallar dake kai kawo a fuskanta
ga BASIK dake kan cinyarta yana shan nono
kamar a mafarki tajiyo hurn in mota a k'ofar gida
da yake a lokacin bata kawo su J-boy zasu dawo a irin wannan lokacin ba
sabida yau suke da sati aya da tafiya
duk da sati ayan da sukayi ta jishi kamar shekara ne
hurn aketayi babu k'abk'abtawa
gani haka sai ta mik'e talek'a windom can ta hango motar J-boy ne
da sauri ta fita daga falon zuwa waje domin bue masa gate
"ga BASIK dake rungume a kafaarta
har takai tsakar gida sai kuma wata zuciya tace da ita
"haba Meenal meye kikeyi haka kamar mara zuciya"Idan banda rashin zuciya irin taki meye abin tafiya kije ki bue masa gate,mutumi da bedamu dake ba bare kuma an daya haifa
tunda ya tafi be kiraki yaji yaya kike kinci bakici ba oho yake can yana holewarsa da amaryansa ya mance dake shine zakije bue masa gate
dallah juya ki koma ciki idan yaji haushi ya fito ko ta fito su bue gate in da kansu
ko ba komai ki nuna masa kinada k'ima da aji
Shiruuu Meenal tai na an wani dak'ikai sai kuma ta juya zuwa ciki
zuciyarta kuwa taci gaba da azaza mata wuta da cewa"ai ko dabba ka ije zaka juyo ka dubi lafiyarsa bare mutum dan rainin wayo kawai wlh idan kika kyale ke kikaso
"Da haka har Meenal ta shiga daga ciki
tana shiga kai tsaye akinta tashige hai da turo k'ofan"
"Shiru shiru ba'azo an bue masu gate ba
ina zuwa kawai J-boy yace" fita yai daga cikin motar yaje ya shiga ta k'arami k'ofa sannan ya bue gate in
"Bayan ya bue gate ine yaje ya shigo da motar daga ciki,bayan yai faki suka fito yaje ya bude but ya keso kayansu yana gaba Sofy na biye dashi a baya suka k'arisa daga ciki"
"Da sallama suka shiga falon, gani babu kowa a falo yasa Sofy kwaawa Meenal kira da anty!antyna!!antyna!!!kodai bacci kikeyi ne?
"Tsaki J-boy yai hai da cewa" babu wani baccin da takeyi tsabar rainin wayone kawai irin tata
dariya Sofy tai hai da cewa"a'a J-boy antyna bazata jimu ta kyale ba
yanzu dai bani key naje na bue k'ofa
"Hannu yasa cikin aljihunsa yaciro key ya mik'a mata
" tana amsa taja jakar kayansu zuwa akin
"Lokacin Meenal na zaune a bakin gado tanajin duk maganar da sukeyi amma bata tankasu ba
Sofy na shiga akinta J-boy ya shiga akin Meenal ba tare da yai sallama ba
" Meenal dake zaune ji kawai tai an banko k'ofa an shigo
da yake tasan babu wanda zai iya mata haka sai J-boy, hakan yasa bata aga kai ta kalleshi ba
Cikin tsawa yace"ke wai wacce irin yarinyace haka?idan banda ke jakace mara tarbiya kin tashi daga gidan da babu tarbiya bare a koya maki yanda ake tarban miji
ina na ta6a gani haka?ko kuma kin kurmance ne ban sani ba?,idan banda haka najima a bakin gate ina hurn amma bakizo kin bue min ba
