_*BISMILLAHI RAHMANI RAHIM*_
______Suna isa bayan J-boy yai faki suka fito daga mota
Sofy na rumgume da Basik suka k'arisa cikin gida, J-boy ne ke gaba Sofy na biye dashi a baya
"Da sallama suka shiga akin hjy""Hjy dake zauna tana gyara kayan miya, tai masu sannu da zuwa
zubewa sukai a gabata hai da haa baki suna gaidata"
"Da fara'arta ta amsa masu gaisuwa hai da tambayar Amina"
"Karaf kafi J-boy yai magana tuni Sofy na amsa da tana gida tamace mu gaida ki"
" J-boy dake duk'e ya zauna,ya Sofy
"gani haka hjy tace"ga guri ki zauna
"Ita rumgume da Basik ta zauna akan kushi
gani haka yasa hjy cewa"kwantar dashi mana ki huta"
"Tou tace sannan ta shinfiashi a gado
tana shinfiashi ta juyo hai da yawo kwando kayan miyar da hjy ke gyarawa hai da cewa"kawo na gyara""A'a barshi kawai""Dan Allah hjy ki kawo na gyara""Gani ta nace yasa hjy sakar mata kwando"
"Tana aukar kwando ta fice waje
bakin kofa taje ta zauna akan dutsen dake gefen akin hjy taci gaba da gyatawa
Sofy na aikin ne amma kunninta na aki domin jin maganar da zasuyi"
"Bayan fitan Sofy waje ne hjy ta fara da cewa"yanzu sabida Allah Jibrin abinda kai ka kyauta kenan?tunda aka aura aure ka auki amaryan kai tafiyarka ba tare da kasanar da kowa ba,idan kana gadaran zamanka Amina keyi ni kuma fa?ko ban kai kazo kasanar dani abu kafin ka aikata bane Jibrin? To wlh ina tabbatar maka banji dai abinda kai ba
sai kace auren fari,ko wannan ne aurenka na farko eyye?
ba haka bane hjy,amma koma menene kiyi hakuri kuma insha Allahu hakan bazai sake faruwa ba bi'izinin lahi
Uhmm Jibrin kenan,Allah ya shiryeka,nidai bazan kama baki ba amma ina me tabbatar maka da kaguji fushina ka guji 6acin raina,ka guji lokacin da zaka k'ureni,wlh in har kakaini bango bazakaga dakyau ba
"J-boy dake duk'e hakuri kawai yake bawa hjy"
"Hjy taci gaba da cewa" yanzu gayami da lilin dayasa ka auko mata yaro ka taho dashi nan,ita tana gida"
"Da sauri yace" a'a bani na aukosa ba SAFIYA ce tace wai yazo ya gaidaki
""Kaji wani kili-bibi,yaushe mukai haka da ita?ko nice nace mata inajin ganisa da zata aukosa ta rabasa da uwarsa?tou wlh wannan ya zama farko kuma ya zama k'arshe daga yau sai yau,duk ranar da kuka sake raba annan da uwarsa sai kun gamu da 6acin raina
kuma sai Allah ya saka masa
Yaran banza kawai musaman ma kai dakake namiji,ka zauna har wata mace na juyaka
"Anya-anya Jibrin
kidai yi hakuri hjy,insha Allah baza'a sake maba
"Uhmm Allah yasa
amma wannan da kake kira yarinya ba yarinya bace,ba abin mamaki bane ma idan akace ta girmeka
mutum da ido kamar soyayyen gyaa fuska yabi ya goge ya kwarsane sabida bilicin amma shine kaki kiranta da yarinya?,uhmn ba girin-girin badai tai mai
"A'a hjy wlh SAFIYA ya rinyace kwata-kwata ma guda nawa take?kawai yanayi ne,kin san kowa da irin k'iran da Allah yai masa
amma wlh SAFIYA ba haka take ba,yarinya ce mai ladabi da biyayya ga sannin darajan an Adam
"katsesa hjy tai da" Dallah rufemin baki,ba dole kace haka ba, tunda soyayya yariga daya rufe maka ido
nidai a kullum bazan fai maka gaskiya ba, Jibrin kaji tsoron Allah kasani duk abinda zaka aikata rubutacce ne a gun ubangiji sannan kuma kasani cewa duk abinda ka aikata sai Allah ya tambayeka aya bayan aya, dan haka nake nusar dakai da aikata alkhairi ko kasamu sauk'in amsa tambayoyinka yayin tashin kiyama
"Tou Jibrin yace'yana yana susa kai
"Tsaresa da ido hjy tai na an wasu mintoci sannan ta kaa kai""Hannu J-boy yasa cikin aljihunsa ya ciro kui masu yawa ya ije a gefenta hai da cewa" hjy ga wannan kya siye goro"
"Tou Allah yai maka albarka ya shiryamin kai"
"Ameen J-boy yace" sannan ya mik'e da cewa"mu zama tafi hjy sai wani lokaci"
"Tou tace,sannan ta mik'e tare suka fita daga akin zuwa waje
gani fitowarsu ne yasa Sofy jan jikinta taan gusa daga gun kada suyi tunanin tajiyo maganar da sukayi
"Suna fita hjy tace"sannu da aiki yar nan, tashi ki wanke hannu ga maigidanki ya fito zaku tafi gida
"Kafin hjy ta rufe baki tuni Sofy ta amshi maganar da cewa" dan Allah kayi hakuri na k'arisa mana, kaan fa yarage
"A'a tashi muje kawai sauri nakeyi
"Tou tunda haka ne kaje kawai ni idan na gama nahau napep na koma gida
"A'a yarnan baza'ayi haka ba,tashi kawai ku tafi na k'arisa da,kuje kawai"
"A lokacin ne Sofy ta cire hannu a cikin kayan miyar,ruwa da klin hjy ta bata ta wanke hannu sannan taje ta auki Basik dake bacci
duk'awa tai ta sallami hjy sannan suka kami hanya,Sofy na gaba hjy da J-boy suna baya,hjy na sake jadda masa akan yai adalci a tsakaninsu kada ya nuna fifoko a tsakaninsu,yin hakan shike kawa a kasa samu zaman lafiya gida ya tarwatse,ya tuna yanada k'anni duk abinda yaiwa 'ya'yan wasu shima za'ayiwa nasa,sannan kuma yana haihuwa idan ba'ayiwa k'anninsa ba za'ayiwa 'ya'yansa
Alkhairi ijiyane sai ka ije a baya kake aukarsa a gaba,haka ma sharri dan haka duk abinda zakayi ka tabbata gaskiya,duk da dai an Adam tara yake bai cika goma ba,amma idan kayi k'udirin aikata alkhairi sai Allah ya taimake ka
Allah ya sa6anta zama
"Ameen J-boy yace, hai da godiya""Duk maganar da su hjy keyi" Sofy na can tabi ta tsargu ta kasa sukuni,ji takeyi kamar dazo taji abinda hjy ke faiwa J-boy
gaba aya gani take maganar ta hjy keyi
"Bayan tafiyarsu hjy ta rik'e ha6a hai da cewa" Allah mai ikon,haihuwa mai yayu6e-yayu6e,hausawa suyi gaskiya da suke cewa ciki kamar jeji yake,idan ya yau ya auke maka fari,gobe bak'ine zai auko maka jibi kuma ya auko maka blue
Dubi dai dan Allah idan banda haihuwa ko a mafarki ban ta6a zaton zan hau da irin wannan halittan ba
idan ma naganta sai dai mace gamo nayi ko kuma mafarki
tou yaya zakayi Allah dai ya basu hakurin zama,amma daga gani yarinyarga za'a rina
Suna tafe Sofy sai faman tunanin hjy take akan ta ina zata 6ullo mata,domin idan ba dagewa tai ba tanaji tana gani sai zaman gidan J-boy ya gagareta
tafi sama da minti goma tana tunani take wani dabara yazo mata
Da sauri ta auki wayarta,take ta turawa malam kati na dubu biyar ta banking
Tana gani alert da sauri ta fita agun ta koma game yanda J-boy bazai gane ba""Malam na zaune yaji shigowar sako da sauri ya auki wayarsa ya duba,gani katin wayane dubo numban Sofy yai ya danna mata kira
" Sofy najin wayarta ya fara baburesion da aure ta dakatar da kiran hai da rufe layukanta
"koda malam ya sake kwadawa kin shiga numban yai
hakan yasa shi cewa"babu mamaki matsalar network ne bari na bari zuwa anjima na sake kwadawa"
"Koda suka isa gida Sofy bata bue layinta sai dare
bayan J-boy yai bacci a hankali ta auki wayar sannan ta fita daga akin k'afa babu takalmi
fita tsakar gida tai can gafe raje ta ra6e jikin bango sannan ta kira malam
" cikin girmamawa suka gaisa bayan su gaisa ne malam yakeyi mata godiya"
"Da sauri ta taresa da cewa" haba-haba dai malam, ai kafi k'arfin hakan"
Mallama malam yace""Tun daga sannan shiru Sofy tai bata sake magana ba,jin tayi shine yasa malam tambayarta lafiya tai shiru?ko akwai wani matsala ne"
"Saida ta marerece sannan ta fara yi masa bayani
dama ba wani abu bane illa matsalar uwar mijinta,lokacin da muje gaidata bayan barina akin yajiyota tana tayiwa J-boy fai sabida ya aureni shine nakeso idan da hali ayi mata abinda duk irin abinda zanyi bazata gani ba bare tai magana,sannan shima kansa J-boy in ayi masa abinda duk irin maganar da za'ayi masa a kaina bazaji ba kuma bazai gani ba,dan Allah malam
" shieuuuu malam yai na an wani lokaci sannan yace"aikinga naki mai saukine kuma mai wiyane
saukinta a tanaji kayan aiki
domin wannan aikin banine zanyi ba nima badawa ne zanyi ayimin
kuma wanda zanbawa yana caji sosai
"Idan maganar kuine kada kaji komai malam,bazai gagara ba"Nan malam ya yanko mata kui masu yawa ya fai mata,a cewarsa harda yanka za'ayi domin abin sai an haa da yasin
"Duk Sofy tace babu komai zata iya"
Sannan malam yaci gaba da cewa" kada ta mance da abinda ya fai mata
duk irin asirin da zatayi ba zaiyi aikiba saida biyayye domin biyayya shine jigon komai""Sofy tace babu komai, yanda yace haka zatayi"Bata koma akiba saida ta tura masa da kui sannan sukai sallama ta koma ciki
"Tana shiga sukai karo da J-boy a falo
da sairi yace da ita ina kika shiga ne?na falka naga baki aki ina kika shiga?
"Nan ta faske da cewa" motsi naketaji anan baya shine na lek'a naga abinda ke motsen"
"Sabida me kika fita ke kaai bakita dani ba?ke baki tsoron wani abu ya sameki?dan Allah na rokeki kada ki sake fita ke kadai idan irin hakan yakama"
" tou ranka ya dae Allah ya huci zuciyarka yanda kace haka za'ayi""Shige muje""Tou,gaba yasata suka shige aki""Suna shiga da sauri ta dafe pilo kamar tana gyarawa, ba tareda J-boy ya luraba tura wayarta tai k'ark'ashin pilo sannan ta haye gado ta aura kai a pilo
" bayan J-boy ya kyauta ne ta zare wayarta ya ije akan durowar dake gefenta"
******
"Daren ranar da K'amaru yatafi kusan kasa bacci Rukky tai
"Sai faman juyi takeyi akan gado ita kadai tana mik'a
gani tunani yana niman ya dameta Rukky jayo Muhsana jikinta ta rungume ta,befi manti gomaba bacci ya auketa
" washe gari da safe kuwa kiran K'amaru ne tadata daga bacci
kamar a mafarki take jiyo ringing in waya""Bata falka ba saida yai rimging yana katsewa kusan sau uku sannan Rukky ta falka,cikin magagi ta rarumi wayar tana receiving tai sallama"
"Cike da zolaya K'amaru ke magana"  "Hello matata ta kaina,yaya kikayi da cewata,da faman rashina a kusa dake be hanaki bacci ba?""Murmushi tai masa sannan tace" kaima kasan wannan dolene musaman ma idan nayi duba da irin sabon da kaimin"
"Allah ko my baby?,uhmm wlh nima haka,muna cikin mota kowa na hira amma bandani sabida tunaninki daya addabeni
"Dariya Rukky tai masa,sannan tace Allah ko?""Sosai kuwa"
" uhmm yanzu dai bashi bane,har kun isane?"
"Isowarmu kenan yanzu hakama butane rik'e a hannuna zanyi alwala shine nace bari nayi kiraki naji tashinku
"Allah sarki ngd sosai, yanzu dai kayi sallar tuku bayan ka idar sai muyi magana"
"Ok ngd
"Yana kashe waya ya mik'e daga inda yake zaune yaje daji fitsari"
"Itama mik'ewa tai ta sauka daga gadon taje bayi bayan tai alwala ne tazo ta shinfia dadduma domin sallah"
bayan ta idar ne ta mik'e ta fita zuwa akin baffa
koda ta isa ta jima tana sallama ba'a amsa ba
shiru da tajine yasa Rukky tura kofar ta shiga
" ganinaa tai kwance tana faman sharan baccinsa
duk'awa tai kusa dashi a hankali take bubuga pilon da kansa ke kai,hai da kiran sunansa,baffa!baffa!!baffa!!!
"Ana ukun ne baffa ya falka da salati sannan ya dora da addu'ar tashi daga bacci
Tun bayan tafiya K'amaru" yaya Bala ke kulawa da Rukky,lokaci-lokaci yakan yimata siyayya ya kawo mata, ba tareda Khadijat tasani ba"wani lokaci kuma ita yakebawa ta kawo mata
_bismillahi laza ahayana ba'adama amatana wa'ilaihin nishur_ sannan ya mik'e hai da cewa anyi sallah ko?
"Eh baffa""Ikon Allah kenan,yau bacci yai min nawi da yawa"
"Wlh kuwa, bari na zuba maka ruwa a buta ko?"
" tou ngd sosai RUKAYYA""Juyawa tai ta zuba masa ruwa a buta sannan ta uko rover da yake alwala a ciki ta kara masa har saida yai alwala ya gama sannan ta kauda gefe ta gyara masa gun sallah""Gani ya tada kabbara ne yasa Rukky cewa" bari naje na duba yaran nan kada Muhmmed ya tadamin Muhsana
tana shiga taga dukkansu su tashi sai faman tsalle-tsalle sukeyi masa akan gado yasa Rukky shiga kici ta ora ruwan zafi tai masu wanka
bata fitoba saida ta damawa baffa kanu sannan ta fito zuwa dubasa ko ya idar
hannunta auke da kunu
"Muhammed na gabanta Muhsana kuma na sagale a kafaarta suka shiga akin baffa"
"Bayan baffa ya idar da sallah zama yai yana lazumi
sallamar Rukky ne tasa shi shafawa hai da cewa" har kin dawo?
"Na dawo baffa, kaima ka idar?""Na ta6a RUKAYYA
"Bayan ta ije kofin kunu duk'awa tai har k'asa ta gaidashi"
"Cikin jin dai ya amsa hai da tambayar kwanan yara"
" Rukky tace"lafiya qlau
bayan ya gyara zama ne Rukky ta mik'a masa kofin kunu"gani baffa ya farashan kunun yasa muhammed matsawa kusa dashi yana k'ok'arin amsar ludayin dake hannu baffa"
"Rukky na k'ok'arin hanasa baffa yace" ta kyalesa
mik'a masa ludayin yai hai da cewa"tou sha"
"Muhammed na kai ludayi bakinsa da sauri ya bursan da kunu hai da goge bakinsa yana fai ba da'i umma"
"Dukkansa dariya suka masa,sannan baffa yace"dama nasan ba iya zakai ba sabida babu sukari a ciki
amma tunda haka ga langa can bue ki auko sikari ki zuba masa"
" Rukky tace"a'a baffa rabu dashi, nasa yana aki idan muka koma saiya sha"
"A'a ban yarda ba, tunda wannan yason sha kuma shine za'a basa
" daga sannan bata sake magana ba,mik'ewa tai taje ta auko sikarin hai da dan k'arami kofi saida ta iba masa a kofin ta zuba masa sannan ta zuwa masa sukarin
"Muhammed na kaiwa baki,tunda yaji da suga be cire kofin ba saida ya shanye sannan ya cire kofin""Dariya baffa yai hai da cewa" muhammadu kodai a k'ara ne?"
"Kai muhammed ya jijigawa baffa,Alamar a'a
Gani yaci gaba da wasa yasa Rukky cewa" bari naje na gaida iya"
"Tou baffa yace" mik'ewa tai tafita zuwa akin iya
da sallama ta shiga akin
"Iya dake kwance tai banza da ita kamar bata jitaba" saida Rukky tai sallama kusan baki uku sannan ta amsa da amen"
"Duk'awa tai gar k'asa tace ina kwana iya"lafiya iya tace" tun daga sannan bata sake tanka mata ba
saida Rukky tace"azu mukai waya dashi yace"yana gaidaki"
"Furuff iya ta mik'e da cewa" au tun yanzu zai fara nuna babbaci tsanina dake,watou ke kin fini kenan da zaikiraki yace ki gaidani,tou bana amsawa
idan ya kira kice ni iya nace bana amsawa,ya rik'e gaisuwarsa banaso bana buk'ata
"A'a wlh iya ba haka bane
" idan ba haka bane tou menene?,alguguma yar munafuka makira
ina jinki menene idan ba haka bane?""Tou kiyi hakuri tunda ranki ya 6aci,kuma insha Allahu idan ya kirani zan kawo maki wayar ku gaisa"Tsaki iya tai,hai da juya mata baya takoma ta kwanta
"gani akin baja-baja ba'a gyara ba yasa Rukky cewa"bari na gyara maki akin
"da sauri iya tace"wlh aikekiba barmin akina haka,haka naga dama barinsa sabida nafison zama cikin datti
"dan Allah
"Tsawa iya ta dakawa Rukky, daga sannan bata sake cewa komai ba ta auki Muhsana suka fice daga akin

_*BISMILLAHI RAHMANI RAHIM*_
_________"Rukky na fita akin baffa ta komai dai-dai lokacin da ya shanye kununsa
hakan yasa Rukky aukar kofi ta ije gefenta,bayan ta zauna ne take sanar dashi K'amaru yakira yace yana gaidasu""Cikin murna dajin dai baffa yace"har ya isa ne?"
"Eh wlh"
"Masha Allah,tafiya yayi kyau
"Ubangiji Allah ya bashi abinda yaje nima,ya tsaresa da tsarewarsa"
"Amen baffa
"Sun jima suna hira sannan sukai sallama da cewa" zataje tai aiki"
"Da yamma, gamda sallar magrib Rukky tai alwala tana jiran kiran Sallah saiga sallamar yaya Bala"
"Da sauri ta mik'e hai da tamsawa, ta nufi bakin kofa
har k'asa ta duk'a ta gaishi, bayan su gama gaisawane yaya Bala ya mik'o mata ledar dake rik'e a hannunsa yace gashi babu yawa kiyi hakuri dashi
"Hannu bibiyu Rukky tasa ta amsa hai da godiya
"Har yaya Bala ya juya sai kuma ya dawo yana tambayar su Muhammed da Muhsana"
"Cike da kunya da ladabi tace" suna ak'i"
"Tou kawai yace sannan ya shige, bayan shigasar side insa ne ya aiki Khadijat dataje ta auko masa su Muhammed da Muhsana"
" bayan tafiyar yaya Bala ne,"Rukky ta koma ciki,bayan ta zauna ne ta bue ledar tasa duba abinda ke ciki,bayan tea ta gani masu yawa, dasu omo sabulun wanka da wanki hai da kuin
da sauri tasa hannu ta auki kuin tana k'irgawa, gani naira dubu biyune yasa Rukky hamdalah sabida dama kuin hannunta kaa yasu kara mata
shima kayan taji dainshi sosai,amma ba kamar kuin da bata dashi ba"
"Nan ta fara tunanin yanda yaya Bala keyi mata Allah ya bawa K'amaru dama da ikon saka masa da mafificinsa
" sallamar Khadijat ce katse Rukky
amsa sallamar tayi hai da cewa shiga maman Khairat"
"Khadijat na shiga tace"yaya Bala ne ya aukoni na auki yara nakai masa""Toy Rukky tace
"aukar mahsana tayi" muhammed kuma hannunsa ta rike suka fita zuwa akinta"
"Tana kaisu yaya Bala ya amshi mahsana, muhammed kuma zaunar dashi yai a gabansa, yajima yana yiwa mahsana wasa,sannan ya auki cokali suka fara cin abinci,yanaci yana bawa mahsana da muhammed a baki har suka gamaci sannan ya aukesu zuwa akin baffa nanma su dai suna hira kafin ya medasu gun Rukky"
"Yana komawa aki yanda yabar kayan da yaci abinci haka yadawo ya samemi,tsaki kawai yai sannan yasa hannu ya kwashe kayan zuwa kici
yanayi yana magangagu""Khadijat dake zaune tana jinsa oho dai tace" tana furta haka sai kunni yaya Bala
kwafa yai hai da cewa"insha Allahu zakiga aikin oho,nan bada daewa ba""Saina nuna maki kuskurenki bi'izinillahi"
_BAYAN WATA SHIDDA_"hausawa sukace yau da gobe sai Allah
duk wanda ka dogara dashi idan ba Allah bane aikin banza ne
" Allah kadai ne zaka rok'esa ya baka,gobema idan ka sake ya kuma k'ara maka
shine kawai wanda baya gajiya da bayansa,a duk lokacin da zaka rok'esa shi kuma zai biya maka buk'atunka
"Tun cikin dare Rukky ke juyayin idan safiya yayi me zatabawa yara,sabida komai mata ya k'are
hatta garin geron da take damawa baffa ya k'are, dashi yaya Bala da yake kawo masu kayan abinci shima kwana biyu shiru babu wani bayani
"Ni kuma bazan iya tambayarsa ba,idan nayi haka ma ai rashin hankali ne
mutumi da yake aukowa ya baka ba tare daka tambayesa ba,babu mamakin halin rayuwa ne na yauda kullum"
"Shima daddy da yake yomana aike shiru kwana biyu babu motsi""Tou kodai na aika gun yaya Mu'azam ne?,kai shima bazan iya ba
"Da irin wannan tunane-tunanen Rukky ta kwana
asubar fari ta mik'e domin sallah, gani lokaci beyiba yasata fara nafila sannan tai raka'a tani fijir sann taina asuba
koda ta sallame ta jima tana addu'a
falkawar Muhsana ne yasata shafa addu'ar sannan ta mik'e hai da cire hijabin dake wiyarta ta auki Muhsana
kai tsaye bayi ta kaita ta orata afo
" befi minti biyar da tashi Muhsana ba Muhammed ya tashi
"Yana tashi kuka yasa mata yana fai zaici abinda
"Gani babu gaba babu baya yasa ran Rukky ya 6aci,hankalinta ya tashi
nan tafara kame-kamen yanda zatayi
"Gani Muhammed ya matsa da kuka yasa Rukky kamasa tace ya zauna,ya jirata taje ta hai masa tea
" nan ya zauna yana jiran tea,harda wasa da Muhsana dake zaune afo"

ganisa dasu Rukky yasa Talatuwa yankewa da salati hai da tambayar lafiya?"Tai maganar ne hai da amsar Muhammed suka shiga daga cikin aki
bayan su zauna ne daddy yake sanar da ita iya abinda ya fahimci a gwajingwalar da Muhammed yai masa
Uhmm kawai Talatuwa tace"hai da cewa"wlh bansan lokacin da HANNe zatai hankaliba
Cikin zuciyar daddy yace"kadan kenan daga aikin mata
Su K'amaru da khadijat suna zuwa kai tsaye gidan inna suka nufa
gani yanda suka shiga babu sallama bare salati
a firgice inna ta mik'e hai da tambayar lafiya?""Khadijat ce tasamu damar gaida inna
shiko K'amaru idan ba sunan Rukky ba babu abinda yakeyi
Gani irin abinda K'amaru keyi yasa inna bataja dogon gaisuwar ba,itama tambayarsu takeyi da lafiya?"Cikin inda-inda da kunya khadijat kewa inna bayani
shiko K'amaru sai faman cewa yakeyi wlh laifin iyace
iyace ta koreta bani bane
Jin haka babu abinda zai fito daga bakin inna sai buuuuran uba
ashe akwai bala'i a garin nan
yanzu Hanne ce da wannan aikin?????!!!!!!

________"Shiru Khadijat tai
"Inna dake tsaye juyawa tai zuwa aki

haka tafice daga gidan
tana tafe tana masifa hai da kwashewa iya albarka
Daga Khadujat har K'amaru babu wanda ya iya magana a cikinsu
gani tafita ta barsu tsayene yasa suma ficewa daga gidan
Gani ta kami hanyar gidansu yasasu bin bayanta a guje"Khadijat ce ke kwaawa inna kira amma inna batajiba
"Junawa ga Talatuwa daddy yai hai da tambayarta abunyi
" murmushi tai hai da cewa"Yallabai kenan,meko za'ayi illa mutashi muje muji abinda ke faruwa
kasan dai idan zari'a za'ayi be kamata dan mutum aya yakawo maka k'ara kace zaka auki mataki ba
dole saikaji ta bakin ayan
Haka
da ita za'aje ko kuwa?""Eh tou,idan anje da ita inma a ganina ai laifiba""Tou daddy yace hai da mik'ewa
" Talatuwa ta dauka Muhasana ta goya hai da cewa Rukky tashi muje"
"Tao Rukky tace hai da mik'ewa
Haka suna fita daddy na rik'e da hannu Muhammed,yana gaba suna biye dashi a baya
"Inna na isa ko sallama babu k'afa tasa ta bankae k'aramin k'afar gate ta shige cikin gidan
Kai tsaya sie iya tanufa
tana sukai karo a dai-dai bakin shiga sie in
lokacin iya tajuya baya
gani haka yasa inna rugawa a guje
batare da tai magana ba,cakomo iya tai ta baya
Abinda baka shirya masaba
kata-kata iya tai da niyyar juyawa domin gani waye
hannu inna tasa ta hankaeta ta zube cikin kwatan dake kwance ahanya
tana fauwa inna tahaye kanta taci gaba da ira mata nushi hai da cewa"aidama batun yauba nake cewa ki kiyayi hauwarmu domin bazaiyi kyauta
Shegiya matsiyaciya,ina kikai min yarinya?eh
"duk maganar da inna keyi"iya babu bakin bata amsa sabida turmusheta da tai a kwata
itako inna nushi kawai take irawa iya hai da tambayarta inda takai mata Rukky
"Su Khadijat na shigowa can suka hangosu a guje suka k'arisa hai da fain subhanallh
mezan gani haka kuma?"Hannu sukasa suka kamo inna ta aga daga kan iya
Suna janta tana fain kubarni naci uban mara mutuncinan wacce batasan arzikiba
wlh idan Rukky ta6ace ki tabbata kema sunarki 6atacciya
"Iya na mik'ewa tasake kamo inna da wani danben hai da cewa" wlh yau koni koke,ba tun yauba nake jirace dake sabida haka
"Itama inna tace" kike jirace dani ko nake jirace dake?
wlh yau koni koke,shege kafasa
"Su K'amaru da Khadijat da suke tsaye ba tareda sun ankara ba kawai gani su inna da iya sukai suna wani danbe
nonuwa kawai da yake daga inna har iyan babu wanda yasa rigar mama(bra)sai faman kara kaina sukeyi
babu abinda kakeji agun sai k'aran nonuwa
da zaran sun jiya sukai sai kaji nono yace"fattttttt,musamma ma nonuwar iya,da yake tafi inna manyan nonuwa ga tsayi da kuma fai
daga Khadijat har K'amaru babu yanda basuyi da suraba inna da iya ba amma sun kasa,sabida yanda suka cukurkue junarsu
godiyar iya aya bangon data jingina dashi dabadan hakaba da inna tasake lik'ata da k'asa
Gani haka yasa K'amaru yacewa Khadijat tarike inna shi kuma zai rik'e iya sai su jasu ko Allah zaisa su rabu subar fain
Jin haka yasa inna kai hannu cikin rigar iya
nonuwarta takamu tafara murawa
idan ta mura sai kuma takai mata nushi
Iya tayi-tayi inna tasaketa amma inna tak'i kasancewar matseta da tai a bango
gani haka yasa iya itama k'ok'arin kamowa inna nata nonuwar domin itama tarama irin abinda take mata amma takasa
sabida da zaran inna taga iya na k'ok'arin kamo mata nono k'ashin guiwar hannunta take sawa ta ham6are mata haa
(iya najin haka sai kaji tace"yihuhuuuuu tsinanniyar zata kasheni)K'amaru dake tsaye subhanallh yace hai da kwashe hannayesa ya ora bisa kansa
Ita kuma Khadijat da gangan taki wani yunk'uri
dafa inna kawai takeyi,hai da an jijigata domin K'amaru yaga kamar k'ok'arin rabasu takeyi
Cikin zuciyarta kuwa hamdala takeyi hai da cewa"yawwa cimun uban shegeya
ihuuu da iya taine yasa dariya ya kumcewa Khadijat,da sauri ta medashi hai da matse fuskanta kamar da gaske
Jiki ba dutse ba dukkansu su gaji
kawai dai da yake masifar a cikin jininsu yake yasa sukak'i hakura da faar
sallamar su Daddy da Talatuwa ne yasa inna hankae iya a cikin kwata hai da cewa"tsananniya Allah ya taimakeki
"Cikin masifa iya tace" kece tsannaniya irin tsiya kawai
kece irin tsiya
daddy ne ya dakawa inna tsawa da cewa"keeeeeeee RABI
cikin masifa inna tajuyo hai da cewa"meyeeeeee?"wani irin uban harara ta fallara masa wanda yasa daddy be sake cemata komai ba
Hannu Khadijat da K'amaru sukasa suka aga iya take sharrrrbe a k'asa tana faman hakki
Sannu kawai sukeyi mata
duk a lokacin be hango Rukky dake labe a bayan Talatuwa ba
Ita kuwa Talatuwa shiruuu tai tana kallo ikon Allah
Suna agata ta fisge hannunta hai da cewa"kusakeni,kusakeni nace ko"
Jin haka yasa Khadijat cire hannunta daga jikin iya da sauri
Inna dake tsaye tace"badama na fai makuba?wannan da kuke gani matsiyaciya ce wacce batasan abin arziki ba
wani tsawar daddy yasake daka mata sannan tai shiru
Dafa bango tai tana faman hakki
"Duk'awa har k'asa K'amaru yai yana gaida daddy da Talatuwa
Ita kuwa Khadijat akinta tanufa taje ta sanarwa yaya Bala zuwan su daddy
saida ya tambayeta harda Ruuky ne?"eh tace"dashi""Alhamdllh yace" hai da mik'ewa yana fita yaga jikin iya surrr kwata
da sauri ya k'arisa inda take tsaye hai da tambayeta lafiya?"
Cikin masifa tace"uban ne ba lafiya ba"

suna haa ido da Baffa, yai tsaki hai da cewa" wlh kinji kunya Hanne

dallah yimin shiru,nayi an
nace nayi an ko zaka rama matane?"""bazan rama mataba amma kisani wanda yafini yafiki shine zai rama mata bi'izillahi"Au na auka ko rama mata zakayi

su daddy da Talatuwa kuwa kai kawai suke kaawa hai da mamakin iya"

gyaran murya  sannan yafara da bawa daddy hakuri bisaga abinda iya taiwa Rukky hai da fain duk irin abin alkhairi da kyautatawa da Rukky kemasa

amma babu komai zanyi magani abin""Maganinwa zakayi?"" lallaima bakaji dakyau ba
"taranta Baffa yai da mara kunyar banza mara kunyar wuwiyar banza kawai
sannan ya juya ga inna dake gefe yaci gaba da cewa"aini ban goge makiba da baki karereyamin itaba
Murmushi inna tai hai da yunkuyar da kanta k'asa"Daddy dake zaune balla mata harara yai
itako ko a jikinta"
"Iya dake tsaye bakin kofa
tsaki tai hai da cewa"tunda bata karerayani ba kai saikazo ka karerayani
gurgun banza gurgun wofi kawai ba banzaba Allah ya nakasaka
kafin tak'arisa maganar sandarsa ya auka ya wulwula ya halbeta dashi""Da sauri iya ta kauce hai da cewa" bakin azalumi,jiya ba yauba
dan kenan kayi kasha lafiya amma ba yanzu ba"Gani haka yasa daddy mik'ewa hai da cewa"mu zamu tafi""
"Hakuri sosai Baffa yabawa daddy hai da alk'awarin hakan bazai sake faruwa ba
sannan kuma yana rik'on Rukky data koma akinta
" murmushi Daddy yai sannan yace"babu komai,Allah ya kiyaye gaba ya kuma k'ara hakurin zama"

daga sama har k'asa inna ta kalli daddy hai da murgua masa baya
juya fuskanta tai gefe sannan taci gaba da cewa"RUKAYYA dai yarinyar an uwa nane dan haka babu wanda yaisa yaimin ikon da ita,kuma ya hanani magana akanta
Baffa dake zaune shiruuuu yai yana me sauraron yaji abinda zatace game da Rukky
cikin zuciyar kuma yace"Allah mai ikon ashe ko inane tsiyar,bani kadai nake fama da irin wannan matsalarba a gidana""Juyawa ga iya inna tai hai da nunata da an yatsa tace"ga Rukky nan wlh summa tallahi idan nasake jin makamancin irin abinda kikai mata yakuma faruwa wlh nida kece,domin wanda nayi maki kaane bisa ga wanda zanyi maki nan gaba
daddy dake tsaye jikinsa yai sanyi matuk'a gaba aya kunya ya lulu6esa ji yake kamar k'asa yabue ya shige
domin duk maganar da inna keyi agabansu yaya Bala da k'amaru takeyi ko tsoron idonsu batayi
" Shewa iya tai hai da tafi sannan taci gaba da cewa"ina yar take?yarinyar da kika kasa riketa bisa gaskiya da amana
masifa da azaba babu irin wacce batashaba a gunki
aini banson kinasonta ba tunda baki wanketa kinbawa anki ba
sabida kinsan ba abin arziki bane yasa aka lik'awa ana ko tou ta Alla ba takuba
shegiyar yarinyar mara kunya wacce tak'are gantalewa ta k'are rabawa maza kanta a titi shine har
wuff K'amaru yai hannu iya yakama zuwa cikin gida side inta
"Itama inna mik'ewa tai da niyyar binta har cikin gidan"Hannu daddy yasa ya kamota batare dayace komai ba
da k'arfi ya rik'eta yana janta kamar wata tunkiya"
Rukky dake zaune kwalla kawai takeyi
sabida tsabar bakin ciki ko motsi takasa tunda ta zauna aikin kenan"
Shiko Baffa cewa yai da k'amaru ya kyaleta iya a masa maganinta"
"Suna fita Rukky tamik'e irama tafice daga akin Baffa zuwa nata akin
tana auke da Muhsana
shiko Muhammed jikin yaya Bala yaje yahau ya zauna yasa wasa
yaro ba mutunba saiya girma,duk abinda sukeyi wasarsa kawai Muhammed keyi
" Suna fita daga akin iya tace"ehhhh dai atafi,Allah ya raka taki gona
itama yar taki tananan tafe domin yanzu nan zanemo almajirai su tayata kwashe kaya
yau dai muyar da kwallin mangwaro mu huta da k'uda
irin tsiya kawai,shegu mayu tou wlh ta Allah ba takuba
"Juyowa inna tai tace" ubankine maye
duk garinku waye besan ubanki shine sarkin mayuba
kuma idan kikabar Rukky ta kwana a gidan nan ban gode maki ba
Ehhhhh dai a tafi
saita biyoki
jin haka daga iya har inna kowa k'ok'arin kwacewa yakeyi domin yadawo ya ora daga inda ya tsaya"Gani haka yasa K'amaru k'ara rike iya da k'arfi duk fisge-fisgen da takeyi da kinbinsa zuwa ciki amma takasa kwacewa daga hannunsa
Haushi da takaici ya kama iya
nan tahau zaginsa tana kwashe masa albakar
duk abinda sukeyi a kunni Rukky
in banda kuka babu abinda takeyi"A 6angaren Khadijat rawa kawai take zubawa hai da kwashe sheoky dan murna""Ita kuma inna bari tai har saida sukakai dai-dai bakin k'ofar fita
ru6a6iyar gate in tarike gam taki fita daga gidan a dole sai daddy ya kyaleta taje taci uban iya
gani haka yasa Talatuwa zuwa kusa da inna
tace yanzu sabida Allah meye kikeyi haka?
wlh hakan ba tsari bane
" Dallah jacan banza 6arauniya kawai
kema ina zuwa gareki kada kiga nayi shiru ki auka hakura nayi
inanan zuwa maki
aszaluma macociya
murmushi kawai Talatuwa taiwa inna hai da cewa"su RABI ikon Allah
matan a gidan alhj Usman kibada kanki asare kije gida kice ya fain
"ubankine zaiba da kansa asare
"Hannu daddy ya agawa Talatuwa alamar kada tasake magana
sata a gaba yai suka fice daga gidan sukabar inna anan tana faman sauke ruwan bala'i
tajima tanayi sannu tafice daga gidan
Iya tayi-tayi takwace hannunta daga na K'amaru amma takasa
takaici yasa tahau zaginsa hai da cewa"idan yanaso ya gama da duniya lafiya yaje kawai ya rubutawa Rukky takardan sakinta idan kuma yaki rubutawa ya biyata nononda tashayar dashi
a gigice K'amaru yasakar mata hannu
jikinsa na rawa ya zube agabanta hannu bibbiyu yasa yarik'e mata guiwarta yafara bata hakuri yanayi nayi kuka
data hakuri tajanye wannan maganar
Ko a jikin iya
k'afa tasa ta hankaesa tai shigewarta ciki""A guje K'amaru ya mik'e sauri yake hai da gudu yana tafe yana kwaawa yaya Bala kira
"Da sauri yaya Bala yamik'e daga zaunen da yake fitowa daga akin Baffa yai hai da tambayar K'amaru da lafiya?"
Shima Muhammed fitowa yai
gani babansa na kuka yasashi rusawa da kuka hai da zuwa ya rungumesa
"yaya Bala ne ya auki Muhammed sannan yaci gaba da tambayar K'amaru
Cikin kuka K'amaru ke faiwa yaya Bala abinda iya tace dashi"
Baffa naji yakirasu zuwa ciki
bayan su shigane Baffa yaita bashi musalai kala-kala hai da kawo masa ayi da hadisan manzon tsira ahaihim salatu wassalamu
sannan ya sake jadadda masa aurensa da Rukky yananan daram babu abinda ya samesa
Duk da haka basu gamsu ba
badan su raina da abinda Baffa yace dasu bane
tashi sukai zuwa wajan limamin unguwarsu
shida yaya Bala, bayan su gaisa yake tambayarsu abinda ke tafe dasu
yaya Bala be boyewa malam komai ba
duk yanda K'amaru sukai da iya saida yaya Bala ya faiwa malam
Shiruu yai na an wani lokaci sannan yafara basu musalai kamar yanda Allah subhanahu wata ala yace cikin suratun *ISRA'I AYA TA 23* _*wa k'ada rabbukha Allah ta'abuduu illa iyya'hu wa bilwalidayni ihsana, immayablu ganna inda qibara ahudu huma awqilahu huma falah taqul Allahuma uffil wala tanhar huma waqul Allahuma qaula kariymmah*_
_Abin nufi anan idan akwai dalilin ta shari'a tou yaya biyayya ga iyaye?
Nasan wajibine biyayya ga iyaye
Menene da lilin da zaisa uwa tace"anta ya saki matarsa?" "shine rashin kunya"
Idan har ya tabbata iyalinka zata wulak'anta maka uwarka rashin kunya,tou ai basai an fai ba
_
_Abin nufi anan shine bayan biyayya ga Allah da manzonsa babu wani biyayya daya rage a gareka saina iyaye
dalilin saukar da wannan ayar kenan daga Allah subhanahu wata ala sai kuma annabinsa (Muhammadu (S
A
W) babu wani biyayya da yazama dole akanka saina iyaye
_
_An tambayi Muhammed bin Sale Al,husainiya rahatuplahi
Cikin littafin fatawul jama'a lilmar'a muslimah a cikin shafi na ari shada juzu'i na arba'in da aya akai tambaya" yaya matsayin_ _biyayya ga uwa take agun anta?"__Kamar yanda yazo ciki alkur'ani mai girma cikin SURATUN ISRA'I haka yasake memetashi
Biyayya ga uwa abune mai matuk'ar muhimmanci akan anta ko yarta_
"Matarka tanayiwa mahaifiyarka rashin kunyane?
" daga K'amaru har yaya Bala da sauri sukace"a'a
rashin kunya ba abi'ar Rukky bane"Nan malam ya shida masu cewa"aurensa yananan daram
amma tunda haka yafaru mafi alkhairi kawai yarabasu
rabasu da zaiyi shine kwanciyar hankalinsa
tunda alamu ya nuna yanaso matarsa,sannan kuma uwarta ta takura masu
yin hakan shine kawai mafita a garesu
godiya sosai sukai masa sannan sukai sallama
*tou yan uwana mata abinda nakeso mugane anan shine,dan Allah yariga ya haaka da abokin zama mai hali irin na iya saidai hakuri
ga misali,iya uwar miji take agun Rukky ko?,tou inaso muyi misali da karan kanmu
yau inda ace uwarka/uwaki ce keda irin wannan halin yaya zakiyi?na farko dai nasan bazaki gujeta sabida mugun halinta ba
na biyu kuma kece kizo gida yini kawai kina shiga kiga matar yayanki tana sa'isa da mahaifuyarki,gashi kuma kinriga da kinsan mahaifuyarki ince masifafa
shigan mata zakiyi ko kuwa zuba ido zakiyi kiga ana cimata mutunci?
idan mukai la'akari da irin wannan musalai wlh masu hali irin na iya koda sukai gomane zamu zauna dasu lafiya
yanda bazakiso a wulak'anta maki taki uwarba haka shima jikin da kike aure
Uwar mijin tankar uwarkace,inda bata haifaba bazaki gani ko auraba
kinga kenan tanada matuk'ar muhimmanci a rayuwarku kedashi
Nifa a tawa gani rashin sani darajan nagabane zaisa katsaya kuna musanyar miyau dashi
sannan kuma mutum koda wuta yake fitowa daga bakinsa saita ta6asa zaiyi maka
dan haka biyayya ga iyaye ko nagaba yanada matuk'ar muhimmaci a rayuwarmu
*"Suna shiga gida har yaya Bala ya nufi hanyar side insa da sauri K'amaru yarikesa hai da cewa" dan Allah yaya muja kak'ara bata hakuri bisaga abinda ya faru"
"Murmushi yaya Bala yai sannan yace" kafara tafiya zan biyoka""Tou kawai K'amaru yace sannan kowa ya kami hanyar akinsa"

Da sauri ya saki Rukky yaje ya rungumo 'ya'yansa yana yi masu kiss hai da tambayarsu suyi kewarsa kuwa kamar yanda yai kewansu
Kai kawai Muhammed ya aga masa
Itako Muhasana binsa tai da ido
aukarsu yai zuwa kushi snn yaje ya shigo da kayan daya dawo dasu
A daren ranar taje ya gaida iya hai da bata nata tsaraban
Turmi zani aya da naira dubi biyar
Iya baki har kunne tana sawa amaru albarka
Shiko Baffa kayan shayi manyan kgwangwani ya kawo masa kowane guda bibbiyu
in kuna yaiwa Rukky kala uku na gani na faa masu kyau da tsada
Hakama su Muhammed da Muhasana
Sabida murna kwalla Rukky tai
Washe gari kuwa asalatun faro tai wanka ita da yara suka sha kwalliyarsu snn suka sanya kayan da amaru ya kawo masu
Tunda Khadijat taga Rukky da sabon kaya wani irin ulu-ulun bain ciki ya turnieta da sauri ta koma aya tana me ajiyar zuciya hai da mamaki
bTun daga lokacin bata sake fitowa waje va,koda su Muhammed sukazo gun su Khairat koransu tai da cewa suje babansu na kiran su
Da yamma bayan Yaya Bala yadawo daga kasuwa, suka zauna suna hira,sun jima suna hiran snn amaru ya sanya hannusa cikin aljihu kui ya fiddo dashi naira dubu hamsin ya bawa Yaya Bala yace"gashi yai cefane dashi,snn ya bawa yara hakuri domin a wnn karon bezo masu da komai ba
da sauri Yaya Bala ya taresa da cewa"kada ya damu,hakan ma yagode
Da yake wnn karo ba daewa zaiyi ba,hakan yasa duk yabi abokansa suka gaigaisa, ana jibi zai koma amaru ya auki Rukky suka tafi banking ya bue mata mata account in suka dawo gida
Bayan su dawo ne ya amshi nasa ATM card in daya bata
Ana gobe zai koma ne a daren ranar yasake bata hakuri hai da godiya da duk irin a wainiyar da tai tayi da Baffa snn yaci gaba da bata hakuri da halin iya
Hai da sanar da ita wani dawowar da zai in Sha Allahu tare zasu koma,koda be samu gidan zaiyi maleji su zaman zama a barack hakanan har zuwa lokacin da zasu samu gida
Babu komai Rukky tace dashi
amaru yaji dain daren hakan sosai
ranar kusan kwana sukai basu rintsa ba,haka suka raya wnn daren yana me bata magana hai da kalame zasu kwantar da hankali hai da sanya zuciya nishai
Wnn karo kam be samu matsala da iya ba,tunda yazo har zuwa yau da zai koma lallaasa takeyi tana nan-nan dashi
Wnn karo da yake tafiyar safene zai yi hakan yasa tunda suka tashi da asuba basu koma ba,kafin bakwai Rukky ta gama shirya masa kayansa tsaf
Bakwai da rabi Yaya Bala ya rakasa zua gariage ciki sa'a suna zuwa suka sami mota amaru ya shiga suka tashi

da yake tariga data dalilinsa na fai hakan

Shiko Ugochuwu magana aya biyu saiya sanya amaru a cikin

wani lokaci ma idan tazo har tayasu gyara aki takeyi,tai masu wanke-wanke shara da dai sauran su snn ta tafi

_*BISMILLAHI RAHMANI RAHIM*_
______Suna isa bayan J-boy yai faki suka fito daga mota
Sofy na rumgume da Basik suka k'arisa cikin gida, J-boy ne ke gaba Sofy na biye dashi a baya
"Da sallama suka shiga akin hjy""Hjy dake zauna tana gyara kayan miya, tai masu sannu da zuwa
zubewa sukai a gabata hai da haa baki suna gaidata"
"Da fara'arta ta amsa masu gaisuwa hai da tambayar Amina"
"Karaf kafi J-boy yai magana tuni Sofy na amsa da tana gida tamace mu gaida ki"
" J-boy dake duk'e ya zauna,ya Sofy
"gani haka hjy tace"ga guri ki zauna
"Ita rumgume da Basik ta zauna akan kushi
gani haka yasa hjy cewa"kwantar dashi mana ki huta"
"Tou tace sannan ta shinfiashi a gado
tana shinfiashi ta juyo hai da yawo kwando kayan miyar da hjy ke gyarawa hai da cewa"kawo na gyara""A'a barshi kawai""Dan Allah hjy ki kawo na gyara""Gani ta nace yasa hjy sakar mata kwando"
"Tana aukar kwando ta fice waje
bakin kofa taje ta zauna akan dutsen dake gefen akin hjy taci gaba da gyatawa
Sofy na aikin ne amma kunninta na aki domin jin maganar da zasuyi"
"Bayan fitan Sofy waje ne hjy ta fara da cewa"yanzu sabida Allah Jibrin abinda kai ka kyauta kenan?tunda aka aura aure ka auki amaryan kai tafiyarka ba tare da kasanar da kowa ba,idan kana gadaran zamanka Amina keyi ni kuma fa?ko ban kai kazo kasanar dani abu kafin ka aikata bane Jibrin? To wlh ina tabbatar maka banji dai abinda kai ba
sai kace auren fari,ko wannan ne aurenka na farko eyye?
ba haka bane hjy,amma koma menene kiyi hakuri kuma insha Allahu hakan bazai sake faruwa ba bi'izinin lahi
Uhmm Jibrin kenan,Allah ya shiryeka,nidai bazan kama baki ba amma ina me tabbatar maka da kaguji fushina ka guji 6acin raina,ka guji lokacin da zaka k'ureni,wlh in har kakaini bango bazakaga dakyau ba
"J-boy dake duk'e hakuri kawai yake bawa hjy"
"Hjy taci gaba da cewa" yanzu gayami da lilin dayasa ka auko mata yaro ka taho dashi nan,ita tana gida"
"Da sauri yace" a'a bani na aukosa ba SAFIYA ce tace wai yazo ya gaidaki
""Kaji wani kili-bibi,yaushe mukai haka da ita?ko nice nace mata inajin ganisa da zata aukosa ta rabasa da uwarsa?tou wlh wannan ya zama farko kuma ya zama k'arshe daga yau sai yau,duk ranar da kuka sake raba annan da uwarsa sai kun gamu da 6acin raina
kuma sai Allah ya saka masa
Yaran banza kawai musaman ma kai dakake namiji,ka zauna har wata mace na juyaka
"Anya-anya Jibrin
kidai yi hakuri hjy,insha Allah baza'a sake maba
"Uhmm Allah yasa
amma wannan da kake kira yarinya ba yarinya bace,ba abin mamaki bane ma idan akace ta girmeka
mutum da ido kamar soyayyen gyaa fuska yabi ya goge ya kwarsane sabida bilicin amma shine kaki kiranta da yarinya?,uhmn ba girin-girin badai tai mai
"A'a hjy wlh SAFIYA ya rinyace kwata-kwata ma guda nawa take?kawai yanayi ne,kin san kowa da irin k'iran da Allah yai masa
amma wlh SAFIYA ba haka take ba,yarinya ce mai ladabi da biyayya ga sannin darajan an Adam
"katsesa hjy tai da" Dallah rufemin baki,ba dole kace haka ba, tunda soyayya yariga daya rufe maka ido
nidai a kullum bazan fai maka gaskiya ba, Jibrin kaji tsoron Allah kasani duk abinda zaka aikata rubutacce ne a gun ubangiji sannan kuma kasani cewa duk abinda ka aikata sai Allah ya tambayeka aya bayan aya, dan haka nake nusar dakai da aikata alkhairi ko kasamu sauk'in amsa tambayoyinka yayin tashin kiyama
"Tou Jibrin yace'yana yana susa kai
"Tsaresa da ido hjy tai na an wasu mintoci sannan ta kaa kai""Hannu J-boy yasa cikin aljihunsa ya ciro kui masu yawa ya ije a gefenta hai da cewa" hjy ga wannan kya siye goro"
"Tou Allah yai maka albarka ya shiryamin kai"
"Ameen J-boy yace" sannan ya mik'e da cewa"mu zama tafi hjy sai wani lokaci"
"Tou tace,sannan ta mik'e tare suka fita daga akin zuwa waje
gani fitowarsu ne yasa Sofy jan jikinta taan gusa daga gun kada suyi tunanin tajiyo maganar da sukayi
"Suna fita hjy tace"sannu da aiki yar nan, tashi ki wanke hannu ga maigidanki ya fito zaku tafi gida
"Kafin hjy ta rufe baki tuni Sofy ta amshi maganar da cewa" dan Allah kayi hakuri na k'arisa mana, kaan fa yarage
"A'a tashi muje kawai sauri nakeyi
"Tou tunda haka ne kaje kawai ni idan na gama nahau napep na koma gida
"A'a yarnan baza'ayi haka ba,tashi kawai ku tafi na k'arisa da,kuje kawai"
"A lokacin ne Sofy ta cire hannu a cikin kayan miyar,ruwa da klin hjy ta bata ta wanke hannu sannan taje ta auki Basik dake bacci
duk'awa tai ta sallami hjy sannan suka kami hanya,Sofy na gaba hjy da J-boy suna baya,hjy na sake jadda masa akan yai adalci a tsakaninsu kada ya nuna fifoko a tsakaninsu,yin hakan shike kawa a kasa samu zaman lafiya gida ya tarwatse,ya tuna yanada k'anni duk abinda yaiwa 'ya'yan wasu shima za'ayiwa nasa,sannan kuma yana haihuwa idan ba'ayiwa k'anninsa ba za'ayiwa 'ya'yansa
Alkhairi ijiyane sai ka ije a baya kake aukarsa a gaba,haka ma sharri dan haka duk abinda zakayi ka tabbata gaskiya,duk da dai an Adam tara yake bai cika goma ba,amma idan kayi k'udirin aikata alkhairi sai Allah ya taimake ka
Allah ya sa6anta zama
"Ameen J-boy yace, hai da godiya""Duk maganar da su hjy keyi" Sofy na can tabi ta tsargu ta kasa sukuni,ji takeyi kamar dazo taji abinda hjy ke faiwa J-boy
gaba aya gani take maganar ta hjy keyi
"Bayan tafiyarsu hjy ta rik'e ha6a hai da cewa" Allah mai ikon,haihuwa mai yayu6e-yayu6e,hausawa suyi gaskiya da suke cewa ciki kamar jeji yake,idan ya yau ya auke maka fari,gobe bak'ine zai auko maka jibi kuma ya auko maka blue
Dubi dai dan Allah idan banda haihuwa ko a mafarki ban ta6a zaton zan hau da irin wannan halittan ba
idan ma naganta sai dai mace gamo nayi ko kuma mafarki
tou yaya zakayi Allah dai ya basu hakurin zama,amma daga gani yarinyarga za'a rina
Suna tafe Sofy sai faman tunanin hjy take akan ta ina zata 6ullo mata,domin idan ba dagewa tai ba tanaji tana gani sai zaman gidan J-boy ya gagareta
tafi sama da minti goma tana tunani take wani dabara yazo mata
Da sauri ta auki wayarta,take ta turawa malam kati na dubu biyar ta banking
Tana gani alert da sauri ta fita agun ta koma game yanda J-boy bazai gane ba""Malam na zaune yaji shigowar sako da sauri ya auki wayarsa ya duba,gani katin wayane dubo numban Sofy yai ya danna mata kira
" Sofy najin wayarta ya fara baburesion da aure ta dakatar da kiran hai da rufe layukanta
"koda malam ya sake kwadawa kin shiga numban yai
hakan yasa shi cewa"babu mamaki matsalar network ne bari na bari zuwa anjima na sake kwadawa"
"Koda suka isa gida Sofy bata bue layinta sai dare
bayan J-boy yai bacci a hankali ta auki wayar sannan ta fita daga akin k'afa babu takalmi
fita tsakar gida tai can gafe raje ta ra6e jikin bango sannan ta kira malam
" cikin girmamawa suka gaisa bayan su gaisa ne malam yakeyi mata godiya"
"Da sauri ta taresa da cewa" haba-haba dai malam, ai kafi k'arfin hakan"
Mallama malam yace""Tun daga sannan shiru Sofy tai bata sake magana ba,jin tayi shine yasa malam tambayarta lafiya tai shiru?ko akwai wani matsala ne"
"Saida ta marerece sannan ta fara yi masa bayani
dama ba wani abu bane illa matsalar uwar mijinta,lokacin da muje gaidata bayan barina akin yajiyota tana tayiwa J-boy fai sabida ya aureni shine nakeso idan da hali ayi mata abinda duk irin abinda zanyi bazata gani ba bare tai magana,sannan shima kansa J-boy in ayi masa abinda duk irin maganar da za'ayi masa a kaina bazaji ba kuma bazai gani ba,dan Allah malam
" shieuuuu malam yai na an wani lokaci sannan yace"aikinga naki mai saukine kuma mai wiyane
saukinta a tanaji kayan aiki
domin wannan aikin banine zanyi ba nima badawa ne zanyi ayimin
kuma wanda zanbawa yana caji sosai
"Idan maganar kuine kada kaji komai malam,bazai gagara ba"Nan malam ya yanko mata kui masu yawa ya fai mata,a cewarsa harda yanka za'ayi domin abin sai an haa da yasin
"Duk Sofy tace babu komai zata iya"
Sannan malam yaci gaba da cewa" kada ta mance da abinda ya fai mata
duk irin asirin da zatayi ba zaiyi aikiba saida biyayye domin biyayya shine jigon komai""Sofy tace babu komai, yanda yace haka zatayi"Bata koma akiba saida ta tura masa da kui sannan sukai sallama ta koma ciki
"Tana shiga sukai karo da J-boy a falo
da sairi yace da ita ina kika shiga ne?na falka naga baki aki ina kika shiga?
"Nan ta faske da cewa" motsi naketaji anan baya shine na lek'a naga abinda ke motsen"
"Sabida me kika fita ke kaai bakita dani ba?ke baki tsoron wani abu ya sameki?dan Allah na rokeki kada ki sake fita ke kadai idan irin hakan yakama"
" tou ranka ya dae Allah ya huci zuciyarka yanda kace haka za'ayi""Shige muje""Tou,gaba yasata suka shige aki""Suna shiga da sauri ta dafe pilo kamar tana gyarawa, ba tareda J-boy ya luraba tura wayarta tai k'ark'ashin pilo sannan ta haye gado ta aura kai a pilo
" bayan J-boy ya kyauta ne ta zare wayarta ya ije akan durowar dake gefenta"

"Daren ranar da K'amaru yatafi kusan kasa bacci Rukky tai
"Sai faman juyi takeyi akan gado ita kadai tana mik'a
gani tunani yana niman ya dameta Rukky jayo Muhsana jikinta ta rungume ta,befi manti gomaba bacci ya auketa
" washe gari da safe kuwa kiran K'amaru ne tadata daga bacci
kamar a mafarki take jiyo ringing in waya""Bata falka ba saida yai rimging yana katsewa kusan sau uku sannan Rukky ta falka,cikin magagi ta rarumi wayar tana receiving tai sallama"
"Cike da zolaya K'amaru ke magana"  "Hello matata ta kaina,yaya kikayi da cewata,da faman rashina a kusa dake be hanaki bacci ba?""Murmushi tai masa sannan tace" kaima kasan wannan dolene musaman ma idan nayi duba da irin sabon da kaimin"
"Allah ko my baby?,uhmm wlh nima haka,muna cikin mota kowa na hira amma bandani sabida tunaninki daya addabeni
"Dariya Rukky tai masa,sannan tace Allah ko?""Sosai kuwa"
" uhmm yanzu dai bashi bane,har kun isane?"
"Isowarmu kenan yanzu hakama butane rik'e a hannuna zanyi alwala shine nace bari nayi kiraki naji tashinku
"Allah sarki ngd sosai, yanzu dai kayi sallar tuku bayan ka idar sai muyi magana"

"Yana kashe waya ya mik'e daga inda yake zaune yaje daji fitsari"

bayan ta idar ne ta mik'e ta fita zuwa akin baffa
koda ta isa ta jima tana sallama ba'a amsa ba
shiru da tajine yasa Rukky tura kofar ta shiga

"Ana ukun ne baffa ya falka da salati sannan ya dora da addu'ar tashi daga bacci
Tun bayan tafiya K'amaru" yaya Bala ke kulawa da Rukky,lokaci-lokaci yakan yimata siyayya ya kawo mata, ba tareda Khadijat tasani ba"wani lokaci kuma ita yakebawa ta kawo mata
_bismillahi laza ahayana ba'adama amatana wa'ilaihin nishur_ sannan ya mik'e hai da cewa anyi sallah ko?

"Wlh kuwa, bari na zuba maka ruwa a buta ko?"
" tou ngd sosai RUKAYYA""Juyawa tai ta zuba masa ruwa a buta sannan ta uko rover da yake alwala a ciki ta kara masa har saida yai alwala ya gama sannan ta kauda gefe ta gyara masa gun sallah""Gani ya tada kabbara ne yasa Rukky cewa" bari naje na duba yaran nan kada Muhmmed ya tadamin Muhsana
tana shiga taga dukkansu su tashi sai faman tsalle-tsalle sukeyi masa akan gado yasa Rukky shiga kici ta ora ruwan zafi tai masu wanka
bata fitoba saida ta damawa baffa kanu sannan ta fito zuwa dubasa ko ya idar
hannunta auke da kunu

amma tunda haka ga langa can bue ki auko sikari ki zuba masa"

da sallama ta shiga akin

_*BISMILLAHI RAHMANI RAHIM*_
_________"Rukky na fita akin baffa ta komai dai-dai lokacin da ya shanye kununsa
hakan yasa Rukky aukar kofi ta ije gefenta,bayan ta zauna ne take sanar dashi K'amaru yakira yace yana gaidasu""Cikin murna dajin dai baffa yace"har ya isa ne?"
"Eh wlh"
"Masha Allah,tafiya yayi kyau
"Ubangiji Allah ya bashi abinda yaje nima,ya tsaresa da tsarewarsa"
"Amen baffa
"Sun jima suna hira sannan sukai sallama da cewa" zataje tai aiki"
"Da yamma, gamda sallar magrib Rukky tai alwala tana jiran kiran Sallah saiga sallamar yaya Bala"
"Da sauri ta mik'e hai da tamsawa, ta nufi bakin kofa
har k'asa ta duk'a ta gaishi, bayan su gama gaisawane yaya Bala ya mik'o mata ledar dake rik'e a hannunsa yace gashi babu yawa kiyi hakuri dashi
"Hannu bibiyu Rukky tasa ta amsa hai da godiya
"Har yaya Bala ya juya sai kuma ya dawo yana tambayar su Muhammed da Muhsana"
"Cike da kunya da ladabi tace" suna ak'i"
"Tou kawai yace sannan ya shige, bayan shigasar side insa ne ya aiki Khadijat dataje ta auko masa su Muhammed da Muhsana"
" bayan tafiyar yaya Bala ne,"Rukky ta koma ciki,bayan ta zauna ne ta bue ledar tasa duba abinda ke ciki,bayan tea ta gani masu yawa, dasu omo sabulun wanka da wanki hai da kuin
da sauri tasa hannu ta auki kuin tana k'irgawa, gani naira dubu biyune yasa Rukky hamdalah sabida dama kuin hannunta kaa yasu kara mata
shima kayan taji dainshi sosai,amma ba kamar kuin da bata dashi ba"
"Nan ta fara tunanin yanda yaya Bala keyi mata Allah ya bawa K'amaru dama da ikon saka masa da mafificinsa
" sallamar Khadijat ce katse Rukky
amsa sallamar tayi hai da cewa shiga maman Khairat"
"Khadijat na shiga tace"yaya Bala ne ya aukoni na auki yara nakai masa""Toy Rukky tace
"aukar mahsana tayi" muhammed kuma hannunsa ta rike suka fita zuwa akinta"
"Tana kaisu yaya Bala ya amshi mahsana, muhammed kuma zaunar dashi yai a gabansa, yajima yana yiwa mahsana wasa,sannan ya auki cokali suka fara cin abinci,yanaci yana bawa mahsana da muhammed a baki har suka gamaci sannan ya aukesu zuwa akin baffa nanma su dai suna hira kafin ya medasu gun Rukky"
"Yana komawa aki yanda yabar kayan da yaci abinci haka yadawo ya samemi,tsaki kawai yai sannan yasa hannu ya kwashe kayan zuwa kici
yanayi yana magangagu""Khadijat dake zaune tana jinsa oho dai tace" tana furta haka sai kunni yaya Bala
kwafa yai hai da cewa"insha Allahu zakiga aikin oho,nan bada daewa ba""Saina nuna maki kuskurenki bi'izinillahi"
_BAYAN WATA SHIDDA_"hausawa sukace yau da gobe sai Allah
duk wanda ka dogara dashi idan ba Allah bane aikin banza ne
" Allah kadai ne zaka rok'esa ya baka,gobema idan ka sake ya kuma k'ara maka
shine kawai wanda baya gajiya da bayansa,a duk lokacin da zaka rok'esa shi kuma zai biya maka buk'atunka
"Tun cikin dare Rukky ke juyayin idan safiya yayi me zatabawa yara,sabida komai mata ya k'are
hatta garin geron da take damawa baffa ya k'are, dashi yaya Bala da yake kawo masu kayan abinci shima kwana biyu shiru babu wani bayani
"Ni kuma bazan iya tambayarsa ba,idan nayi haka ma ai rashin hankali ne
mutumi da yake aukowa ya baka ba tare daka tambayesa ba,babu mamakin halin rayuwa ne na yauda kullum"
"Shima daddy da yake yomana aike shiru kwana biyu babu motsi""Tou kodai na aika gun yaya Mu'azam ne?,kai shima bazan iya ba
"Da irin wannan tunane-tunanen Rukky ta kwana
asubar fari ta mik'e domin sallah, gani lokaci beyiba yasata fara nafila sannan tai raka'a tani fijir sann taina asuba
koda ta sallame ta jima tana addu'a
falkawar Muhsana ne yasata shafa addu'ar sannan ta mik'e hai da cire hijabin dake wiyarta ta auki Muhsana
kai tsaye bayi ta kaita ta orata afo
" befi minti biyar da tashi Muhsana ba Muhammed ya tashi
"Yana tashi kuka yasa mata yana fai zaici abinda
"Gani babu gaba babu baya yasa ran Rukky ya 6aci,hankalinta ya tashi
nan tafara kame-kamen yanda zatayi
"Gani Muhammed ya matsa da kuka yasa Rukky kamasa tace ya zauna,ya jirata taje ta hai masa tea

aukar Muhammed yai ya duba cikin da kyau,gani beyi komai ba yasa shi ceaa" alhamdllh

ance ba k'arami kui yake aiko mata dashi ba

" murmushi iya tai sannan tace"Da gaske an gidan yaya?""Inada tabbaci haka"
Allah yasa Allah yasa"
" Amen Amen iya
mugode Allah yasa mugama daku lafiya
"Insha Allahu zaku gama damu lafiya bi'izillahi
Hannu yaya Bala yasa cikin aljihu ya ciro kui ya bata hai da cewa"ga wannan babu yawa"!!!"Da sauri iya ta amsa hai da sanya masu albarka

kai iya,banace kibar maganar ba"

ranar da suka iso iya tai murna sosai musaman ma gani Zahra auta da tai
Da yake yau kwana biyu kenan da K'amaru suka samu albashi ya turowa yaya Bala da kui ta acc insa yace"yacire ya bawa Rukky ta siye duk abinda tasan suna buk'ata
koda yaya Bala yabawa Rukky kuin da kanta taje kasuwa tai siyayyar duk abinda tasan basudashi ya k'are
hakan yasa tunda su Zahra da Salma sukazo kularsu da banne
rana da yamma take girki
suma da yake susan halin Khadijat da k'azanta shiyasa basucin abincinta yanda takawo haka take zuwa ta auki kayanta
idan ba girkin Rukky bane basuci abinci kowa a gidan
sai ko idan su suka faa da kansu
Da yake da yaransu sukazo
Salma tazo da yara biyu na goye da wanda yakeshan nono
Zahra ma haka yara biyu tazo dashi
Sauban ne babba sai k'arami na goye
Da yake Sauban mai wayone kullum yana akin Khadijat ko Rukky gurin Muhammed suna wasa
yauma akin akin Rukky yaje suna wasa da Muhammed
gani irin mugun wasan da sukeyi yasa Rukky yiwa Sauban magana da subayi da yake shine babba akan Muhammed
Ba tareda Rukky ta ankara ba ihu Muhammed kawai taji
ya kwalla uban k'asa
hai da kiran sunanta
A guje tazo ta agasa daga kwance da yake tana lallashinsa hai da tambayarsa meya faru
Ko kafin Muhammed yai magana a guje Sauban yafice daga akin zuwa akin iya
Gani muhammed yaki daina kuka yasa Rukky tambayarsa meke damusa?
"Hannu ya nuna mata alamar ciwo
aga hannu da zatai Muhammed yasa ihu yana kiran hannuna
ashe gocewa hannu yai
gani haka fita dashi tai zuwa gun Khadijat ta nuna mata hannu hai da fai mata duk yanda akaiyi
Khadijat bata tsaya bata lokaci ba ta auki Muhammed zuwa gurin masu gyaran hannu
ita kima Rukky tasha alwashin sai dai idan Sauban bazai sake shiga akinta ba domin saida ta fai masa daya daina irin wasan da yakewa Muhammed amma be daina ba
tou yanzu ga abinda daya jawo masa

_________"Gani Sauban yashigo a guje yasa Zahra tambayarsa lafiya?"Rau-rau yai da ido sannan yace"babu komai""Anya kuwa Sauban,nafasan halinka

domin nasan halin Sauban idan har yashiga gun ba'a tashi lafiya"
Cikin masifa iya ta tareta da wani irin magana takeyi haka?
idan bata yarda da anta ba waye takeso ta yarda dashi?"ta koma ta zauna kada taje ko ina,domin idan taje ta rambayesu koda beyi komai ba zasuce yayi domin ba tsoron Allah ne dasu ba

tana zuwa taga aki bue babu kowa

" murmushi Khadijat tai hai da cewa"me kikaci na baka na zuba,muje daga ciki mana

a fusace da juya zuwa akin iya
Khadijat dake tsaye bin bayanta tai hai da bata hakuri kada ta dukesa"Zahra na shiga ta fisgo Sauban dake mak'ale jikin iya tahau dukansa kamar Allah ya aikata garesa
salati iya tai hai da k'ok'arin amsar Sauban
Amma takasa
Khadijat da Salma ne suka amshesa hai dayi mata faa da tayi hakuri ta rabu dashi domin abinda yafaru yariga ya faru
cikin masifa iya ke cewa"kedai Allah ya wadaran halinki,sabida an wani zaki kashe naki,ni ban ta6a gani hakaba sai a kanki
itako Salma kuwa tambayar Zahra tai dalilin dukan sa da tai
cikin faa Zahra ke sanarwa Salma abinda Sauban ya aikata tanayi tana mangaresa haa da fa mata irin maganar dayake auko mata acan garinsu kullum cikin kawo mata kiransa akeyi
muddun yafita sai ankawo k'aransa hatta boko ko islamiya aka turasa saiya auko mata magana
Murmuahi Salma tai hai da cewa"ciki gaba da addu'a insha Allahu wataran sai labari
Itama Khadijat dake tsaye haka tace hai da shafe masa kai tace"Sauban manyan gari
Allah ya shirya ko
"karaf iya tace"ehhh kyace haka mana
muguwa azaluma,kuje ku haawa yari makirci kunsa anduke akan abinda besan hawaba besan hauka ba
wlh Allah saiya saka masa
jin haka yasa Zahra tahau iya da fai inda take shiga banan take fitaba
da yake itace auta kuma sannan duk cikin yaranta tafiji da Zahra sai k'amaru
shiruuuu iya tai kamar batagun,duk maganar da Zahra keyi ko tari iya batai ba
gani faar zaiyi yawane yasa Salma dakatar da Zahra da cewa ya isa haka
kadafa ta mance da itace ta haifeta ba ita ta haifeta ba dan haka duk abinda zatai iya tarink'ayi rana dubawa
jikin Zahra yai aanyi shiru tai bata sake magana ba
ita kuwa Khadijat ficewa tai daga akin tabasu gu
kafin ta shiga aki saida tasake lek'a akin su Rukky taduba Muhammed gani yasamu bacci yasata cewa ai dole,kodan kukan da kaima ya isa kai bacci
Yara ba mutumba saiya girma, ba a daeba yasake fitowa wasa

a guje yajuya da niyyar komawa ciki,a ganisa dukansa zatayi

ihu yasa hai da kiran ummanta
Jin ihun Sauban yasa iya fitowa a guje

ta sanya hannu kenan saiga iya tazo a guje

Nanfa hankali kamaru yai matuar tashi yaji babu abinda yake buata irin mace
Gani yanda kwayar idanunsa su kaane yasa SHUKHURAT sanya hannu ta zuge zip in rigarta
Da yake rigar me zip in gabane,hakan yasa tana zugewa kawai nonuwar sukai masa ambaliya a fuska
jinsu da yai shi kansa besan lokacin daya cafkosu yafara shafewa yana murzawa hai da tsotsewa ba
Gani haka yasa SHUKHURAT jansa zuwa gado,wnn karon kam su shana babu laifi domin sai na iya cewa ma har yafi wanda sukai ranar farko

domin yanda yaso nuna mata rashin kyautawar abinda sukai amma SHUKHURAT ta hanasa
domin a cewarsa inda bayaso ita bata isa tai masa dole ba
Dan haka kada yasake yi mata magana makamancin haka
Dole yasa amaru yin shiru
A angaren Rukky kuwa kamar yanda yasaba kiranta yaji kwanansu da yara haka yakeyi mata babu canji
Hakan yasa har zuwa wanin lokaci bata bataga wani canji daga garesa ba
Samuwar Rukky ayane shine maganar tafiyarsu, tunda yatafi be sake tutuarta da maganar tafiyar ba
Gashi koda tai masa magana kullum magana ayane babu canji,a duk lokacin da zatai masa magana hakuri kawai yake bata hai da cewa"har yanzu besamu akin bane yasa taji shiru amma akwai wani akin da akai masa alkawari idan har Mutumi da yake ciki yafita zuwan bazata zaiyi mata yazo ya auketa sutafi
Tun daga lokacin Rukky ke zuba ido a hanya,gani yau tsawo watansa uku kenan da tafiya yasa Rukky sake tutuarsa da maganar,kamar yanda yasaba yi mata kullum haka ma yau
Gani tadamu yasa amaru turo mata da kui yace tasiye duk abinda take buata,godiya kawai tai masa amma be kai zuci ba, suna are magana rusawa da matsananci kuka tai hai da tambayar kanta komai meyesa amaru ya canza mata?,meyesa yake niman jefata cikin wani hali,meyesa amaru yake gudunta,kodai batai kalar matan da ake fita dasu bane,ko kuma wata yasamu yasa yaje gudunta?

tsawa amaru yadaka masa da yafice ya basa gu,snn kuma idan har yanaso su shirya kada ya sake yimasa maganar su rabu da SHUKHURAT idan kuma ba haka ba,toufa kowa zai kama gabansa
Allah yabaka hakuri Ugochuwu yace hai da miewa, koda Ugochuwu yakuma akinsa kasa bacci yai sabida tunanin kamaru,wani agare kuma gani laifinsa yakeyi domin inda be kawota ba babu yanda za'ayi su had da amaru
Da yake lokacin aren watane, amaru na samu salary yaturawa Rukky kuin abinci kamar yanda yasaba
Tana gani alart da sauri tabue bayan ta dubi yawan kui snn takisa tai masa godiya
Tana are aikin da takeyi ta auki Muhammed da Muhasana saida suka sallami Baffa da khaidijat, Khadijat a gtatsile ta amsa da Allah ya kiyaye hanya, snn suka fita
Suna fita suka sami napep zuwa banking
Tunda suka shiga napep in wayarta ke hannu Muhammed yana wasa dashi har suka isa
Suna isa sukai karo da wnn Mutumi da suka taa hauwa kwanaki
Iji masu iya magana sukafi yaro baya mantuwa
Muhammed yana hangosa a guje yaje ya rungumesa yana fain oyoyo abokina
A fisgice Mutumi ya juya,duk da ya mance da Muhammed amma hakan be hanasa aukarsa ba shima yana yimasa oyoyo
Yasan haka kawai dai Muhammed bazaizo ya rungumesa ba ba tare da wani dalili ba
Rukky dake bayansu,idan banda harara baby abinda takewa Muhammed
Dan ma kada su haa ido da ita yasa Muhammed auke fuskarsa daga nata
Gani Muhammed na kallon baya yasa mutumi juyawa,juyawar da zaiyi yaga Rukky na hararan Muhammed
Dariya yai snn yace"Allah ya baki hakuri
Kunya ne ya kamata, ta rasa inda zatasa kanta dan kunya
Duawa tai cikin girmamawa ta gaidashi,tun daga snn magana be sake haasu ba,da Muhammed kawai yaketa wasa har layi yazo kansa snn yace da ita tazo ta cire
Tou tace hai da godiya, tana cirewa sukai sallama ta tafi
Kamar kwana biyu da suka wuce haka ma yau,tun safe Rukky ta kasa sukuni,tayi tsarki da ruwan zafin harta gaji
Kiran amaru tai tasa masa kuka
Cikin zafin rai amaru ya hauta da fai,har yana cewa"ita wace irin macece, tafiyar wata uku zuwa hudu amma duk tabi ta damisa
Allah yabawa matan da mazajansu suke tafiyar shekaru su barsu hakuri
sai kace akanta aka fara aure,tou wlh bari jiki idan zaki oyi yanda ake zaman kaaita ki koya idan kuma ba haka ba sai dai kisan yanda zakiyi
Domin sabida ke bazan daina abinda nakeyi anan nazo ba

Daya gama dan kansa ya kashe wayar
Tun daga lokacin Rukky tashiga matsanacin damuwa hai da mamaki sauyawar kamaru
Bayan kwana biyu lokaci tayiwa su Muhammed da Muhsana wanka tana shiryasu kenan taji wayarta yai ara, Muhammed yace"umma baba yatiya
murmushi tai masa snn tace yaje ya auko

_______"Innallilahi wa'inna'ilaihin raju'un kawai take amfata,tanayi ne hai da arewa numbar kallo
gani numbar aya ne da wanda akai mata sao rannan yasa Rukky tambayar kanta da wai waye ke niman wargaza mata rayuwa ne haka?,inane yasami number ta da har yake aikomi da sakonni haka
sallamar Khadijat ce ya katse Rukky
Tun daga lokacin bata sake bi tasan saon ba,sai dai mantuwa aya da tai shine bata goge numbar ba
Duk da yanzu ta fara jin hau shin amaru akan aryan da yake yi mata na besamu aya ba yasa ta fara jin haushinsa
Wani lokaci ma tasa gani shigowar kiran sa amma bazata aga kiran ba har yai ya katse dan hakan,idan har kaga ta aga tofa akwai su Muhammed ne agun sabida kada su gane abinda ke tafiya yasa take agawa har ma tabasu suyi magana da bbnsu
Duk da abinda ke faruwa amma Rukky bata daina bawa Baffa kulawa ba, akai-akai fiye ma da dah take shi dubasa, snn kuma duk abinda ya buata take takeyi masa hakan yasa daga Baffa har Yaya Bala suke alfahari da ita a matsayinta na surukansu
A angaren iya kuwa, kwata-kwata ta daina zuwa duba Baffa,a cewarta tunda ga a Rukky ai basai taje ba,domin Rukky tafita muhimmaci a gun Baffa dan haka babu inda zata
Koda Yaya Bala yaje ya sameta da tarina zuwa tana dubasa komai batai masa komai ba,cewa tai tunda tariga data rantse babu inda zata,dan haka kada yasake tunkaranta da wani magana makamanci haka
Gani Yaya Bala zai matsa mata yasa iya cewa"idan yasake magana wlh saita tsine mata
Jin haka yasa Yaya Bala miewa ya fice daga akin ba tare daya sake cewa komai ba
Tun daga ranar koda da wasa ne Yaya Bala be sake tunkaran iya da maganar ba
Idan har kaga ya shiga side inta tofa gaisune ya kaisa amma ba maganar Baffa ba
Wani yammacin talata misalin arfe hudu na yamma lokacin Rukky ta shiga akin Baffa domin kwashe kwanukan daya ata ta wanke
Lokacin Baffa na bacci,sallamar Rukky ce yasa Baffa falkawa daga bacci da yakeyi
Tana shiga yakirata da RAKIYA!!!da sauri Rukky ta juya hai da cewa"Baffa ka tashi ne?
Eh, na tashi"
"Yaya jikin dai?""Jki alhamdullhi"
Eh nasha,zonan, Baffa yace wa Rukky"yunurawa yai yanaso ya mie
Gani haka yasa Rukky zuwa tasa hannu ta taimaka masa yasamu ya mie,jikinsa tai jikin bango yanda tasaba,saida ya gyara zama snn yace"zonan""ara matsawa tai kusa shi,snn Baffa yai gyaran murya hai da kiran sunata RAKIYA"
Na'am ta amsa dashi
Snn Baffa ya fara RAKIYA nikam banida abinda zance dake sai godiya,domin kin gamami komai a rayuwa,irin abinda kikai min nayi 'ya'yan dana haifa a cikina bazasu min ba, Allah yai maki albarka RAKIYA, Allah ya baki maso saka maki, Allah ya albarkacin rayuwarki keda yaranki
Insha Allahu RAKIYA kin bar tagayyara a rayuwa,duk wani me niman gani bayanki insha Allahu sai dai ke kiga bayansa, RAKIYA har na koma ga ubangiji na bazan gajiya da sah maki albarka ba, RAKIYA kiyi hakuri-kiyi kahuri da rayuwa sanan kinayi amma ki haara komai an hakuri ne,bi'izinallahi daga har zuri'arki baku taa tabewa ba, Allah ya jikan mahaifinki yasaka masa da gidan al'jannah,idan tamu arshen yazo Allah yasa muyi tashin sa'a
Da irin wa'anga addu'o'in Baffa ya kashewa Rukky jiki wanda har saida tai kuka
Ya jima yana bata hakuri akan zaman duniya hai da musalai iri-iri,kuka sosai Rukky tai snn ta kwashi kayan ta fita daga akin

A angaren amaru kuwa al'amarin sai gaba-gaba yakeyi tun yana shakkan Ugochuwu har yakai ga baya shakkansa yanzu haka a gabansa yana iya komai ba tare da kunya ko shayi ba

Haka yau ma kamar sauran lokuta daya saba tareta,da yake yariga amaru dawowa daga aiki,yana hawa benen da zai arisa side insu yai karo da ita zataje ibawa amaru ruwa,tun kafin ta ariso inda yake tsaye wani irin kallo yai mata hai da teaki snn yace"useless girl snn ya arisa

amaru na dawowa ta kwashe duk yanda sukai da Ugochuwu ta fai masa
Hakuri ya fara bata snn daga bisani yace da ita taje ta kwaso kayanta ta dawo nan akinsa da zama
SHUKHURAT tai murna sosai da hukunci da amaru ya yanke akanta, sabida dama kuin akinta ya kusan arewa,ita kuma batada kuin biyan wani
tunda ba wani kui yake bata ba
Ranar a gidan ta kwana,washe gari kuwa tare sukaje suka kwaso kayanta zuwa cikin Barack da yake zama
Nan sukai arrange komai kace mata da miji ne

Gani bazai iya aure da gani abin takaici da bain ciki ba yasa bayan su fita aiki Ugochuwu yakewa amaru magana akan zaman da sukeyi shida SHUKHURAT be dace a matsayinsa na musulmi yana aikata irin wann ba
Basu musulmai ba kosu da suke cristain addininsu ya haramta haka bale shi
Duk maganar da Ugochuwu kewa amaru be tankasa ba har saida ya gama maganar sa snn amaru yace dashi yaje yaji da damuwarsa,kada ya sake sah masa ido a harokinsa, idan kuma ba haka ba kowa zai kama gabansa
Duk Ugochuwu ya auka kamar kullum ne da yake fai hakan yasa shi shashantar da maganar amaru yaci gaba da cewa"wlh idan be koreta ba zai kira Rukky ya fai mata duk irin abinda yake aikatawa anan

Snn yaci gaba da cewa"wai meye haina dakai?,inace dai hauwar bariki ne,na roeka Dan Allah daga yau babu ni babu kai amaru ya arisa maganar ne hai da miewa ya fice daga ofishin yabar Ugochuwu zaune yana mamakin amaru
Tun daga lokacin in ba gaisuwa ba babu abinda ke shiga tsakanisa da Ugochuwu
hakan ba aramin faranta wa SHUKHURAT rai yai ba,domin gani ta faranta masa rai kamar yanda shima ya faranta mata nata ran hakan yasa tai masa kyankyawan tanaji
Kafi yadawo daga aiki tai masa tuwon shinkafa da miyar vegetable soup,tana gamawa ta kwaso ta jere masa a inda yasaba zama yana cin abicin snn taje ta kawo masa su ruwan sanyi da juice kala-kala masu sanyin gaske duk ta jere masa snn ta shiga gyara sauran inda ya rage bata gyara ba saida ta are gyara ko ina snn taje tai wanka,bata dae da shiga na ta fito,cikin anani lokaci ta shirya ciki riga da sket
Irin kayan nan ne ta sanya wanda zan iya cewa ita da babu duk aya ne, rigace wacce bata wuce cibiya ba, nonuwa kuwa kusan nace a waje suke

Befi minti biyar da zamanta ba amaru yai sallama, jin sallamarsa yasa SHUKHURAT miewa a guje taje ta taresa da oyoyo-oyoyo baby, rungumesa tai hai da banaro irjinsa ta haa da nasa tana faman gogewa

amaru ya jima yana tsotse-tsotse snn yanimi sanya bananarsa cikin nata

Ta jima tana sha,jin sautinsa ya canza alamar zaiyi release yasa SHUKHURAT cire bakinta daga bananargani haka yasa amaru saurin miewa ya fisgota hai da hankaeta tun kafin ta kwanta tuni ya hankaeta ya haye kanta yana tura bananar ya fara soking nata

Da haka rayuwa yaci gaba da tafiya,tsakani kamaru da Rukky kuma sai abinda Allah yai,ba kasafai yake kiransu ba,idan ta kirasa kuma ya hayayyaeta da masifa da bala'i,ta inda yake shiga ba tanan yake fita ba

wani lokacin ma har sai watan ya are bataga dubu biyun ba

duk da Yaya Bala yana sane da matsalar rashin zuwa gidan amaru amma be san cewa abin yakai ga baya kulawa da iyalinsa ba
Koda yasa Khadijat ta kira masa Rukky be kira Rukky dan wani abu ba,yasa a kirata ne domin ya tambayeta ko amaru yana kiranta,tunda ita matarsa ce ba abin mamaki bane ace ita ya kiranta
jin Rukky tace baya kiranta yasa Yaya Bala mamakin amaru
daga lokaci zuciyarsa ta fara masa sake-sake kala-kala

al'amura agun Rukky kuwa duk subi su kwae idan ma Yaya Bala da yaya Mu'azam suna taimaka mata sosai,ari kobo idan suka samu suna aika mata dashi
A angaren Khadijat kuwa tunda taga Rukky ta shiga wnn hali jawota a jki tai fiye ma da dah, mafi yawancin lokata harda anyen abinci take bawa Rukky ba tare da sani yaya bala ba

Koda ya shiga gani Baffa yai kwance a rigigine fuskansa na kallon samu idanu a bue,babu inda ke motsida sauri Yaya Bala ya arisa kan shinfiar hai da kiran sunansa, Baffa! Baffa!! Baffa!!! Duk yana kiran sunan Baffa ne yana jikigasa,amma Baffa be motsa ba
jikin Yaya Bala na rawa yasa hannu gefen wiyar Baffa ko zaiji wani alama, shiru yaji babu wani alama,daga ganinsa ma yajima da cikawa
Innallilahi wa'inna'ilaihin raju'un Yaya Bala ya furta hai da rusawa da kuka

_______"Innallilahi wa'inna'ilaihin raju'un Yaya Bala ya furta
jin muryan Yaya Bala cikin kuka yasa iy yanke sallar da takeyi, cikin rawan jiki ta fito daga akin tana tafe tana tambayar kanta da lafiya an gidan Yaya ke kuka?
Jin ya ambaci Allah ya jikanka Baffa yasa iya rusawa da kuka
Cikin rawan jiki ta arisa akin,gani baffa kwance sharaf yasa iya zubewa akansa hai da cewa"Allah ya jikinka USMAN Allah yasa ka huta Allah yasa mutuwa hutuce gareka,wayoo Allah na,na shiga uku, USMAN kayafe min wlh bansan zaka rigani mutuwa ba
Dan Allah ka yafemi,na tuba USMAN, Allah ya jikinka da rahma
Gani yanda take yamutsa Baffa dake kwance
Jin sautin kuka ne yasa su Khadijat da Rukky fitowa a guje har suna karo da juna
Suna shiga gani Baffa sukai kwance gawa,sai iya dake faman kuka hai da rokon Baffa gafara

Be ata lokaci ba ya domin zuwa ofishinsu domin aukar izinin tafiya gida

Idan ya motsa sai kuma ya tsaya,gani haka yasa Rukky tambayarsa da lafiya?
Babu komai yace da ita,da haka har yai release ba tare da buatarta ya biya ba ya sauka
Mamaki ne ya kama Rukky,wai kaman amaru shine ya koma haka?,anya kuwa babu lauje cikinna din?
Mutumi da a dare idan yai sau biyu gani yake beyi komai ba in ba sau hudu ko sau biyar yai ba amma yau shine keyi sau aya, sau ayan ma daar yakeyi, kai ina?
Yini ranar da irin wnn tunane-tunanen Rukky ta yini, har wani daren yai,kamar yanda yai a daren jiya haka ma yau
Gani bazata iya aurewa ba yasa da safe ta taresa da maganar
Kawai cewa yai,bayajin daine snn kuma ga maganar rasuwar Baffa dalilin da yasa idan ya hauta baya iya komai
Amma tai hakuri akwai hutun da zasu samo idan suka samo zaizo yai wata aya a gida
Shiruuu Rukky tai tana me are masa kallo, batace dashi komai ba har saida yai shiru snn tace"Yaya maganar tafiyarmu, ko kafasa zuwa damune?
Oooo kibar wani maganar tafiyarku Rukky,ki zauna anan kawai zaifi,banaso yarana su tashi a barack sabida tarbiyansu zai iya lallacewa amma kinga idan kuna nan babu abinda zai sami tarbiyansu
Uhmm kawai Rukky tace dashi,gani hawaye suna shirin zubo mata yasa ta miewa tabar masa gun
Washe gari da yin addu'ar uku suka shirya domin komawa garin aiki
Har amaru ya dauki jaka gani bashida niyyar bata ko sisi yasa Rukky sanar masa da basuda abinci,abimcinsu ya are
Nan ya hauta da masifa inda yake shiga banan yake fita ba,ya jima yana masifa snn ya fita daga akin,gun Ugochuwu yaje ya kuma amsar dubu biyar ya kawo mata snn ya dauki jakarsa be tsaya suyi sallamar arziki ba a fusace ya fice daga akin
Duk da kiran da Muhammad da Muhasana keyi masa Amma besa ya tsaya ya sauraresu ba
Takaici yasa Rukky hurgi da kuin daya bata zubewa tai a asa tasa kuka

be bari ta arisa ba ya hanntareta da dama na sani,haka kawai bazaki kira ba sai kinada matsala,sarkin lalura,tou bari jiki sisina bazaiyi ciwon kan ba idan kinga dama ki warke idan baki warke bama babu abinda ya dameni domin nima ta kaina nake
Snn kuma idan har kin san kiranki bata alkhairi bane tou ki bari domin bazan yarda ina zaune lafiya ki kirani ki tadamin hankali ba,ba ciwo ba ki mutu mana ba damuwata bace jakar banza kawai
amaru ya arisa maganar ne da kashe wayar sa
Bain ciki yasa Rukky kwarma ihu hai da halbi da wayar, yanke jiki tai ta fai snn ta fasa da matsananci kuka
Ta jima tana kuka,can kuma ta mie firgigi hijabinta dake kan sallayata ta auka tasa sanyawa ta kwashi yaranta tafice daga gida
Kai tsaye gidansu ta nufa,tana tafe tana kuka har ta isa gida
Tana shiga sukai karo da Yaya Mu'azam a zaure,suna haa ido subhanallilahi yace hai da tambayar lafiya?
Jin Yaya Mu'azam ya tambayeta yasa Rukky rusawa da wani sabon kuka
Gani haka yasa Yaya Mu'azam cewa"zo muje,waje suka fita,sabida kada inna ta gansu,bayan su zauna ne yake tambayar abinda ke faruwa
Kuka ne yaci arfin Rukky ta kasa magana
Takaici da tausayinta ya kama Yaya Mu'azam,duk da bata fai masa damuwar ta amma kallo aya zaikai mata kasan tana cikin matsa, musanman ma yanda ta one ta ara baki, shiruuu Yaya Mu'azam yai yana tunani ta ina zai fara gashi taki magana bale yasan abinda ke damuta
Tsora mata ido da yai ne yasa Yaya Mu'azam ganowa batada lafiya,jiki a sanyaye yace"amma bakida lafiya ne ko?
Kai kawai Rukky ta aga masa alamar eh
Ina zuwa yace da ita,da sauri ya koma cikin gida,yana shiga suka hau da inna dake aiki a tsakar gida,gani yanda ya shigo cikin zafin nama yasata tambayarsa lafiya?
Babu komai yace da ita, akinsa ya shiga ya auko kui naira dubu biyar saida ya sanyasu cikin aljihu ya gyara jikinsa snn ya fito,yana fita inna ta bisa da ido tana me are masa kallo
Yana ciro kui yai ya bayawa Rukky yace taje asibiti duk yanda sukai da likita ta kirasa ta sanar dashi
Tou tace"amsar kuin tai snn tai masa godiya, tare suka fita saida yaga ta samu napep ta shiga zuwa asibiti snn ya tafi
Yinin ranar da tunani Rukky Yaya Mu'azam ya yini,sai faman sake-sake zuciyarsa keyi masa
Koda Rukky taje taga likita magani maleria ya rubuta mata, batabar asibiti ba saida ta siye maganin snn taje gida
Jin shieu bata kirasa ba tasa shi kiranta ya tambayeta yanda sukai da likita
Nan take sanar dashi,tou kawai yace da ita,bayan la'asar saiga Yaya Mu'azam yai sallama dubu biyu ya kawo mata yace ta siye maganin
Tun daga lokacin Yaya Mu'azam ke kula da Rukky fiye da dah, lokaci-lokaci yakan yo mata aiken kui ba tare da sani kowa ba
Rukky taji dain yanda Mu'azam ke kulawa da ita, a angaren amaru kuwa gaba aya taji ta tsanesa inama da tun faro batasan saba,kama numbar tai gaba aya tai deleting din numbar a wayarta taci gaba da rayuwarta ita da yaranta
A angaren iya kuwa gani tun mutuwar Baffan da amaru yazo ya tafi be sake zuwa ba,babu shi babu alamarsa
Bayan isha lokacin Yaya Bala ya dawo daga kasuwa aikawa tai aka kira mata shi, kasawa tai ta tsare tace sai dai Yaya Bala ya kira mata dalilinsa na gudunsu da yakeyi ko yasamu wasu iyayen da suka fisu ne bata sani ba,ko kuma mancewa ne yai dasu
Gani da gaske iya take yasa Yaya Bala yanke mata arya cewa aikine aka turasu cikin daji kuma bazasu fito ba sainan da wasu watani,gashi babu network a daji, bazasu kiraba kuma baza a kira su
Himm kawai iya tace,domin bata gamsu da maganar Yaya Bala ba
Bayan sati duhu Rukky na kwance tana wasa da waya karam taji sao ya shigo,gani numbar ce dai hmm kawai tace snn ta bue hai da cewa yau kuma dame kazo?
Sao tagani kamar haka
Ke ta daban ce,kinsha babban da sauran mata,in da akwai wasu tarin tsintsaye da suke wani suna tattana batutuwa a kan irin matsayin da na baki a cikin zuciyata zan so kiji irin abinda suke cewa, domin kuwa a lokacin ne zaki tabbatar da irin son da nakeyi maki
Nasan zaki ce banida zuciya ko?wlh ba haka bane soyayyarki ce ta medani haka,ina me tabbatar maki idan har banga saonki ba insha Allahu daga yau kin bar ara ganin saona zantafi tafiya ta har abada, daga mai aunarki na haia I love! I love!! I love!!!
Daga me aunarki a koda yaushe
Nannayar a jiyar zuciya Rukky tai hai da cewa"meke shirin faruwa danine haka?,anya ba shean bane kuwa,kai bazai yuwu ba,zama tai tai shiruuuuu tana me nazari kala-kala ta jima tana tunanin rayuwa da kuma yanda amaru ya juya mata baya,ya tafi ya barsu
Wata zuciya tace''a'a Rukky kada ki bari shean ya yaudareki ki aikata mummunar aiki
wata zuciya kuma tace'' dallah ja can,tunani me kikeyi,ki zauna dai kiga zama bayan wanda kikeyi a kansa bema bani ba,mutumi dayai tafiyarsa yanacan ya sharholiyasa ya mance daku bayama tunaniku shine har zaki tsaya kina bata lokacinki sabida shi
Wata zuciya kuma tace'' Rukky kada ki bari wanan damar ya yuceki domin kuwa dama aya ke zuwa ma bawa a rayuwa,kin ga kuwa gwamma ki fancama tunda saura uruciyarki,kema kiji dain da mata keyi,haka kawai da yarintarki ki kibari tunanin wato ato ya medaki tsohuwa
Rukky ta jima tana irin wanan tunani,can kamar an tsikareta da sauri ta auki wayar ta kan message insa ta shiga snn ta fara rubuta masa reply da wassalam,iya abinda ta rubuta kenan ta tura masa
Yana kwance wayar na ore a irjinsa yaji shigowar sao,da sauri ya aga kallo screen in da zaiyi yaga numbar Rukky,tun kafin ya bue yace"Alhamdullhi

***Gani waya sukeyi basu hau ba yasa mutumi cewa Rukky yanaso su hau a yau inna
Take RUKKy taji gabanta yai mumunar fauwa, shiruuuuu tai batace dashi komai ba
jin tai shine yasa mutumi dariya snn yace"nasan tunani kikeyi sabida nace inaso mu hau ko?
Kala-kala da murya tace"eh wlh""Allah sarki my baby kada ki damu,duk yanda zanyi zanyi domin gani na kare maki mutunci da darajanki
Tou Rukky tace,snn yaci gaba da cewa"abu aya nake buata dake
Inajin ka Rukky tace"
Snn yaci gaba da cewa"zan jiraki ta citily hotel kizo ki sameni anan,sabida gurin yafi sirri kome kikace?
Tou kawai Rukky tace
Suna sallama kamar yanda tai dashi 4-30PM ta shirya cikin doguwar riganta ta shadda,saida takai su Muhammed da Muhsana gurin su Khairat snn ta sallami Khadijat da cewa bari naje kasuwa na dawo ba daewa zanba
Tou kawai Khadijat tace"tana me arewa Rukky kallo
Rukky na fita tasami napep tahau,da yake babu kowa a ciki,ita kaai ce kawai yasa Rukky cewa kada ya dauki kowa
duk tana maganar ne a tsorace,da haka har saka kai kusa da in da yai fakin motarsa,yana zaune yana kallon hanya,duk da besan waye a cikin napep din dake dufaresa ba amma jikinsa ya basa cewa"Rukky ce
Da sauri ya auki waya ya kirata
rukky na gani shigowar kiran sa da sauri ta auki wayar hai da sallama
Kece cikin napep in da nake hange?
Eh tace"
Ok,sauka a gu,saiki ariso da afa
Tou ta kuma cewa,tana kashe wayar tace ya sauketa agun
sai dai tabiya me napep kuinsa snn ta arisa inda take fake da mota,duk rakun Rukky idonsa na kanta har ta arisa,tana arisowa bue mata ayan gefen yai hai da cewa bismillh
Gabanta ne yasake mumunar fai,Amma sai ta danne da bismillh ta shigo motar tana shiga ya rufe motar ta ciki snn ya juya gareta,suna haa ido da sauri ta kauda fuska
Shiko cewa yai wowww!!! My baby na dae ina kallon taurari dake sararin samaniya yayin da naga wacce tafi kowace haske a cikinsu,wanan kuwa ba kowa bace sai ke masoyiyata
Jin nawin kalaman dayake fai yasa kunya kama Rukky da sauri taja mayafin da take rufe dashi ta rufe fuskanta
Dariya mutumi yai snn yace"my baby kunyata kikeji ko?,tou bari mu aresa inda zata zauna muyi hira ko?saida ya ara arfin AC in dake kunne snn ya tada motar suka fara tafiya

My baby Allah ya jarabceni da sonki da aunarki

damko hannunta da yai ne yadawo da ita daga tunanin da takeyi

RUKAYYA

tou kawai tace

Tana cikin haka kenan saiga saon alhj KHAMEES ya shigo wayarta,koda ta karanta bata meda masa reply ba,ora wayar tai akan irjinta taci gaba da tunani,daren ranar kusan kasa bacci tai sabida tunani

______"J-boy na fita daga gidan Alhj KABIRU kai tsaye gidan hjynsa ya nufa godiya yai mata sosai snn ya fice daga gidan zuwa gidan sa

tare suka jere kayan a kici,kowane aka ajesa a mazaunisa

baban Sofy da kansa ya kira J-boy domin jin gsskiyan zance
