_____"Suna isa mutumi yasa matarsa ta orasa Iya ruwan zari,saida Iya tai wanka snn tai sallah,bayan ta idar ne taci abinci
Yaya Bala kuwa can waje suke suna hira shida mutumi, basu shigo ba har saida dare yai snn suka shigo cikin gida
Har iya ta fama bacci sukai sallama,sallamar su ya tada iya,tashi tai ta zauna bayan su shigo suma su zauna ne mutumi ya fara da nemar alfarma,duk da batasan wani irin alfarma yake nema a guta ba amma ta am'sa da Allah yasa befi arfina ba
an gutun ajiyar zuciya yai snn ya fara da bata hakuri,ya jima yana bata hakuri
Gani yanda yakeyi ne yasa iya duk tabi ta tsargi,gani bashi da niyyar bari bare taji dalilinsa nayi hakan yasa iya saurin dakatar dashi hai da cewa"Dan Allah ya isa haka,ya fai abinda ke tafe dashi kawai
A lokacin ne mutumi yace"da ita tayi hakuri ta yafewa amaru,domin idan har bata yafe masa saiya shiga halin da yafi wanda yake ciki a yanzu,amma idan har tayafe masa Allah ma zai yafe masa snn kuma dah haka sai kaga Allah ya karkato da hankalinsa zuwa gareki
Tsonuwa da zage-zage duk ba nata bane addu'a ne ya kamata tai masa ba zagi ba
Gani duk a lokacin bata sasuda ba,yasa mutumi kawo mata musali kala-kala harda na arya duk saida ya haa mata dashi,snn iya taji jikinta yai sanyi
Rusawa da kuka tai hai da cewa"yaya zanyi,wlh ni kaina bana sani lokacin da nake tsene masa,amma tunda abin ya zama haka na yafe masa Allah ya yafe mana baya aya yasa ya kuma ganar dashi
Duk suka ma'sa da ameen
Su jima suna hira snn sukai sallama na saida safe
Washe gari kuwa asalatun fari suka nufi tasha,suna zuwa suka sami mota zuwa Abuja,gani mota ya tashi yasa iya sake rusawa da wani sabon kuka,tanayi tana kiran sunan amaru hai da cewa"yanzu ni kaiwa haka?ni zaka wulaanta?amma babu komai duniya ce
"Hakuri kawai Yaya Bala ke bata,da haka har tai shiru,da tafiya yai tafiya ma bacci ne ya auketa,ko kafin ta falka jikinta yai tsami"

bayan su sauka ne Yaya Bala ya biya me napep kuinsa snn ya auki masgo insu suka arisa daga cikin gida" Suna sallama,da yake lokaci Muhammed beyi bacci ba, yasa jin muryan Yaya Bala ya fito a guje yana fain baban Khairat oyoyo,!baban Khairat oyoyo,!!
A guje ya fice daga aki yaje ya taresa da oyoyo,jin muryan Muhammed yanayi wa babansu oyoyo ne yasa su Khairat da Na'eem fitowa daga nasu side in,suma suna yiwa babansu oyoyo
Yana zuwa a guje ya rungume Yaya Bala yana fain oyoyo bbn Khairat

"Ya jima zaune yana kuka, zuburrr ya mie tsaye,kofin silver dake kusa dashi ya auka yai hurgi dashi snn yaci gaba duk abinda ya rarumo kwan dashi yakeyi da asa ko kuma ya buga dashi da bango hatta tv dake akin be barsu ba duk saida amaru ya ragargaza su"  Yan shaw glass din Rukky wanda yake auke da kayan turarukanta duk saida amaru ya farfasa su
Jin ara yai yawa yasa iya fitowa hai da tambayar lafiya?,tun daga bakin ofa take hango kaya a warwatse har zuwa cikin akin"  "Da salati iya ta arisa aki,tana shiga taga amaru cikin wanan hali,sake wani salatin tai hai da tambayarsa yaushe yazo?" Gani ya inimi tv zai rotsashi da asa yasa iya arisa a guje ta riesa hai da tambayar kansa aya kuwa
Bayan su sauke tv amaru ya sake rusawa da matsananci kuka hai da rungumar iya yana fai Rukky! Rukky!! Rukky!!! ta cuceni iya,iya na shiga uku na lalace wayyo Allana, wayyoooo Allahana iya

Shima kuka kawai yakeyi bebawa iya amsa ba,gani haka yasa iya zare amaru daga jikinta da sauri ta nufi cikin aki hai da kwadawa Rukky kira
koda ta shiga bata ganta ba sake fitowa tai taci gaba da tambayar amaru inda Rukky take
duk irin tambayar da iya kewa amaru be bata amsa ba
Bayan likita yai dube-duben da zaiyi ya gama jona mata drip yai hade da allurai snn yace dasu Yaya Bala da suke tsaye a kanta yace"ba wani matsala a zabar dukane amma idan tasamu wadattace bacci insha Allah komai zaiyi dai-dai

Dan haka asirin ya dae be tuno ba
Yaya Bala na isa bakin gate din asibiti ya sami napep yahau zuwa gida,zaune kawai yake amma gaba aya jikinsa babu gwari,suna isa ina zuwa yace dame napep in, da sauri ya arisa daga ciki,yana shiga sautin kukan iya yaji a akin amaru,da sauri ya nufi akin yana shiga ya tarar da halin da ake ciki

Cikin zafin rai amaru yace"ina runa da wata Rukky, Rukky banza Rukky wofi, Allah ya isa tsakanina da ita,kuma daga yau bani babu ita na saketa saki ukuuuu
kafin ya arisa ji kawai kakeyi fassfassfass wani irin wawayen maruka yaya Bala yai masa hai da shaesa,yana fai da alama shaye-shayen da kakeyi ne ya taa maka kwakwalwa

wayyooo yayana,yayana na shiga uku

Kai kawai amaru ke jijigawa alamar a'a,kukane yaci arfin sa yasa shi kasa magana
Gani tashin hankalin da mahaifiyarsu tashiga yasa Yaya Bala kama zauna ya zauna snn yasa hannu ya kamo iya zuwa akinta,Iya na tafe tana fain me zangani an gidan yaya wanan wacce irin masifa ce ta sauko min, innallilahi wa'inna'ilaihin raju'un subhanallilahi walhamdulillahi wala'ila'illahu'allahu akbar,gani ta shiga matsananci ruani yana Yaya Bala cewa baby komai iya,ki kwantar da hankalinki
Ina Rukky? Rukky fa an gidan Yaya,idan mutuwa tai ka faimi kawai
A'a Rukky ba mutuwa tai ba
Tou Ina take?
Suna shiga aki zaunar da ita yai yajima yana yimata masiha hai da batanan arya, domin shima kansa besan abinda hakan ba,saida yaga iya ta numfasa snn yakoma ga amaru,Su sujima suna magana da amaru,duk yanda amaru yaso yiwa Yaya Bala bayani amma yai fahimta domin har yanzu be yarda Rukky ce zata aikata irin abinda amaru ya fai masa ba
Sai dai tashin hankalinsa aya daya riga ya furta kalmar saki,gashi ba aya ba har uku
Dafe kansa yai yana innallilahi wa'inna'ilaihin raju'un,miewa yai zuwa akinsa,koda ya shiga be waje kawai yasamu ya zauna,domin gaba aya jikinsa yai sanyi
yana cikin wanan juyayin kenan saiga yaro yai sallama wai me napep yace a basa kuinsa
A lokacin ne ya tuna da cewa yabar me napep a waje, subhanallilahi yace"hai da miewa ciki yaje ya auko kui ya bawa yaron snn yace bayawa me napep in hakuri
Tunda Rukky tasami bacci bata tashi ba sai bayan azahar,tana bue ido gani su Muhasana da Muhammad tai tsantsaye a gefen gadon da take kwance,gani ta bue ido ne yasa su ara matsawa kusa da ita hai da kiran sunanta, ummanmu! ummanmu snnu umma!!
Jin kiranta dasu Muhammed sukai ne yasa Khadijat juyowa suna hai ido tace da ita Yaya jiki?
Kai Rukky ta aga alamar da sauki"
Yau dai hakuri zakuyi dani domin Short typing nayi,jima nayi log banga comment inku ba sai orafi da nayi tacin karo dashi,duk da haka banyi fushi ba snn kuma nagode sosai da orafinku domin ta hakane zaisa inda nayi ba dai-dai ba na gyara
Snn ina ara baku hakuri akan abinda ke faruwa da Rukky insha Allahu komai zai dai-daita, snn kuma inaso kusan cewa babu yanda za'ayi kayi rayuwa ba tare Allah ya jarabce keba, musanman ma idan kakasance me kyankyawan hali dole sai kaci karo da jarabawa iri-iri a rayuwa amma idan kai hakuri sai kaga komai ya wuce, al'amarin Khadijat da Rukky kuma wanan kowa yasan yanda kishin sauri yake,inji hausawa suce harma tafi kishiyar da kuke zaman miji aya kishi dakai,dan haka ku auki al'amarin Khadijat a matsayin mynus domin domin aikine a gabanta tukuru wanda bezoba kuma be wuce ba, kunga kenan na Rukky duk me saukine
dan haka inda zamu gano ta kowa ta fisheshi

_____"Cikin yanayi na tausayawa Khadijat ke magana,amma gaskiya Rukky kin ban mamaki,yanzu sabida Allah da hankalinki kika tsaya kika sa'insa da mijinki,tou yanzu meye ribarki?

Gyara zama Khadijat tai snn tace"wai ma na tambayeki Rukky
"Malauuuu Rukky tai da ido tana me sauraron abinda Khadijat zatace"             "Sake gyara wani zaman Khadijat tai snn tace"waima na tambayeki Rukky dan Allah wani irin laifine kikaiwa amaru da har ya ata masa rai daga dawowarsa ta hauki da duka,idan ma banda abinki yaushe rabonsa da gida,amma shine daga dawowarsa zai hauki da duka kamar dama yana ule dake,kodai wani labari ne yaji a kanki

Rukky inason kisan wani abu,barin kashi a ciki baya magani yunwa,domin haka ina me baki shawara da kifito ki fai damuwarki,idan ba baki yarda dani bane zaki iya tafiya ki samo wacce kika yarda da ita ki fai mata
Snn kuma na sanar dake wani abu da baki sani ba,wlh summa tallahi yanda nake jinki a zuciyata kowa ciki aya muka fito iyaka kenan, Rukky a yanda nake jiki wlh bazan iya gani abinda zai cutar dake na zuba ido ba sai inda arfina ya are,dan haka ina me baki shawara ki fito ki faimin damuwar ni kuma nayi maki alkawarin babu wanda zaiji wanan maganar dagani sai ke sai kuma Allah, in har kinji wanan magana ta fita,tabbata haia kece kika fitar dashi amma bani ba
Tunda Khadijat ta fara magana shiruuu Rukky tai tana me nazari da juyayin abin a zuciyarta
Wata zuciya tace"fai mata kawai Rukky,babu mamaki zaki samu shawarwari daga gareta yanda zaki magance matsalarki
"Wata zuciya kuma tace''a'a Rukky kada ki sake ki fai mata komai dangane da tsakaninki da alhj KHAMEES domin kuwa yin haka babban kuskure ne"     "Mafi akasarin al'ummah suna kuskure a yayin da suke amfani da kalmar bari kashi a ciki baya magani yunwa wanan babban kuskure domin kuwa barin magana a cikinka shine sirri da zaran kafita ka faima wani/ko wata toufa ya tashi daga sirri domin mutum ya yuci inda kake tunani,idan haka Rukky ina me baki shawara duk wiya duk rintsi kada ki sake ki faiwa wani tsakanimki da alhj KHAMEES"
Khadijat dake zaune baza kunne tai domin jin abinda Rukky fai mata"     Nannayar ajiyar zuciya Rukky tai snn tace"babu komai"

Gani yamma yayi Yaya Bala be dawo ba ga uban yunwan dake addabata yasa Khadijat cewa"kodai naje gida na dawo min tunda ki samu sauki fiye da lokacin da mukazo,ba zama zanyi ba"   Tou Rukky tace"Khadijat na miewa Rukky tace"sai kin dawo"   Tana fita miewa Rukky tai,hannu ta miewa Muhasana alamar tazo,tana zuwa ta auketa ta orata akan gado,shi kuma Muhammed hawa kujera yai ya zauna,sunata gwajungwalar zancensu shida Muhsana"

"Cike da mamaki Yaya Bala yace"amaru wai lafiyarka alau kuwa?"
lafiyata alau yaya,aure ne kuma nace banayi na saketa saki uku,banasonta kai ba ita bama duk wani abu daya dangaci nata banaso,muguwa arzaluma kawai Allah ya isa tsakanina da ita

haba amaru wai dan Allah
dallah me eyye,mezan da mazinaciya
subhanallilahi iya tace,snn taci gaba da cewa"Rukky mazinaciya?

ya jima yana kallonta snn yace da ita bata sameki haka Rukky?badai dukanki akai ba,idan ma dukane tou waye ya dukeki,nasan dai ba mijinki ba?
Kukane yaci arfi Rukky yasa ta kasa bashi amsar tambayoyin" "Shiruuu Yaya Mu'azam yai yana me kallon Rukky hai da tunane-tunanen kala-kala tsaki yai snn yace"kukan ya isa haka dan Allah, ki aure kiyi min bayani waye yai maki irin wanan mummunar dukan haka?" Duk da haka Rukky bata bashi amsa ba,su jima haka zaune idan ba kuka ba babu abinda Rukky keyi
"Yaya Mu'azam yai rarrashi har ya gaji Rukky bata daina kuka ba"  Miewa yai hai da cewa"ni zan tafi,domin banga amfani zuta asibitin ba,yai maganar ne hai da an motsa afarsa,da sauri Rukky tace"ba haba bane Yaya
Tou menene?"
Shiru ta kuma yi,bare da tace dashi komai ba
Gani haka yasa Yaya Mu'azam cewa"kiyi magana Rukky domin musan ta inda zamu bullowa al'amarin"  Cikin kuka Rukky tace"shine""    "Shine wahhh!!?"  "Kamaru"""wani kamaru in daga ciki?badai kicemin mijiki ba?"
"Shiruuu ta kuma yi"
"Himm Yaya Mu'azam yace"sann yaci gaba da cewa"me kikai masa da har zai maki irin wanan dukan haka?,waima na tambayeki yaushe ya dawo ne da har
jiyane ya dawowa"Au a dawowar da yai jiya dine har yai maki wanan dukar?"
Tou ma wai me kikai masa ne da har zai auki irin wanan hukunci?gaskiya be kyauta ba,duk irin hakurin da kikeyi dashi da uwarsa amma bisa an wani dalili tasa mara ma'ana zai kamaki da duka?"
"Uhmm Rukky tace" Snn Yaya Mu'azam yaci gaba da tambayarta da wama ya kawoki asibitin?"Yaya Bala ne da matarsa"""ok ina suke?"su tafi gida
Kenan tunda suka kawoki sukai tafiyarsu suka barki kwance kaman wata mara gata ko?" "Nanma shiru tai" "Ina shi amaru in yake?" Yana guda""Kenan tunda aka kawoki bezoba" "Eh,be zoba" "Himm,amma wlh amaru ya bani mamaki snn kuma ya bani kunya,amma ba damuwa,ni zan tafi gida domin na sanarwa inna dagama kinga sai tazo ta kwana dake ko"
Ihmm ta kuma cewa" Har ya juya sai kuma ya dawo da baya yace"tou shine basu tafi da yaran ba?wama ya taho masu nan din?" Yaya Bala ne,wai sabida suna kuka"  Shine da zai tafi beje dasu ba?mikomin su" Hannu yasa ya auki Muhasana ya sagalata a kafaarsa snn ta tada Muhammed, Muhammed na tashi yace"zo muje,su jima Muhammed na magagun bacci sai daga baya snn ya ware suka fice daga akin da Rukky take hai da cewa"insha Allahu bazan dae ba zamu dawo da inna"    Tou a dawo lafiya Rukky tace dashi" "Yaya Mu'azam na fita bakin gate ya sami napep zuwa gida"Yana isa kai tsaye akin inna ya nufa numgume dasu Muhammed
"Lariya inna tace hai da tambayarsa yaran waye ya kwaso masu cikin wanan daren?"
Be tanka mata ba,kai tsaye shigewa daga ciki yai domin kwantar dasu" Yana gaba inna na biye dashi a baya,leawa tai,da sauri ta mie hai da cewa"kamar su MAHAMMADU koko idonane?"""Eh sune"  "Lafiya ka kwaso mata cikin daren nan?" "Be tamka ba saida ya shinfia yaran snn ya juyo yace"tana asibiti batada lafiya"""Subhanallilahi,meke damuta?"
"Zazzaine yanzu haka ma zuwa nayi mu tafi dare dake,domin babu kowa a tare da ita" "Kamar yaya, babu kowa a tare da ita?,ina yan uwan mijinta?" "Duk suna gida" "Ban fahimta ba"
"Dan Allah inna yanzu ba lokacin wani dogon zancen bane,auki mayafi kawai kizo muje,idan yaso in mu ina can mayi maganar"
"Kai Mu'azam idan kasan akwai matsala ne tun yanzu gwamma ka sanar dani domin bazan
"A'a iya wlh babu wani matsala,idan ma akwai tou ba wani me yawa bane amma in har akabi abin a sannu
"kamar Yaya,ba fahimce kaba Mu'azam"
Dan Allah inna kizo muje kawai"Nanfa inna ta turke babu inda zata idan ba Mu'azam ya fai mata abinda ya sami Rukky ba"
"Duk da beso fai ba amma dole yasa shi ya fai mata
"buuuuuran ube inna tace snn taci gaba da fain yanzu shi amaru ne yakama Rukky da duka wanda har haka?toma yaushe ya dawo garin da har zai kamata da duka da har zai takata ga kwanciyar asibiti,toma ina uwarta tasa take?koda yake koda tana kallo ba magana zatai ba,tunda ba son Rukky takeyi ba" "Can kuma tai murmushin hai da cewa"Allah sarki yaro,taka kyau take bata arko,to wlh wanan dukar da kaiwa Rukky kada kaga kamar kaci bulus domin saina rama mata,snn kuma a jikin uwarka zan rama mata
Haba inna dan Allah kibar wanan zancen muje idan yaso komai menene saiya bi baya"Ya jikin nata?tana can rai a hannu Allah ko?domin kasan yanda dikan soja yake,ba imanine dasu ba" "Uhmm kawai Mu'azam yace" Kyale ta auka hai da cewa muje"Har sukai bakin zaure wani tunani ya faowa Mu'azam,Ina zuwa yace"juyawa yai zai koma ciki,Inna tace"Lafiya naga zaka koma daga ciki?"Eh,yarane zan kwaso na kaisu gidan Talatuwa,sabida be dace mu tafi mu barsu su kaai kwance anan babu kowa ba"
Cikin masifa ita tace"babu inda zakakai min jikoki,wato saresarin ta lashesu kafin safe ko?"
"Subhanallilahi wanan wani irin magana ne kuma haka?"
Hakane mana Mu'azam a yanda naji labari kafatalin zuri'arsu masune,Dan haka cisu Muhammed bazai zama abu me wiya a gareta ba,sann ma idan banda abinda ga Sani kwance a aki,na tabbata idan yaji motsi zai leasu
Duk da haka Mu'azam be yarda ba saida yaje ya sanarwa Yaya Sanin snn yazo suka tafi
Suna fita suka hau napep zuwa asibiti
Rukky na zaune shiruuu ta shiga duniyar tunani har su inna da Yaya Mu'azam suka shiga akin bata sani ba
Koda inna ta arisa bakin gado zubawa Rukky ido tai tana me are mata kallo ba tare da Rukky ta dawo daga tunanin da take ba" Ta jima tsaye snn tasa hannu ta taata hai da kiran sunanta Rukky! Rukky!! Rukky!!!,ana ukkune Rukky tai firrrgigi hai da cewa"naaaa'm,karaf tai ido biyu da Inna dake tsaye kanta" "Yaya Mu'azam dake tsaye yace"kinga ni Inna"babu mamaki tun fitata take wanna tunani,yanzu sabida Allah meye amfani irin haka?" "Uhmm Mu'azam kenan" Snnu RAKIYA yaya jkin?" Jiki da sauki Inna, an sunkuyawa tai ba tare data sauka daga gadon ba tace"Inna yini Inna" "Lafiya kala RAKIYA,Yaya jikin?"  "Jiki alhamdullhi,na samu sauki"
"Yanzu sabida Allah abinda sukai su kyauta kenan,dan rashin imani da rashin tsoron Allah sai su taru su kama jimganki kamar wata jaka,tou wlh bazai sabu ba,yanda suka umama maki jiki nima saina umamawa uwarsa jiki,domin idan ba uwarsa ta daka ba wlh bazan huce ba"  "A'a Inna abin abun a hankali,domin abinda yafi damuna da bata min rai yanda sukazo suka zueta sukai tafiyarsu kaman wata mara gata,yo ko wanda bata sani ba,ai be kamata kai masa haka ba bare kuma
"Barsu kawai Mu'azam duk rance sukaci,kuma sai su biya,domin kaan zai rage ba'a kawota asibiti ba" "Ina shi amaru?ko har yanzu bezo in bane?" Kai Rukky ta agawa Yaya Mu'azam da a lamar eh" "Uhmm Allah ya kyauta iya abinda Yaya Mu'azam yace kene,snn ya juya gun Inna yace"ni zan tafi gida,amma in Allah yasa mu wayi gari lafiya da zaran mu idar da sallar asuba zanzo na dubi kwananaku"
"Tou Allah ya tashemu lafiya" "Ameen"Bayan tafiyar Yaya Mu'azam kusan kwana Inna tai tana masifa"Rukky dake kwance ne ke bata hakuri,da haka har safe yayi,suna idar da sallar asuba saiga Yaya Mu'azam yai sallama shida daddy
Da dake zaune kan dadduma ta mie ta taresu da sannu da zuwa, bakin gado Yaya Mu'azam ya zauna,shi kuma daddy a kujeran rover dake gefe,bayan ya zauna ne Rukky ta dua har asa ta gaidasa,amsawa yai hai da tambayar jiki"da sauki tace" Inna na idarwa suka gaisa,bayan su gaisa ne suka ci gaba da magana akan dukan da amaru yaiwa Rukky hai da tambayarta laifin da tai masa har ya kaisa ga duka
"    Shiru Rukky tai kanta na asa,duk irin tambayar da sukai mata bata amsa suba,da haka har su daddy da Yaya Mu'azam suka mie zasu tafi,suna Sallama kenan saiga Yaya Bala ya shigo,yana shigowa gani su daddy yasa shi duawa suka gaisa bayan su gaisa dasu daddy ne ya juya ya gaida Inna hai da tambayar me jiki,da sauri duk suka amsa ije ledar daya shigo dashi yai bisa kan teburin dake auki hai da cewa"babu yawa ayi hakuri"Bayan ya miene sukai waje shida Yaya Mu'azam,suna fita suka sake wani sabon gaisuwar
Yaya Mu'azam ne ya katse Yaya Bala da tambayar garin Yaya hakan y faru?"Saida Yaya Bala ya nuna mutuar damuwarsa snn ya fara zayyana wa Yaya Mu'azam iya abinda yasane(duba da yai da ba ima da mutuncinsa bane ayi irin wanan mummunar aikin daga bakinsa yasa duk cikin zantawar da sukai da Yaya Mu'azam banda maganar saki)qkoda Yaya Mu'azam ya koma ciki be sanarwa kowa ba saida sukabar asibitin,suna hanyar komawa gida Yaya Mu'azam ke sanarwa daddy"
Cike da mamaki daddya yace",yanzu shi amaru ne ya aikata haka?yaron da nake masa kallon me hankali da sani ya kamata shine zai aikata haka?,amma babu komai rayuwa ce
Bayan fitar su daddy ne Rukky ta mie hai da cewa ina zuwa Inna"Ina zaki kuma?" "Fitsari zanyi" "Fitsari kuma,bayan wanda kikai yanzu da zamuyi alwala?"Eh tace"aukar duta tai ta fice daga akin, tana fita gangarawa tai can nisa da akin, ta jima tsaye a wajan snn aki daga cikin ma'akatan wajan tazo wucewa,da sauri Rukky tace"bawar Allah jimana dan Allah" Tsayawa tai snn tace"lafiya?" Dan Allah wayarki zaki arami""Wayata kuma,gaskiya kiyi hakuri bazan iya ba"tun kafin Rukky tai magana tuni nurse din tai wucewarta"Hanata wayar da tai besa Rukky fusata ba musanman ma idan tai duba da yanda duniyar ta zama abin tsoro" Da haka saida ta tsaida nurse har uku tana roonsu dasu bara aron waya tai kira amma duk in bata sukai,ana huune ta amince zata bata tai magana amma da sharai,sai dai ta fai numbar wanda zata kira ta sanya mata cikin wayar idan akai receiving call in saita bata"Rukky bataki ba,haka ta dunga kira numbar matar na sanyawa cikin wayar tata bayan ta gama ta danna kira,tayi kira yafi sau uku ba'a aga ba,gani haka yasa nurse cewa"kinga wanda kike kira yai aga wayar ko?waima wayene kike kira da har zaiki aga kiran haka?"  Jiki a sanyaye tace"mijina ne" da yake tana aya data cikin wanda suka bawa Rukky taimakon gaggawa lokacin da aka kawota tace"Allah sarki kill baya kusa da wayar ce,duk a tata gani wanda ya kawota shine mijinta wato Yaya Bala"sai tace bari dai na kuma gwadawa"Sake kiransa tai, ringing farko aka aga wayar da sallama
Jin sallama yasa nurse miawa Rukky wayar tace gashi ya aga"Sallama Rukky tai hai da cewa"nine Rukky"Dariya alhj KHAMEES yai hai da cewa baby kece???

*BISMILLAHR RAHMANI RAHIM*
_____"Dariya alhj KHAMEES yai hai da cewa"baby kece?baon numbar natani yasa banyi hanzarin aga kiranki ba,amma ina fatan hakan be ata maki rai ba? Au sorry kin canza layi ne?"
"A'a,ba wayata bane,ta wata ma'aikaciyar asibitin ne na ara"Ok bari na kira kada mu cinye mata kui"
Kashewa yai ya kira da tasa wayar
Ba tare data bashi amsar maganarsa ba taci gaba da cewa"amma kkabani kunya da mamaki,tunawar da tai akwai mutum a kusa da ita yasa Rukky katse magana har saida taja gefe"  "Jin shiru da tai ne yasa alhj KHAMEES cewa"ina sauraranki baby" "Koda yake ba laifinka bane,nice me laifi nida na biyewa zuciyarta da har ya jani zuwa ga saawa mahallicina,amma shine daga baya zakai min sakayya da haka,,koda yake ba
da sauri alhj KHAMEES ya dakatar da ita da cewa"baby kenan wlh ban fahimci maganarki ba,wani abune ya faru?" "Eh kace haka mana,tunda abinda kakeso ya faru ya riga daya faru
"Subhanallilahi me kuma ya faru baby?ina fatan ba wani abu ya sameki ba?"Cikin acin rai Rukky ke magana" inna'lillahi'wa'inna'illaihin wa'inna'ilaihin raju'un alhj KHAMEES yace"snn yaci gaba da cewa"wlh Allah bani bane hasalima banida numbar mijinki,cikin biyu za'ayi aya ko a lokacin da kike fita zuwa guna wani ya ganniki ko kuma a lokacin da muke waya
Cikin zafin rai tace babu wanda nake bari ya ganni a yayin da zan fita daga gida
A'a baby mutum shege ne duk yanda kike tunani mutum ya wuce da haka,kedai kada mu tsaya musu dake,duk yanda za'ayi inaso mu hau
Ka hau dawa??nidai babu inda zani"
Ki saurareni baby,kema kin San haka kawai ba zance inaso mu hau ba tare da wani dalili ba, akwai binciken da nakeso nayi akai ne shine dalilina na fain hakan"
A'a gaskiya bazan sake aikata irin kuskuren dana aikata a baya ba"
"Ohhh my gosh!!!, Please ki fahimceni baby
kafin ya rufe baki tsitt yaji alamar kashe waya" Tana medawa nurse wayar tai mata godiya snn ta koma aki,tana shiga Inna tace"Amma dai ba fitsarin ne ya tsaidaki ba?"Eh koda naje fitsirin sai naji bayan gari ya kamani shine na tsaya nayi"
Tou shi kenan
Tun daga ranar da aka kawo Rukky asibiti babu aya daga cikin yan gidan su amaru da suke zuwa dubata idan ba Yaya Bala ba,yau kwanata hudu kenan a asibiti kullum Inna ke kwana da ita,yara kuma kullum sai Yaya Mu'azam ya kawosu suga ummansu
Gani tasamu sauri sosai yasa Yaya Mu'azam niman sallama
Bayan su koma gida ko zama Inna batai ba Inna zuwa tace"fita tai zuwa gidan iya, lokacin babu kowa a gidan daga Yaya Bala har amaru in
Khadijat kuma na angaren ta,kai tsaye Inna rashiga,tana shiga tasami iya na sharan ofar aki,da yake dama ba sallama tai ba,hannu tasa ta hankae Iya dake duke iya taje da oai,hai da cewa yiiiihuhuuu shegiya gib tai karo da kujera, innallilahi tace snn taci gaba da tambayar waye?" "Ubankine Inna tace"jin muryan Inna ce yasa iya cewa"Au baar almura matsiyaci dama kece""kece dai matsiyaciya wanda basu gaji arziki ba"""ke idan ana arziki har kyasa baki?Allah wadaran naka ya lalace,wlh kunyi arasa""kin dai yi asara keda matsiyacin"" wlh ana ba matsiyaci bane,sai dai arkice matsiyaciya ya zinaciya,zinarma harda aure kai duniya ina zaki damu,andai yi asarar haihuwa,aurene dai bayayi yariga daya saketa saki uku""keeeee saurara,wlh baku isa ba""ko kuma isa ba wlh,Saida ya gama fafaketa duk ya kwashe mata albarkatun jiki sann zaice ya saketa tou wlh yayi kaan domin kotu zan kaisa""Maganar isa da rashinta duk ta are domin dai aikin gama yariga daya gama,aure ne dai ba'a yi domin ana bazai zauna da fasiata ba""kafin iya ta rufe baki saukar mari taji a bakinta kas-kas-kasss har sau uku snn Inna ta shaeta tana fain kece dai fasia,nan suka kama danbe da babu ji babu gani iya na faa Inna na faa
Jin aran kwanuka suna zuwa yasa Khadijat leawa ta window gani abinda ke faruwa ne yasa Khadijat saurin fitowa daga aki zuwa side in iya,koda tazo tayi iya yinta domin gani ta rabasu amma ta kasa,gani yanda Inna ke dukan iya yasa Khadijat komawa take kira Yaya Bala da amaru ta wayarta ta sanar dasu abinda ke faruwa,ko kafin ta dawo tuni amaru ya rigata da yake dama ba nisa yai ba,koda ya shigo gani Inna yai a kan iya tana faman zubga mata nushi a baki"tun iya na iya meda mata da magana gar yakai tai shiru
hannu yasa ya ficciko Inna yai hurgi da ita snn yasa hannu ya aga iya dake kwance shame-shame
Miewa Inna tai snn taci gaba da cewa kaan ma nayi maki domin har yanzu ban rama dukan da auki yaiwa yanta ba
gani yanda daar iya ke numfashi yasa ran amaru yai mugun aci, duk irin zage-zagen da Inna keyi be tanka mata ba har saida yakai iya aki snn ya fito,a fusace ya ficcikonwa Inna hannu ya fara janta irrrr kamar wata akuya zuwa waje" Duk yanda Inna taso wace hannunta amma ta kasa har saida suka kai ofar saren fita daga angaren iya kama saren tai ta rie kam,nan suka kama jayayya, amaru na janta itama tana jansa hai da cewa"babu inda zani"koda Khadijat ta zo itama tai iya oarinta amma ta kasa har saida Allah ya kawo Yaya Bala
Tun daga bakin gate ya hango irin auki ba dain da sukeyi da Inna da kuma amaru, subhanallilahi yace"da sauri ya ariso wajan, koda yazo shima yai irin nasa amma dukkansu su biyun sui bari,daga arshema sain ofar tai ta koma ta cukurkue amaru kamar zatai danbe dashi" Zuciya ta ibi amaru shima shaeta yai sukaci gaba da fae in fae shida Inna,duk abinda ta fai masa saiya meda mata,Yaya Bala na isowa wajan auke amaru yai da mari hai da cewa"wai kai amaru meke damuka ne?kanka aya kuwa ko kamance wanan surkuwarce ke,ko kamance matsayinta a wajanka ne"
Dallah ni ka kyaleni,na rama,babu ruwana da wani maganar sarkuwa,sarkuwan banza sarkuwan wofi
afa n ya arisa hannu Yaya Bala yasa ta toshewa amaru baki hai da jansa zuwa ciki,ita kuma Khadijat jan Inna tai har zuwa bakin gate,daar tasamu Inna ta fice daga gida,suna tafe tana tsinewa iya albarka hai da cewa"shegiya wacce bata gama da mijinta lafiya ba,insha Allahu yanda kika wulaanta mijinki keman sai Allah ya wulaantan taki
Da ar Khadijat ta lallai Inna ta tafi,suna shiga gani halin da iya ke ciki domin har a wanan lokacin daar take nishi,Yaya Bala yace"bari a kira nurse ta dubata"a'a amaru yace"snn yace"gwamma mu tafi da ita asibiti kawai domin acan zatafi samu kyankyawan kulawa"
Fita yai domin samo abin hawa,Inna ta tafe tana tsinewa iya hai da cewa"kaan ma nayi mata domin wlh inda badan zuwan mutane ba so nayi saina fitar mata da jini a jiki amma ta kiyayi gaba"
Suna samu abin hawa suka shigo suka auki iya zuwa asibiti,da yake pravent ne suna isa hannu bibbiyu aka amsheta,take a lokacin aka bata kyankyawan kulawa" Inna na isa gida tsayuwa tai a zaure saida ta gyara jikinta tsaf bakace tayi danbe ba snn ta arisa daga ciki,tana sallama daga Rukky har Yaya Mu'azam suka amsata hai dayi mata sannu da zuwa"Yawwa tace snn ta arisa daga uwar aki, tana shiga musanya kayan jikinta tai snn ta fito falo
Ta jima suna hira,bata bar wajan ba har saida taji jikinta ya fara tsami snn ta mie hai da cewa"bari nake daga ciki naan mie" tana shiga saida Tasha sudrex snn ta kwanta"

"A angaren Meenal kuwa bata damu ba domin yanzu takanta takeyi, kasancewar wanan cikin data samu me laulayi ne ba irin wancen bane
Minti-da minti sai hjy ta kira domin jin halin da take ciki,zuwan da tai gidan su mannel ta dae a falo tana sallama babu wanda ya amsata,jin shiru yasa hjy arisawa daga cikin akin,koda ta shiga gani Basik tai kwance yana faman sharan bacci,ita kuma Meenal tana ban aki tana amai,jin kakarin amai a bakin yasa hjy saurin arisawa cikin ban aki,koda ta shiga Meenal tagani zaune sharaf a aki rike da kofin ruwa a hannu,ga aman da tai duk jikinta,da sauri hjy ta arisa kanta hai da fai jikin ne haka?" Ruwa ta iba taita zuwa mata a fuska har saida aman ya tsaya snn ta taimaka mata ta tube kayan data ata towel ta aura mata fika fita zuwa daki"
"Suna shiga bayan ta kwantar da ita agado wadrobe ta bue ta auko doguwar riga baar jallabiya ta sanya mata tana gamawa fita tai waje inda suka ije mota umarni ta bashi daya shigo da motar daga ciki,ita kuma komawa tai ciki taje ta kamo Meenal suka fito daga waje,yana shigowa da mota ta sanya Meenal ciki snn ta kuma komawa taje ta auki Basik daga nan ta adana mata duk wani abu nata masu muhimmaci hai da janyo afar falo ta rufe,farfajiyar tsakar gida kuwa barinsa tai sabida masu aikin da suke ciki sunayi"
Suna barin gida hjy bata tsaya da Meenal a ko ina ba sai asibiti, emergency treatment ta buaci ai mata,da yake harka ta kuine ba tare da an bata lokaci ba tuni likita ya duba Meenal ya bata kulawar daya dace a bata, d rip da alluran hai da maguguna ala bata take a lokacin ta sami bacci
Gani tai bacci ne hjy ta kira J-boy ta sanar masa suna asibiti ita da meenal"subhanallilahi J-boy yace hai da tambayar wani asibitin suke"Hjy na fai masa befi minti ashirin da wayarsu ba saiga J-boy ya iso asibiti hannu auke da kayan marmari kala-kala da sallama ya shiga aki
Hjyce ta amsa masa hai da cewa"har ka ariso?"Eh wlh,Yaya me jikin?" "Jiki da sauki"Bayan su gaisa arisawa yai maki gadon Yana me urawa Meenal dake bacci ido,ya jima yana kallonta snn ya juyo sukaci gaba da magana,ya jima snn ya tafi da cewa"zaije ya dubo masu yimasa aiki Amma zai dawo nan bada daewa ba"  "Bayan fitarsa da wasu mintoci Meenal ta falka,ya jiki hjy tace da ita"jiki alhamdullhi tace"lemo hjy ta are mata ta bata tace tasha"Meenal tace a'a domin har yanzu batajin dain bakinta"  Da yamma bayan dawowar J-boy gani yanda idon Meenal yai kyau yasa hjy niman sallama, saida likita ya rubuta masu magugugu suka siye snn suka auki kayansu zuwa mota,suna shiga J-boy ya tada mota,saida sukai nisa snn J-boy yace"bari mu fara kaiki gida kafin mu arisa tamu gidan ko?"
Shiru hjy tai bata tankasa ba har saida suka isa ofar gidanta,yana faki ya fito daga domin buewa hjy kofa,bayan ta fita ne,ya dua yana yimata saida safe""katsesa tai da kwasomin kayansu ka biyoni dasu ciki,tana maganar ne tana bue murfin side in da Meenal take""a'a hjy""banason mu tsaya ja-inja dakai,wajena zata zauna har sai tasami lafiya" Dan Allah hjy""nace banason jin kowace magana daga gareka ko"Tou shikenan yace da ita"dole ya bi umarni hjy
"A angaren Surry kuwa sai faman shirye-sharye sukeyi na kumbo,duk yanda taso J-boy ya halarci duk wani program data shirya bata samu ba hakuri ya bata hai da cewa"yanada mara lafiya,matarsa ce ke kwance a asibiti babu lafiya dan haka suyi hakuri suyi masa uziri"   Haa baki sukai da cewa"suyi amma tunda gobe ne ranar kumbo yai oari yaje"yace"yaji, da haka suka rabu" Washe gari ana gobe aurin aure J-boy yazo wajan asibiti,duk yanda yaso tabashi Meenal su koma gida hjy tai, a cewarta babu inda zata,idan akan bikinsa ne yaje yai kayansa bata hanasa ba,wahala nedai bazai ba,domin fama da kanta takeyi dan haka yaje kawai yai aurensa,ita kuma duk lokacin data samu sauki zata dawo amma ba yanzu ba
Shiruuu J-boy yai yana me sauraran maganar mahaifiyarsa, duk da maganar batai masa dai ba amma haka ya bi umarnita,kiran awayan amare ne ya J-boy be aga kiran ba saida ya kauce snn ya amsa kiran,bayan su gaisa suke sanar dashi shifa suke jira" Ganinan zuwa yace dasu,saida ya koma gida yaje ya shirya snn ya arisa wajan wasan"

A ranar magana ta karae unguwa kowa da irin abinda yake fai,hatta an majalisar su Mu'azam sunaji zuga sukai suka zo gaishesa hai da nuna masa rashin jin dai abinda sukai shida amaru in" Su jima suna hira snn sukai sallama, suna barin wajan Mu'azam wasu daga cikinsu suka arisa gidan kamaru,shima su nuna masa nasa kuskuren fiye da tunani me tunani daga arke har abin ya zame masu faa, amaru yace"babu ruwansu dashi,daga yau duk irin abinda zaiyi bece kowa yasanya masa baki ba,Dan haka kada kowani shege ya sake zuwa masa da maganar be kyauta ba,hakan da yai shine dai-dai idan dah abinda yafi hakama zaiyi" aya daga cikinsu yace"tou shi kenan tunda yaka yace"babu ruwansu dashi"""eh babu ruwanku dani,kada wanda ya ara shiga harkata"jin yace haka suka jikinsu suka fice daga gida hai da cewa"akwai ranar kin dillaci,da afarka zaka biyomu"  Washe gari daddy da Mu'azam suka tasa Rukky a gaba data fai masu gaskiya abinda amaru ya fai akanta"   Tunda daddy ya fara magana babu abinda Rukky keyi inba kuka ba,har ya are magana"gani irin kukan da takeyi ne yasa Mu'azam amsar bakinta da cewa"duk da dai baka shedan Dan Adam amma wlh daddy ban yarda Rukky zata aikata abinda amaru ke zarginta dashi ba,sai dai ko shiga tsakaninsu akayi,shi kuma beyi kyankyawan bincike akai ba ya tashi ya yanke hukunci, Alhamdullhi da abin yazo da haka, Allah ya fitarwa kowa da hakkinsa,idan Rukky ce ta cucesa Allah ya saka masa,idan kuma shine ya cuceta Allah yai gatgawan saka mata"   Amen daddy yace"   Snn lokacin ne daddy ya sanarwa Rukky da maganar saki"Take taji kamar an watsa mata ruwan zafi, wani sabon kuka tasa hai da fain innallilahi wa'inna'ilaihin raju'un Alhummah ajirni fi musibati
take ta nemi natsuwarta ta rasa,kukane yaci arfin ta wanda yasata asa arisa addu'ar da takeyi,gani haka daddy yace"ta tashi ta shiga daga ciki,daren ranar kusan kwana Rukky tai tana kuka har saida taji kanta ya fara amsawa snn tai hakura da kukan"  Bayan kwana biyu Yaya Bala yazo har zo har gida yabawa daddy da Mu'azam hakurin abinda an uwansa ya aikata,snn suka tsaida maganar yara,Yaya Bala yace"taci gaba da riesa a hannunta har zuwa lokacin da zatai aure saiya amshesu,shi kuma duk abinda Allah ya hure masa zai rina kawo mata
Maganar kayan kuma duk lokacin da kuka shirya kwashewa ku sanar dani" Tou yace snn sukai sallama,bayan ya koma cikine yake sanarwa Talatuwa duk yanda sukai da Yaya Balan"""!!!!!!Sorry 4d typing error

Ihuuu iya tasa hai da fain na shiga uku na lallace" Yaya Bala da Khadijat suka kamata zuwa aki, daren ranar yanda iya taga rana haka taga dare,domin irin kukan da tai ko lokacin mutuwar Baffa batayishi ba"amaru na zuwa tashar zua yasami mota zuwa Ondo state"Bayan kwana biyu Talatuwa ta kira dallaliya tazo har gida,bayan su kuma gaisawa ta nuna mata kayan,aya bayan aya,bayan ta gama dubawa ne suka fara ciniki,da farko kaman bazasu dai-daita ba cikin hukunci Allah kuma suka dai-daita,gama aya kayan tasiye amma banda katifa da kuma akwatuna,domin a cewar Talatuwa be kamata ta saida katifa ba tunda a tabarma take kwana,data siyar da katifar gwamma tabar kayanta ta rina amfani dashi"Bata kwashe kayan ba saida ta cakewa Talatuwa kuinta rass snn ta kwashi kayan"

Gani abin yana nima ya shafi karatun yaransa yasa Yaya Bala daina jiranta,da zaran ya tashi sallar asuba kafin ya fita masallaci yake ora ruwan wanka kafin ya dawo daga masallaci yai zafi juyewa yakeyi yaiwa yaransa wanka ya shiryasu idan su fita kafin su arisa school in takeaway yake siye masu ya juye a lunch boxes in snn ya arisa dasu school"Yau da gobe sai Allah,gani shike shirya yara zuwa school ya kaisu snn ya dawo yai nasa shirin zuwa kasuwa,yanda yafita yabar gida haka zai dawo ya samesa kace-kace babu shara bare wanke-wanke lunch boxes uniform kowane zaune yake da gindinsa yanda inda su Khairat suka ije nan baban ke dawowa ya samesu" Kamar kullum yana dawowa daga kasuwa jefa afar da zaiyi falo sai cikin kwanu abinci,santsine ya kwasheshi da badan ya rie kushi ba babu abinda zai hanasa fauwa, innallilahi yace"Khairat da Na'eem dake zaune a falo da sauri suka jiyo suna fain sorry Abba duk abinda akeyi Khadijat na ciki tana jinsu amma bata fito taga abinda ke faruwa ba" Bayam ya mie ne yace"dashi ina mamanku take?" uku"Yaya Bala yaji bazai iya hakuri cikin dare biyota yai har falo inda take hakuri yaita bata guiwarsa bibbiyu a gabanta yana bata hakuri hai da yi mata alkawarin hakan bazai sake faruwa ba" Gani Yaya Bala duke a gabanta yasa kan Khadijat ara girma,Jin kanta takeyi a sama,daga nan ta fara jero mata sharai kala-kala" Duk abinda ta fai yaji kuma ya amince"Farin ciki a wajan Khadijat kuwa baya musaltuwa,cikin zuciya tace"gaskiya jan aji yayi,Allah wadaran mace da batada aji"Cikin isa da asaita ta tashi suka shige ciki"Duk da tashin tsami da takeyi amma be hana Yaya Bala biyan buatarsa ba domin a matse yake,daga sha biyu zuwa asuba yayi yakai sau huu,sai dai duk lokacin daya hau kanta aga fuskansa yakeyi sama, sabida tsamin da takeyi,har yai release da zaran yayi da sauri yake sauka"  Safiya nayi,tunda ya tashi be koma ba har saida ya kai yara school yadawo,gani har a lokacin Khadijat na bacci bata tashi ba yasa Yaya Bala kaa kai snn ya tadata da ta tashi tai wanka snn ta sallah,ya fai maki, idan bakiji magana ta zakije lahira ki amsawa ubangiji a yayi da ba

Ba tare data numa bacin rai ba yace"idan wanan ne kada ta damu,sawa iya abinci be zama dole a gareta ba,in taga daga ta sanya mata wanan ra'ayinta ne,in kuma ta hanata duk ra'ayinta ne dan haka kada tasa maganar iya a ranta, ba iya bama koshi be sata dole ba,in taga dama tayi idan taga bazata iya ba kuma duk ayane a garesa"
Daine ya kashe Khadijat"Tun daga ranar babu wanda ya ara Jin kansu,azantane dai babu canji saima abinda yai gaba,daya gane kullum kafin ya fita yake gyara gida haka ma idan ya dawo saiya kuma gyarawa"Bayan wata aya,hankali iya yai matuar tashi domin tunda amaru yabar gida babu shi babu labarinsa,gani bazata iya jure rashin sa ba iya yanke shawaran zuwa wajan malami domin yai mata duba akan kamaru"Washe gari da safe misalin goma zuwa sha aya bayan fitan Yaya Bala kasuwa ta shirya zuwa gidan malami,da yake akwai wani malami a gangaren unguwarsu wajanta taje tace tanaso yai mata duba akan anta domin tunda ya baro gida babu shi babu alamarsa ko kiransa akai baya auka snn shi kuma baya koran kowa" Dariya malam yai snn ya auko an wani madaidaiciya fefe wanda yake auke da asa akai sai kuma 'ya'yan wuri dake watse akan asa" Gabansa ya ije fafen snn ya kwashe wurin dake kan asar snn yai an surkullesa hai da maganganu irin tasu ta bokayen malamai snn ya watsa wurin akan asar" Tsura wa asar ido yai kamar na minti biyar snn yai dariya" Gani yai dariya yasa iya tambayarsa da lafiya?"  Saida ya kuma murmusawa snn yace"aiki da ta nuna mana asiri akai masa snn kuma macece tai asirin,idan baki dage da nema masa magani ba gaskiya da wuya ya dawowa gareku
""Innallilahi wa'innailailin raju'un iya tace"babu wanda iya takawo a ranta sai Rukky"tun daga lokaci gidan suna gidan biki idan taje hira ya tashi saita fai, Rukky taiwa amaru kurciya"Da haka har magana yazo kunni iyayen Rukky,koda daddy yaji murmushin yai snn yace"maganar banza takeyi dan haka kada Talatuwa ta sake tunkaransa da zance"
****Hjy bata meda Meenal gidan J-boy ba sai bayan wata biyu wanda ta tabbata uwawo yariga ya dame da kashi" duk inda akakai wata biyu da aure soyayya ya are sai kuma zaman hakuri"  A lokacin cikinta na wata uku,ranar data medata haasu tai tai masu faa sosai hai da nasiha daga arshe ta basu shawarar da su zauna lafiya"In Sha Allah duk sukace"Kasancewar taga yanda jikin Meenal in yake yau lafiya gobe ciwo yasa bata bar Basik a wajanta ba komawa tai dashi gidanta, a cewarta taji da kanta"Tun daga ranar da Meenal ta dawo gidan Surry ta canzawa J-boy'duk ranar da Meenal ce keda girma yini ranar haka Surry zata yini cikin unci da acin rai,da farko J-boy be gane ba yini yake yana tambayarta abinda ke damuta,babu komai shine amsarta"Ranar dako ya kwana a akinta,yini zatai tana fara'a,kissa da kisisina kuwa ba'a magana" Duk irin abinda Surty zatai Meenal bata sauraranta,domin ta kanta takeyi,daga lokacin da cikin Meenal ya shiga wata biyar,da zaran J-boy yai kusa da ita wari yake mata, hakan yasa ta aurace masa"Wani lokaci ya kyaleta wani lokaci kuwa koda yaya sai yayi,duk ranar da yai kuwa yini take tana amai, gani haka yasa J-boy hakura da ita gaba aya,bayan sallar isha ya tarasu dukkansu su biyun a falo yai masu bayani ta fahinta" kowa yace ya amaince da haka"Tun daga ranar girki ya koma hannu Surry ita zataci gaba dayi har sai Meenal ta haihu snn zata amsa"
A angaren Sofy kuwa sabon harka ta bue fiye da tunani me tunani, yanzu tayi ilin ta goge sosai musamman ma hauwarta da alhj Hamza, duk fitan da zaiyi asa-asa da ita yakeyi"Hakan yasa ta ara gogewa sosai yanzu haka rabota da Najeriya wata uku kenan da kwanaki" A angaren iyayenta kuwa tun al'amarinta na damusu har suzo su sallama su zuba mata ido,idan duniya ce ta ishi kowa riga da wando,wanda bezo bama tana jiramsa bare kuma wanda ke cikinta"

Mu'azam ne yasami matar da zai aura,har ma sun dai-daita da ita"!!!Allhu akbar, Allah na gode maka"Ashe zanga wanan ranar,na dae ina rokon Allah ya nunamin wanan rana sai yau,kai Allah na gode maka"Aina ne yarinyar take?snn kuma ar gidan waye?" Murmushin daddy yai snn yace"ba ar gidan kowa bace,yarinyar kuma tana nan tare dake,ba kowa bace sai Rukky, Rukky itace matar da Mu'azam zai aura" Wufffff tai ta mie hai da sake tambaya wace Rukky?"
Kinada wata Rukky ne bayan Rukky taki"
! Buuurin uban,wlh baku isa ba,daga kai har shi kunyi kaan, bare kuma ita,idan wani makirci kuka kallo tou wlh nafi arfinku,duk cikin matan dake garinnan ya rasa wacce zai aure sai Rukky?" Mazinaciya,zinarma da aure?,tou wlh ban yarda ba kuma ban amince ba"
Idan ni kuma na amince fa?"
Yatsa ta nunasa dashi hai da cewa"arya kakeyi wlh"
Miewa yai snn yace"aure dai babu fashi dan haka mu zuba mu gani"
Zaka ko gani,domin in har na haifu cikin uwata da ubana babu auren saina lallata auren"
To shi kenan, Allah ya bawa me rabo sa'a"
Ameen Inna tace,snn daddy yai ficewarsa daga gidan""!!!!! Sorry 4d typing error####

_____"Daddy yana shiga sbayan ya karya yai ya shirya domin zuwa kasuwa, bayan ya dawo daga kasuwa ne, lokacin yana cin abinci,yayin da Talatuwa ke zaune suka dashi,cikin raha da dabara take tambayarsa abinda ya ata masa rai da safe kafin ya fita kasuwa"

Cikin gida kuma?"igi Mu'azam kenan"

Su jima suna tattanawa shida Talatuwa,daga arshe dai haka suka shiri ita zata koma cikin gida shi kuma saiya hau dakunan ya zama masu ciki da falo"
Katin sati daddy yasa aka fara gyarawa Talatuwa aki"Tunda Inna taga ana gyara ta kasa zaune ta kasa tsaye,daga arshe koran ma'aikatan tayi tace"suje su cema wanda ya sasu aikin ta koresu idan ya isa yazo da kanta tana jiransa"Duk da haka bata hakuri ba,bin Talatuwa tai har gida, afa babu takalmi bare mayafi haka ta fice daga nata gidan zuwa gidan Talatuwa"Tana tafe siket na binta bugazai-bugazai kamar an kwatoshi daga bakin kura" Haka ta fasa gidan Talatuwa babu ko sallama,lokacin Talatuwa na kwance a akin tana bacci,kamar daga sama take jiyo hayaniyar Inna,kafin ta mie tace zata fita wajan tuni Inna ta fao mata daki, hai da yae mata labule"
Cikin idon bacci Talatuwa tace"a'a Rabu ne,shine babu ko sallama"
Cikin masifa Inna tace"banyi ba kuma bazan ba,mutune kirki akewa sallama ba irinku an wuta ba,babu ko shakku ke ar wuta,muguwa azaluma manafuka insha Allahu arshenki bazaiyi kyau ba"
Jin muryan Inna a gidan yasa gaban Rukky yankewa ya fai, innallilahi tace"snn ta fara hasa-hasa ta fitane ko kuwa tai zamanta,domin a yanda takeyi jiyo muryan Inna babu ko shakku a sattin take"
Ta windo ta lea domin hango Inna"kasancewar suna aki ne yasa bata hango ba sai sautin muryanta da take ji" Murmushin Talatuwa tai snn tace"Uhmm ta kanki akeji mahaukaciyar banza kawai, nasan ba'a kan komai kike wanan haukar ba sai akan auren Mu'azam da Rukky, aure ne dai babu fashi"  Fuuuu Inna tai da niyyar wawuro Talatuwa"   Kafin takai gannu jikin Talatuwa tuni Talatuwa tasa nata hannu ta hankae Inna ta faa cikin kwandon wanke-wanke,kwatsatttsatsam kwanuka suka dunga karo da junansu" Kafin Inna ta mie da sauri Talatuwa tafice tabar mata akin" Yiiiihuhuuu Inna tace"tana miewa ta shiga wargazawa Talatuwa aki duk abinda tagani a kintse saida ta wargaza hatta garin masara saida Inna ta tsiyaye masa manja akai snn ta haa da garin kuka a cikin snn ta auki fantekan garin ta kira akan gado tanayi tana tsinewa Talatuwa da Rukky albarka ita hai da cewa"in ta haihu cikin uwarta da ubanta saita wargaza auren"
Rukky dake aki babu abinda takeyi sai kuka hai data sani amincewar auren Mu'azam da tai"
Duk irin haukar da Inna keyi Talatuwa na daga tsakar gida tana kallonta,da zaran su haa ido gwalo dakewa Inna snn tace da ita"aure dai babu fashi ba zafin rai ba mutum ya haiye zuciya ya mutu"

Wuuu tai kanta hai da cewa"ubanki ne mahaukurci,snn taci gaba da cewa"ai ga aikin haukan nan nayi maki nasan koba komai yau saiki yini kina gyara" Ke gyara ya dama"
Inna tajima tana tsine-tsinenta snn tafice daga gidan"tana fita Rukky ta fito daga aki cikin kuka ta zube gaban Talatuwa tana bata hakuri bisa ga abinda Inna tai mata,a cewarta duk sune suka jawo mata"
Babu komai Talatuwa tace" Nan suka hau gyara akin ita da Rukky,kafin la'asar su gyara ko ina tsaf,garin masarar da Inna ta ata daga dayake tanada ijiyar wani garin aukar lalataccen tai tabawa tumakai makwabtansu da suke shigowa sukaci,ita kuma tai amfani da wani" Daga Talatuwa har Rukky babu wanda ya faiwa daddy abinda Inna tazo tai arna"
Da yamma yana dawowa kasuwa shiga gidan Talatuwa ba saida ya fara shiga cikin gida domin gani aiki,yana shiga gani aki yai kace-kace da alamar anfara gyara,to komai ya hanasu arisawa oho,nisan dai ba matsala kudi ba,domin saida na biyasu kuinsu tun daga na kayan aiki har zuwa ga tasu amma bari na kirasu naji dalilinsu nayi haka"
Hannu ya sanya cikin aljihunsa ya ciro waya,ya aya daga cikin masu aikin"Yana gani kiransa da sauri ya aga, hai da sallama,bayan su gaisa Daddy ke tambayarsa abinda ya hanasu arisa aiki"
Nan ya kwashe duk yanda sukai da Inna ya fai masa"Hakuri daddy ya basu snn yace"idan bazasu damu ba gobe suzo su arisa yana gida babu inda zaije har sai su are"
Duk abinda yakeyi Inna na kallonta ta labule,taso yazo ya tareta da maganar ne,gani ya fice be tunkareta ba yasata ciza laanta hai da cewa"Allah ya taimakeka"  Tun daga lokaci be sake bi takan Inna ba,cikin sati yasa Rukky ta shirya domin zuwa gida wajan iyayenta,sha biyu na arziki ya haa mata,shima Mu'azam ba'a barsa a baya ba,duk da siyayyar da daddy yaiwa Rukky be hana Mu'azam yi mata ba,cikin kayan har da zani da hijab kala biyu ya siyewa mamanta hai dasu sabulai da man shafi" Su Muhammed da Muhasana kayan kala biyu-biyu ya siye masu,ranar da zasu tafi har tasha ya rakata,bebar wajan ba saida yaga tashinsu snn ya koma gida"
Kwana aya da tafiyar Rukky Talatuwa ta tare a cikin gida, ranar haukane kawai Inna batai ba,amma zagi da tsinuwar albarka sai abinda ta mance duk da haka be isheta ba ruwa ta dunga ibawa tana jia tsakar gida, bayan ta jia ko ina tasamu wajan ta zauna tana me meda numfashi,can ta hango tsummar Talatuwa rataye a igiya da sauri ta kuma miewa taje ta wuya ta yanka igiyar kayan suka zube a asa, kafa Inna tasa ta murje kayan da kafa snn ta koma aki"
Gani duk irin abinda tai Talatuwa bata magana yasa Inna gani kamar tsorone yasa Talatuwa bata iya meda mata martani,kullum ta yayibo sharanta sai kan Talatuwa" Tun Talatuwa na danne zuciyarta har yakai ga ta ureta wani safiyar juma'a bayan daddy ya fita kasuwa, da yake ranar Talatuwa ce keda girki, tana sallamar daddy ta haa kayan wanke-wanke ta wanka,gefe guda ta shanya tana jira ya bushe snn takai aki"
Tana gama wanke-wanken ta share ko ina snn ta shiga aki domin gyarawa,nan ma bata auki lokaci ba ta gama duk wani aikinta bayan ya kai kayan aki waja ta samu ta kwanta a cewarta bari tadan rimtsa kafin tai wanka"
Tana kwanciya bacci ya dauketa, befi ashiri da keanciyarta ba kawai taji saukar ruwa a jikinta,a gigice ta tashi hai da fain innallilahi wa'innailailin raju'un bue idon da zatayi RABI tagani tsaye gabanta rie da botikin ruwa a hannunta tana faman huci kamar wata kububuwa"
Kallo aya Talatuwa tai mata snn tai tsaki,sabida tsabar takaici tama rasa ta ina zata fara,wata zuciya tace"amshi botikin kawai ki ria mata,wata zuciyar kuma tace"yayiwa shegiya afa tana zubewa ki haye ruwan cikinta ki ibawa shegiya kashi,wata zuciyar kuma tace"a'a Talatuwa idan har zaki rama basai kin biyeta kin zama makauniya irinta na,idan har kikai haka kin zama kare kenan irinta,idan banda rashin hankali ina kika taa gani kare yai haushi ka biyesa,idan har ramawa zakiyi basai kin biyeta kunyi tashin hankali ba cikin ruwan sanyi zaki dafata da baaen maganganu wanda idan ita me hankalice ya isa tasan annabi ya faku"
Duk da ranta ya aci tai sai oarin danewa, murmushin yae tai snn tace Allah ya baki hakuri,nasan ni me laifine a gareki musamman ma idan nayi duba da irin laifin da nayi maki,kinga be kamata na biyeki ba ko shi na barki dashi ya isheki"kadafa ki mance ni maciyace wacce bata rami kanta sai dai a gina ta shiga,wlh RABI inda nasan haka raminki yake da ban tsaya asa a guiwa ba da tutuni na dae da shiga,kaji rami da ni'eemtaccen ni'eema da dai? gaskiya RABi kinyi asanar duniya da lahira domin samu namiji irin Yallabai me iya tattala mace da sani darajanta sai an tona,,,wufff Inna tai kan Talatuwa tana fain uwarki da ubanki ne sukai asarar duniya amma ba niba"Duk irin maganganu da Inna tai ta faiwa Talatuwa kin kulata tai data gaji dan kanta ta fice daga akin,Inna ta fita Talatuwa ta aga katifar ta jingina a bango" Lokacin da daddy yazo kwanciya gani katifa a jie yasa shi tambayar garin Yaya ruwa ya zuba a katifa?"   "Duk irin tsigewar da Inna tai mata Saida ta faiwa Daddy"Cike da takaici daddy ke magana,daga arshe yace"Nasan maganinta,duk yanda Talatuwa taso jin irin hukunci da zai yankewa Inna kin fai daddy yai" Bayan isar Rukky gida da kwana biyu daddy ya kira ta numbar ta yace"tabawa mmnta"Bayan Rukky ta baiwa mmnta suka gaisa cikin girmamawa snn daddy yai mata jajen abinda ya faru" Murmushin tai hai da cewa"baby komai,kadan ita aure abune me rai da zaran shan ruwa ya are shi kenan" Hakane daddy yace"Snn yake sanar da ita maganar Mu'azam"
Murna sosai tai hai da cewa"Rukky da Mu'azam in ai duk suna arashin ikonsa suke dan haka yaje yai duk abinda daya dace" fatan alkhairi duk sukaiwa juna snn daddy yace"idan maigidanta nada waya ta bashi numbar yanason magana dashi"
Tou tace"snn sukai sallama"mijinta na dawowa daga kiwo ta sanar masa" Babu damuwa yace"Snn ya amshi numbar daddy, bayan ta bashi yakisa,suna gaisawa daddy ya sanar dashi maganar auren"fatan alkhairi shima yai snn yace"bashida iko akan Rukky amma tunda akwai wani anin babanta wanda be dae da dawowa auyen ba insha Allahu zaije ya sanar dashi daga nan zai bashi numbar sa"
Cikin Jin dai daddy yai masa godiya,washe gari yaje har rugan Baffa Ibran ya sanar dashi abinda ke tafe dashi daga nan ya bashi numbar daddy"Take daddy ya kirasa sukai magana,nan suka yanke ranar auren wani juma'a me zuwa"  "Jin an dai-daita yasa mmn Rukky ta shiga gyara ar, musamman take shiga jeji ta sassao awon itatuwa tazo ta harhaa da mahai ta dafawa Rukky,nasha dana tsarki,ga kuma anyan nono da kullum take sha babu dare babu safe"  Cikin anani lokaci Rukky ta game tai gam,ga kuma jika da tai a ciki" Ana sauran kwana biyar daddy ya tura Mu'azam gida jalingo,kafin ya isa tuni ya kira an uwansa ya sanar dasu,hakan yasa Mu'azam na isa suka amshesa hannu bibbiyu"  Washe gari har da Mu'azam in akakai kayan aure gidan Baffa Ibran,ranar juma'a bayan saukowa daga masallaci aka aura auren Mu'azam da RUKAYYA, da yamma bayan sallar magrib angin uwa da matan Baffa Ibran suka raka Rukky gidan mijinta wato Mu'azam" aki musamman anin daddy yasa aka gyara masu" an kai amarya basu daddy ba kowa ya watse tun kafin hasken farin tawa ya disashe domin shine fitilarsu idan dare yayi"    "Misalin arfe tara Mu'azam ya shigo aki"

"Jiki a sanyaye Mu'azam ya arisa shigowa daga ciki hai da sallama"Ciki-ciki Rukky ta amsa,ba lallane yaji ba"   "Yana shigowa bakin gado,ije ladar dake hannunsa yai a gefe,sufi minti goma babu wanda yaiwa an uwansa magana,irjinsa kuwa sai faman dukan uku-uku yakeyi,daga aya jikinsa yai sanyi wanda shima kansa besan dalili ba"  Kasancewar shine namji yasa shi arfin halin kiran sunanta" A hannnkali Rukky ta amsa da na'am" Kinga yanda Allah ke ikonsa ko?wai yau muke zaune a arashin inuwa aya"Daga yau ni Mu'azam za'a kira da sunan mijinki,kai Allah na gode maka Allah abin godiya"Yanzu dai kamata yai mu tashi muyi sallah domin godewa Allah ma aukackin sarki daya nuna mana wanan rana me tarin albarka a garemu"  Miewa yai yanufi bakin ofa da niyyar fita,juyawar da zaiyi can ya hango batikin fyanti hai da babban butan rover a bayan ofa,tafiya yai yaje ya jijiga butan domin ji akwai ruwa a ciki ko babu?" Cike tam yaji butar daga yai yaje yai tsarki snn yai alwala, ijewa Rukky yai a bakin ofa bayan ya shigo ita kuma ta fita taje tai nata alwala tana gamawa ta shiga dashi aki" Jansu sallah raka'a biyu,bayan su idar su jima suna addu'a snn suka shafa, bayan su shafa ne yasa hannu ya jawo ladar daya shigo dashi buewa yai snn yace da ita bismillh"Kasancewar auye ne ba wani kayan maulashe za'a samu kamar birni ba" Tsirene kawai ya samu da fanta na rover"Kunya ya hana Rukky ci,babu yanda Mu'azam beyi da ita data ci amma taki daga arshe shi yaci kayansa snn yaje ya wanke baki yadawo akin"  Sanyawa ofa sakata yai snn yazo Saida ya rage kayan jikinsa,rigar captani dake jikinsa ya cire yabar doguwar wando da sigileti snn ya kwanta"
Bayan ya kwanta ne itama ta tashi taje ta gefe ta haye gado,can jikin bango ta rae, befi minti biyar da kwanciya ba bacci ya aukesa"Rukky dake kwance tana kallonsa cikin zuciyarta tace shi kuma wanan wani irin angone haka?kodan sabon shiga ne?ko kuma jiki yake na bisa?aiko idan hakane ba binka zanyi ba,duk da sonda nake maka idan baka biyo ni sai dai mu zauna haka" Ance bacci arawo batasan lokacin da bacci ya dauketa ba" Masalin arfe biyu da rabi Mu'azam ya falka,gani Rukky kwance kusa dashi, wani irin daine ya kamashi,ara matsawa yai kusa da ita hannu yasa yana fashe fuskanta,yanda yake sharar fuskanta a hankali haka yakeji wani irin abu na ratsesa,sunkuyawa yai da fuskansa kan nata a hankali yake kissing nata"Tun daga lokacin daya falka itama Rukky ta falka amma bata yarda ya gane ba"  Gani bazai iya jure abinda yake jiba yasa Mu'azam rungumeta tsaf a irjinsa,na an wani lokaci daga snn besan lokacin daya hayeta ba,befi minti biyar da hayeta ba kome tajiyo oho da sauri ya mie ya cire singiletin dake jikinsa yai hurgi dashi,snn yaci gaba"
Can anjima kuma ya sake cire doguwar wandon dake tsaye da ita,bayan wani minti biyar in kuma ya sake cire gajeran wandon daya rage,daga arshe dai komawa yai babu komai a jikinsa sai faman saffa da marwa yakeyi wanda bana macca ba"
Cikin mafarki amaru yagano Rukky kwance da wani namiji ba shiba,ihuuu yasa wanda shi kansa besan cewa a zahiri yakeyinta ba,hai da fain aa dan Allah wlh matata ce,wlh matata ce,dan Allah kada kaimin haka" Duk irin abinda Mu'azam keyi akan Rukky haka amaru ke gani"Wani irin ihuuu amaru yasa hai da fain ooooooooo Rukky

_____"A furgice ta falka yaci gaba da zabga ihu hai da fai a'a Rukky please please please kada kin min haka dan Allah Rukky" Sake rumtsa ido yai,yana rufewa ya sake gani yanda wani ke safa da marwa akan Rukky,ihu yasa hai da cewa kaeeeeee karyane wlh,zubburr ya sauka daga gadon yaje ya fara loda kaya yana zubawa cikin jaka"  Cikin daren ya shirya zuwa gida, kasancewar dare ne babu taxi haka yaci afa har zuwa tasha"  Koda amaru ya isa tashar be samu mota,a cewarsu daka akwai mota a asa bazai tashi yanzu ba sai dai zuwa asuba" Gani bazai iya tsayu ba fita daga tashar yayi zuwa wani tashar,nanma dayaje be samu mota ba,sake fita yai zuwa wani still can inma babu mota daga arshe dai komawa tashar farko yayi,ko kafin ya isa asuba yayi"
Tunda Mu'azam ya fara safa da marwa be saurara ba saida yazo arshe snn ya kabbara hankalinsa ya dawo jikinsa,a lokacin ne ya fara tambayar kansa garin yaya hakan ya faru,da sauri ya diro daga gadon hai da rarumo kayansa,da yai hurgi dasu a lokacin da guguwa ta ibesa,yana kwashewa sanya aramin wandon yai snn ya auki buta taje yai wanka,acan bayin ya meda kayansa snn ya dawo akin,koda ya koma kasa sukuni yai,gaba aya kunya ta kamashi, gefe na samu ya zauna, asalatun farko zakara na cara Mu'azam yabar gida"  arfe 4-30AM dai-dai motar su amaru ya tashi daga Ondo zuwa Abuja" Bayan Rukky ta tashi tai wanka snn tazo tai sallama,bayan ta idar ne ta hau gyara aki,gyara akinta tai tsaf snn ta share,bayan ta share ne ta shiga wanka,tana cikin bayi yaro yai sallama, bakin ofar Rukky"Jin shiru yasa shi koma da baya" Jin sallamar yaro a ofar akinta yasa Rukky sauri-sauri tai ta fito,koda da fito bataga kowa ba,tana shiga aki saiga wani sallamar matar anin daddy ne ta kawo mata abin kari" Cikin girmamawa suka gaisa bayan ta miawa Rukky kwanu shan kunun ne take sanar da ita itace ta aiko yaro ya kawo mata ya dawo yace"babu kowa a dakin,shi tace bari tazo da kanta" Murmushin Rukky tai snn tace"eyya lokacin ina ban aki ne"    Allah sarki matan tace snn tawuce" Tunda Mu'azam ya fice daga gidan be dawo ba, tafiya yai can gidin wata bishiya ya zauna,sai faman tunane-tunanen yakeyi,babu abinda yake masa yawo a zuciya sai irin abinda yaji a yayin da yake tarawa da Rukky,haka dai yaita tunane-tunane har yanzu be dawo gidan ba"
Misalin arfe 3PM motar su amaru ya shigo garin Abuja,a tashar jabi suka baka,bayan ya fita ne ya nemi taxi da zai kaisa gida, kasancewar taxi in Abuja iya kwaryan Abuja suke tsayuwa dole saida ya sauka ya canza wani wanda zai kaisa har gida" Muriya-muriyan hanya ya amaru be isa gida ba sai bayan biyar,    Yana shiga kai tsaye akinsa ya nufa yana ije jaka ya fita zuwa gidan su daddy,yana isa ofar gida yaro ya samu ya aika a kira masa Rukky" Yaro yana shiga jin ance Rukky ake kira a guje"Inna tabi yaro hai da cewa"idan ya sake shigowa gidan da suna Rukky yake nema sai dakesa" Yaro na fita yacewa amaru ance babu wata me suna Rukky a gida
A tunani amaru sabida shine yasa akace haka,jeka yace wa yaro, ya jima tsaye a ofar gidan,can kuma kome yatune oho shiga daga ciki yayi hai da sallama"Inna dake tsaye a tsakar gida,leawa tai domin gani me sallamar,tun kafin takai shi ya shigo,suna haa ido tace"Au!!dama kai shege tsinanne gantalalle
Jin irin migun zagin da Inna keyi yasa Talatuwa lekowa,gani amaru ne yasa Talatuwa faaa fara'arta kadan snn tace"dama kai ke sallama?" Eh wlh, duawa yai hai da cewa"barka da war haka,na sameku lafiya?" Ina euwanka da lafiyarmu,waima ubanwa ya baka izinin shigowa?"""
Kiyi hakuri Dan Allah Inna, wajan Rukky nazo"""
Rukky?!!wacece kuma Rukky?ni bansan wani halitta da ake kira da suna haka ba"""Talatuwa ce ta katse Inna da cewa"Rukky tayi tafiya
da sauri yace"ina taje?"
Eh tou,duk da banida masaniya da inda taje,amma nasan baya wuce garinsu"
Lafiya taje garinsu in?kodai aure tayi iya?" Da sauri ta taresa da cewa"aure kuma? a'a gaskiya ban sani ba"
Shiruuu amaru yai,can kuma yace"bari na kirata naji" Shiru Talatuwa tai tana me kallonsa cike da mamaki,cikin zuciyarta kuwa tambayar kanta takeyi,anya kansa aya kuwa? ko ya mance ne da maganar sakin dake tsakaninsu?tou ko dai wajan yara yazo?Uhmm koma menene bari naga gudun ruwansa"
Inna dake tsaye in ba zabgawa da amaru da Talatuwa zagi hai da tsinuwa ba babu abinda takeyi"
Daga Talatuwar har amaru babu wanda ya kulata"
Koda amaru ya kira layin Rukky kin shiga yai,gani yai shiga yasa shi tambaya ko ta canza numbar ne?" Talatuwa tace"a'a babu mamaki network ne,amma ya sake gwadawa" Tou yace"snn sukai sallama"  Duk da haka jikinsa be basa ba,nan yafara tunanin ina zaije inda zai samu labari"take majalisa ta fao masa arai,Kai tsaye ya kami hanyar  majalisar"Yana isa ya tarar da majalisa cike tam da jama'a,anata faman hira, amaru na isowa,wasu daga cikinsu suka mie suna masu yimasa oyoyo"Wanda sukai faa kwanaki kuwa kallo be ishesu ba" Bayan ya zauna duk sukai gaigaisa snn sukaci gaba da hira hai da tambayarsa yaushe yashigo garin"
Yanzu nan yace" Gani dukkanin abokansu amma babu Mu'azam yasa amaru cewa"lafiya banga Mu'azam anan ba?"""  Cikin fai wani ya tari numfashinsa hai da cewa"meyai ruwanka dashi?"  Murmushin yae amaru yai snn yace"Can kuma kome ya gani yabar wajan ya nufi gida,yana shiga sukai ido biyu da Khadijat" Da fara'arta tai masa snnu da zuwa hai da tambayarsa yaushe ya dawo?"dazu yace,be tsaya sauraranta ba ya nufi angaren iya" Iya dake sharan bakin ofa jin muryan amaru da sauri ta aga kanta dake duke,suna haa ido kuka tasa hai da cewa"malam kayi gaskiya, gaskiya aikinka naci, insha Allahu Rukky bazata gama da duniya lafiya ba"
Kamasa tai suka shiga aki,bayan ta bashi ruwa ya sha snn yaje ta auko masa raguwar abincin data dafa, snn ta zauna suka gaisa,koda suka hira, bini-bini sai amaru yai trying numbar Rukky"  Bayan isha lokacin Yaya Bala ya dawo kasuwa,yai mamaki gani amaru a irin wanan lokacin dabesa ran dawowarsa ba, bayan su gaisa ne Yaya Bala ke tambayar lafiya a dawo babu ko sanarwa" Uhmm amaru yace"snn ya fai masa irin mafarkin da yai akan Rukky"Wai Rukky tai aure,dan Allah da gaske ne yaya'in da gaske ne kafadi min yaya,kasan kai dan uwanane koda kowa zai boyemi amma banda Kai da gaske ne Rukky ta auri wani ba niba?"
Cike da mamaki Yaya Bala ke kallon amaru,cikin zuciyarsa yace"lafiyar sa kuwa?kodai kansa ya juye ne?ko kuma abinda yakesha ya juya masa kwakwalwa,idan ba haka ba meye abin damuwa Dan Rukky tai aure?" A fili kuma yace"mafarkin da kakeyi ba gaskiya bane, Rukky batai aure ba,nanan ko ranar Monday sai da muka hau da ita ta rako yara school"
Tou amma gashi bata gari,yanzu fa daga gidansu nake ance wai tayi tafiya taje garinsu,anya Yaya ba boyemi sukeyi ba kuwa?"
Kai!!anya kuwa,idan ma taje jiyane ko yai"Kuma maganar aure da kakeyi Rukky batai aure ba,inda zatai aure da mu sani kodan yara""
Kai yaya nidai jikina ya bani Rukky tai aure""
amaru kenan,idan banda abuka meye abin damuwa Dan Rukky tai aure?kada ka manta kaifa ka saketa kace bakayi da ita"""taransa yai da cewa"kuskure ne Yaya,wlh inason matata,ina sonta Yaya,Yaya inason Rukky fiye da yanda yake tunani"""Tsawa Yaya Bala ya daka masa hai da cewa yai masa shiru'inda yasan Yana sonta bazai saketa ba""jin haka yasa amaru rusawa da kuka yana fain kuskure ne wlh kuskure ne Yaya"
Gani yanda amaru ke kuka yasa jikin Yaya Bala sanyi,rungume amaru yai yana me rarrashinsa"
Tunda Mu'azam ya fita be kuma shiga gida ba sai da dare yai,ya dai-daici lokacin Rukky tai bacci snn ya shigo,a hankali yake sana kamar wani mara gaskiya"Yana shiga ya rufe ofa, kasancewar yariga dayaci abinci yasa kashe wuta ya kwanta"   Duk yanda yaso dannewa amma ya kasa irin abinda akayi a daren jiya haka yau ma ya kuma faruwa"   Sai dai na yau babu sauki,domin shi kansa saida yai mamakin kansa,minti da minti yake kome" A lokacin da Mu'azam ke hailala da salatin manzo can kuma amaru nanan na faman oarin Kiran numbar Rukky"  Mu'azam nakan Rukky yaji zakara yai cara'be sauka ba saida yai release snn ya yunkura zai sauka"da sauri Rukky ta rikesa hai da cewa"yayana ina zaka?
Fiii-fiii Mu'azam yai da ido,asa bata amsa yai,sai umm da yace"
Yasa tambayarsa tai da ina zaka?" Gani yayi shiru be bata amsa ba,daga snn bata sake magana ba kamo fuskansa tai ta haa da nata fuskan snn taci gaba da kissing nasa hai da shafe masa dukkanin sassan jikinsa"
Mu'azam dake kanta gigicewa yai,besan lokacin daya fao meda mata ba,duk inda ya kamo a jikinsa tsotsa kawai yakeyi"  Hakan yasa basu samu damar sallah ba sai bakwai saura,yini ranar hanasa fita ko ina tai" amaru dake can yana kiranta be kwanta ba sai bayan da yai sallar asuba snn ya kwanta"
Bayan suyi sallah suka karya snn suka kwanta,duk yanda Mu'azam yakai ga kunya Dole ya saki jiki"  Ranar yini sukai suna abu aya, Mu'azam be tsanke da al'amarin ba Saida dare yai, musamman ma yanda yaga Rukky ke sarrafashi"daga arshe hayewa kansa tai,cikin zuciyarsa yace"dama haka ma'aurata kejin irin abinda nakeyi ko ni kadai ne keji haka,ko kuma dani sabon shiga ne?" Tun daga ranar Mu'azam be sake nisa da Rukky ba,idan har yafita tofa masallaci ne zaije,da zaran an idar kuwa gida zai dawo,kafin sati Mu'azam ya zama an gari,babu dare babu rana duk lokacin da buatar hakan ya taso masa sai yayi"A angaren amaru kuwa duk wata hanyar da zai sami Rukky ko yaji labarin yaje be samu ba,hasalima daddy yai masa iyaka da gidan sa"Zuzucewa yai ya koma kamar mahaukurci,idan Yaya Bala ya dawo daga kasuwa tasashi gaba takeyi da kuka saidai yaje ya nimo masa Rukkyrsa"Yaya Bala yai rarrashi har yaga" A angaren iya kuwa cewa"tai wani asirin ne Rukky tai masa yasa babu wanda yakeji yake gani sai ita"Bayan sati biyu amaru ya shirya zuwa *sandaey* jalingo garin bbn Rukky kenan" Ranar da amaru ya shirya domin tafiya jalingo su kuma ranar ne zasu dawo gida Abuja,befi minti biyar da tashin motar su Rukky da Mu'azam ba motar su amaru ya tashi
